column1: The Mi-Camp ONE modular tent system is completely different to other connectable tent systems, it's built in connectivity allows individual tents to be connected together without additional parts or tunnels whilst remaining 100% waterproof.
Any side of the Mi-Camp ONE connects to another, allowing you to create the space you want even on the smallest of campsite pitches. Need more space? Simply add another ONE!
By eliminating dark tunnels and fiddly attachments the Mi-Camp modular ONE pitches fast using its built in connectivity.

All Mi-Camp ONEs are exactly the same size, to make your camping space bigger you simply add additional ONEs. The internal height allows you to be able to stand up inside, whilst the doors are high enough for you to walk through without bending.
The generous floor space allows the easy fitting of a double airbed whilst fitting three single airbeds doesn't feel like a squash!
The tent also has fold down door flaps on every opening preventing trip hazards when entering, walking through or exiting the tent.
This makes the ONE an ideal family tent as it's completely pushchair &

The Mi-Camp ONE ventilation system ensures air flows through each layer of the tent from the external ventilation grills or vent panel, through to the inner liner and back outside. In addition, internal layers are fully breathable allowing condensation to pass through keeping you comfortably dry inside.
•  A 100% waterproof removable ground sheet to prevent water ingress.
• A robust footprint to protect the underside of your tent.
• Modular design allowing you to create a tent the size and layout you want using quick release buckles and straps.
• Built in connectivity, eliminating the need for additional tunnels or connection accessories.
• Quick and easy to inflate air frame.
• Frame cells guaranteed for life against weld failure, double wrapped to prevent punctures.
• 12 months manufactures guarantee against faulty materials &
• Frame design allows cells to be repaired or replaced with ease.
• Non spill quick release cell connectors make it easy to isolate a leak whilst keeping the rest of your tent inflated.

• Single point inflation from a choice of two inflation points. Making pitching easy and packing down fast. Air can expel through both points rather than at one end of a cell. Preventing air becoming trapped and the tent not packing down as small as it should.
• A high flow pump for inflating the frame.
• Removable inner liners to create dedicated sleeping areas.
• Removable liners with technical properties including pollen filters, pet liners and fully waterproof bathroom liners.
• Changeable internal layers that allow you to create partitions, blackout, insulate, cool, colourise or dampen noise inside your tent.
• Blackout layers incorporating exit signs for door identification and orientation.
• Quick access exit points on every side.
• Interchangeable doors, windows, vented panels and fly screens.
• Canopy pole mounting points on every outer panel.
• Skins allow you to change the outside colour of your tent..
• Technical Skins to enhance the specifications (including water repellency) of your Mi-Camp ONE.
• Clear PVC windows, door and roof keeping the tent light and airy during the day.
• Ventilation system for breathability and to combat condensation.
• Fold down thresholds throughout the tent eliminating trip hazards.
• Standing height throughout, no need to stoop when entering or exiting the tent.
• Cable management system keeping electrical cables off the floor out of harms way.
• Off ground storage pockets in liners making it easy to get to your things during the night.
• Storage Layers allowing you to put your things where ever you want.
• Carry bag for easy manoeuvring of the tent.
• Future proof design allows anything and everything to change.
• Expanding range of skins, layers and liners to choose from.
• Changeable ground sheet for caravan and motor home awnings preventing yellow grass.
• Mi-Kids achievement badge mount to display badges your children have earned.
• Emergency spares / repair kit. For fast replacement of essential components.
• All external sewn edges taped to keep water out.
Our funding goal is set to allow for the drawing up of legal documents &
column2: two factory visits, enabling full manufacturing to commence and goods to be checked before shipping.

column1: We have also factored in the tooling costs to help ensure that your Mi-Camp ONE is produced to a high standard replicating the concept images &
column2: providing you with a well made tent, providing you with many seasons of enjoyment.

column1: A minimum order quantity is also required for manufacturing, however we are hoping the Mi-Camp ONE's reward popularity will take us past the minimum order amount required.

If however the campaign isn't as popular as we hope and we don't reach the minimum order quantity required, additional factory visits maybe be required to renegotiate minimum order amounts. We also have the fall back of an additional round of funding at the start of the new season, as the demand for camping equipment is highly seasonal.
However choosing to back the Mi-Camp ONE now means you'll have your tent in plenty of time for next season.
We've complied a range of rewards for backing the Mi-Camp ONE including limited offers &
column2: early bird discounts, through to great bundle deals that give you everything you need to customise your Mi-Camp ONE to your exact requirements.

column1: If you dont see a perk that meets your requirements, just let me know and I'll customise one for you.
Q. How do they cope in the wind?

A. Air frames are far more giving than traditional poles, allowing them to remain stable in the wind. The Mi-Camp ONE has pegging points around the base to secure it to the ground. It's also provided with guy ropes &
Q. How do they attach as a caravan / motor home awning?
A. As the sides of the tent are flat, you can simply pull the tent up close to your vehicle / caravan and use the built in connectivity to attach together if desired.
Q. What happens if I get a puncture?

A. The cells are double wrapped in a robust material to prevent puncture. However if it does happen, each cell automatically isolates preventing the whole tent going down. The repair patch can be applied or the cell replaced and re-inflated.
Q. Does each tent come in its own bag?
A. Yes, each tent can be transported separately so you can take just what you need.
Q. How do you attach the pump.
A. The pump attaches to the inflation valve in a similar way to an air mattress. However the pump nozzle locks in place to prevent air escaping whilst the tent is inflated.
The one way valve prevents air from escaping once the pump is disconnected.
To deflate the tent simply unscrew the valve cap and press the deflate button.

About Benjamin Perry & The Mi-Camp ONE
As a single dad of two young children and having a love for the outdoors, camping was the natural choice when it came to the school holidays.
Unfortunately camping isn't easy when you're trying to pitch a tent, entertain two children and have fun....hence the idea for the Mi-Camp ONE was born!

The Mi-Camp ONE is the worlds 1st fully customisable inflatable camping tent. It's easy to pitch single handedly, looks the way you want, is as big as you need, and feels as comfortable as home. Its so adaptable you can even use it as a caravan or motor home awning.

The Mi-Camp ONE solves all the problems, niggles and upsets my children and I have faced whilst trying to make the most of our camping trips. From the early morning light waking us up, to staying warm at night & everything in between. We've even eliminated trip hazards for added safety.
Please select a perk now to bring the Mi-Camp ONE to life.  Your pledge is needed to meet the minimum order quantity required in manufacturing.
Here's everything you get with the Mi-Camp ONE
A Quick & Easy To Pitch Tent

The Mi-Camp ONE inflatable tent is built upon an air frame that blows up quickly from a single point using the supplied high flow hand pump.  If you need to erect your Mi-Camp ONE in seconds, simply attach an electric pump. Each frame has two inflation points allowing fast inflation & deflation from any side. Once up, secure it to the ground with guy ropes.

You can even personalise the inside of your Mi-Camp ONE from an expanding range of layers including coloured & blackout layers. Once you're done, simply leave in place ready for your next camping adventure.
Modular Design - Create The Space You Want!

Inflatable modules connect Quickly & Easily to create the space you want. For festival camping simply take ONE & connect to your friends. For family camping take several to create your home from home.

The Mi-Camp ONE modular tent system is completely different to other connectable tent systems, it's built in connectivity allows individual tents to be connected together without additional parts or tunnels whilst remaining 100% waterproof.
Any side of the Mi-Camp ONE connects to another, allowing you to create the space you want even on the smallest of campsite pitches. Need more space? Simply add another ONE!
By eliminating dark tunnels and fiddly attachments the Mi-Camp modular ONE pitches fast using its built in connectivity.

All Mi-Camp ONEs are exactly the same size, to make your camping space bigger you simply add additional ONEs. The internal height allows you to be able to stand up inside, whilst the doors are high enough for you to walk through without bending.
Plenty Of Space Without Trip Hazards!
The generous floor space allows the easy fitting of a double airbed whilst fitting three single airbeds doesn't feel like a squash!
The tent also has fold down door flaps on every opening preventing trip hazards when entering, walking through or exiting the tent.
This makes the ONE an ideal family tent as it's completely pushchair & wheelchair friendly.

The Mi-Camp ONE ventilation system ensures air flows through each layer of the tent from the external ventilation grills or vent panel, through to the inner liner and back outside. In addition, internal layers are fully breathable allowing condensation to pass through keeping you comfortably dry inside.

A robust footprint to protect the underside of your tent.

What We Need & What You Get...
Our funding goal is set to allow for the drawing up of legal documents & two factory visits, enabling full manufacturing to commence and goods to be checked before shipping.

We have also factored in the tooling costs to help ensure that your Mi-Camp ONE is produced to a high standard replicating the concept images & providing you with a well made tent, providing you with many seasons of enjoyment.
A minimum order quantity is also required for manufacturing, however we are hoping the Mi-Camp ONE's reward popularity will take us past the minimum order amount required.

If however the campaign isn't as popular as we hope and we don't reach the minimum order quantity required, additional factory visits maybe be required to renegotiate minimum order amounts. We also have the fall back of an additional round of funding at the start of the new season, as the demand for camping equipment is highly seasonal.
However choosing to back the Mi-Camp ONE now means you'll have your tent in plenty of time for next season.

We've complied a range of rewards for backing the Mi-Camp ONE including limited offers & early bird discounts, through to great bundle deals that give you everything you need to customise your Mi-Camp ONE to your exact requirements.
If you dont see a perk that meets your requirements, just let me know and I'll customise one for you.
Q. How do they cope in the wind?

A. Air frames are far more giving than traditional poles, allowing them to remain stable in the wind. The Mi-Camp ONE has pegging points around the base to secure it to the ground. It's also provided with guy ropes & storm straps for extra stability.
Q. How do they attach as a caravan / motor home awning?
A. As the sides of the tent are flat, you can simply pull the tent up close to your vehicle / caravan and use the built in connectivity to attach together if desired.

A. The cells are double wrapped in a robust material to prevent puncture. However if it does happen, each cell automatically isolates preventing the whole tent going down. The repair patch can be applied or the cell replaced and re-inflated.

A. Yes, each tent can be transported separately so you can take just what you need.

The one way valve prevents air from escaping once the pump is disconnected.
To deflate the tent simply unscrew the valve cap and press the deflate button.

Explore. Discover. Connect.

Every human being yearns for a sense of belonging. We seek to understand who we are, and to have a sense of personal identity. You and I want to understand our past and to feel rooted to something bigger than ourselves. In a word, we want to feel CONNECTED.

The Family Nexus helps people do exactly that.

History

I launched The Family Nexus app for iOS in February 2017 at RootsTech in Salt Lake City, Utah. RootsTech is the largest genealogy conference in the world, where literally tens of thousands of enthusiasts gather to learn new skills and to explore the latest in family history related technology. The response was phenomenal. We added more features over the next year, and people told us how much they love the app. However, Android users have been left out in the cold! I am excited to engage your help in bringing this same awesomeness to the Android platform.

A crowd of visitors to The Family Nexus booth at RootsTech 2018.

Why?

Like so many of you, I love my family. I also love the family members that came before me that contributed to who I am today. Family history is more than just a hobby. It is a part of the human experience. Too  many people in today's society are drifting without an anchor because they don't have a foundational understanding of who they are and where they come from.

I believe that everyone has an interest in their family history. I also believe passionately that transformative experiences can occur when someone connects with an ancestor through photos and stories. That experience becomes even more powerful when linked to geography and the actual places where her ancestor's lived, loved, worked, and died.

The Family Nexus is my attempt to create those types of powerful experiences in the lives of people all around the world.

""This app has ignited a renewed interest in family history. It has made it much much easier to put it into context for both place and time. I love the event alerts. It's really cool when I happen to be near a place and get an alert that one of my ancestors had been there too!"" -- Steamloco3985
David Taylor (aka Indiana Jones) demonstrates the app to 2 family history enthusiasts, while other visitors stand in line for a chance to win prizes at The Family Nexus booth at RootsTech 2018.

The Family Nexus combines the power of mobile technology with the world's largest online family tree to automatically map the locations of events  in your ancestor's lives. We bring this awesomeness to our users by employing a ""freemium"" model (see below). The app goes beyond just birth locations, and also maps marriage, residence, death, burial, and other locations as well.
The app goes way beyond just displaying these locations on a map. The app sends notifications to your phone when you get close to the locations of events in your family history.

column2: />Last summer, one user  took the trip of a lifetime to England and Wales. The Family Nexus app showed her which ancestors lived where, including some ancestors she wasn't aware of. She was able to customize her itinerary to visit the towns and villages where her ancestors lived and worked. The app greatly enriched her overall travel experience.

column1: But you don't have to travel overseas to benefit from this incredible family history app.

In addition to notifications based on your location, you also get alerts on the anniversaries of births, marriages, and deaths. This simple reminder keeps you engaged with your family history and invites you to take a few minutes to learn about a different ancestor everyday!

One user has said, ""I appreciate the way this app makes me more interested and excited about family history."" This kind of feedback really keeps us motivated to continue bringing great new features to our app so people of all skill levels can get excited about their own family history.

Freemium is a very common business model for mobile apps today. In essence, some features are made available for free and others can be unlocked by paying for them. We have a very simple model. The Family Nexus app offers great free features to all users. In addition, Premium Subscribers can unlock ALL the other cool features. We feel this subscription approach is much better than ""nickel and diming"" you for each feature. Also, subscribers get access to all new premium features as they are developed!
Features that will always be free include:
• Integration with FamilySearch to download 6 generations of your family tree
• Automatically map birth, marriage, death, and burial locations
• Display person details with key life events
• Alerts to your phone when you are near the location of an ancestral event
• Alerts to your phone on anniversaries of key moments in your family history
• ""Accupin"" feature allows you to set the precise location of an event
• Check-in to an ancestral location, and keep track of the places you have visited
• Get navigation directions to an ancestral location
• Integrated Google Street View, to explore ancestral locations if you can't travel
• Customize the map view with powerful filter controls
• View your ancestor's family including parents/siblings or spouse/children view
• Connect with your ancestors with photos and stories available right in the app
• Custom events such as residence, naturalization, and more
• Custom data layers show the locations of cemeteries, churches, or city halls

We are excited to offer some great perks to all our backers! Check out all the perks over on the right. Many backers are excited to be able to support the development of the Android version and get access to all the Premium features. If you have an iPhone or iPad you can still be a backer and get the premium features at a discount!

In addition to premium subscriptions, take a look at the ""Treasure Hunter"" contribution perk! This includes a super-cool T-shirt that reads ""Family History Treasure Hunter"" on the front, and ""Not all research is done in a library"" on the back! Printed on high-quality 60-40 blend ""Next Level"" t-shirts
We greatly appreciate each one of our backers
column2: we couldn't do it without you! Our goal is to make family history more accessible to people of all ages and skill levels. I believe that by using the power of mobile technology we can help people feel connected to their past in ways not seen before.

column1: This project and this campaign is about more than just adding a new platform or new features. It is about expanding the reach of an industry-changing application. With your help we can bring the power of special places to the world.

If you have ever visited the centuries-old church where your ancestors were married, walked through a field they farmed, or reverently stood at the headstone of an ancestor, you know the power of special places. Visiting places that were significant in the lives of your ancestors can be a deeply moving experience. It helps you visualize their lives and connect with them in ways not possible any other way. Sharing that experience with loved ones deepens your bond with your living family members as well.
Please join us on this journey. Make a contribution today. And don't forget to follow our social media accounts to stay up-to-date on our latest developments!
If we exceed our initial funding goal of $25,000 we will be able to add cool new features to the app. What's more, we will add these features to the Android platform first!

If we reach $35,000 we will add the ability to geocode rich media such as photographs and audio files within the app. This means you will be able to identify they precise GPS coordinates where a photo was taken and add that to your map. This feature will work on photos that are added to FamilySearch Memories, OR you can upload them directly from your device.

If we reach a total of $50,000 we will add new features to create custom travel itineraries in The Family Nexus app. Each itinerary can have up to 25 points of interest, and each location can be added to an itinerary quickly by tapping on it.

If we reach $75,000 in funding we will create an augmented reality experience within the app! Imagine recording your thoughts and feelings while visiting your ancestor's grave or homestead. Then you publish your virtual memorial for others to access when they are at that location, too! Or view historic photos of the church where your grandparents were married simply by holding up the phone while visiting that location.
If you want to support our campaign, but just can't afford to contribute financially at this time you can still help!

Crowdfunding works by expanding beyond the network of people that I, as the founder, know personally. We need everyone to get the word out about The Family Nexus app and about our funding campaign on Indiegogo!
• So tell EVERYONE you know about this! Let's make some noise!
• Share on all your favorite social media platforms
• Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to maximize the impact.
About Me
column2:
/>I am a family history enthusiast, but I remember keenly the struggles and frustrations of learning to do research. I also recognize that not everyone wants to do research! That doesn't mean they aren't interested in their family history, however.

I spent 15 years in a technology consulting business helping organizations improve their processes. I am a certified Project Manager, and I love to deliver solutions that solve problems and make life easier for people.

I am currently a Senior Product Manager responsible for the online catalog (including digital resources) for a large archival institution with significant special collections of interest to researchers.

My work with The Family Nexus is a personal passion and a labor of love. I am thrilled to apply my experience to create a product that enables people to connect with their family history!

Project Risks

Mobile software development can be a risky and an expensive proposition. We have already successfully developed and launched The Family Nexus app for iPhone and iPad. In the process we learned a lot, and we have contracted with a team of trusted developers who understand our product and the needs of our customers.

Our current project is to bring the same functionality to the Android platform. I have a fixed bid contract with seasoned and expert Android developers in the same company that helped us develop the app for iOS.

In addition, we have secured an outside investor who has pledged to fund all but the $25,000 we are raising through this campaign towards the Android development. When we hit our funding goal we will have all the funds we need to meet our budget!

This means our risk is very low. A lot of the risks and challenges have already been resolved. For example, we have already completed the hard work of becoming a Certified FamilySearch Partner and learning how to use the family tree data that is critical to the app's success. In addition, we have laid the technical groundwork so that the app will work equally well on Android as it does on iOS.

As with any software development, the biggest risk is not delivering on time. However, our experience with this team of developers gives us confidence that this won't be an issue. Beyond getting the same functionality on Android as we have in iOS we have some stretch goals that may present some technical challenges. If we reach our stretch goals we will develop them for Android FIRST!

","Explore. Discover. Connect.Every human being yearns for a sense of belonging. We seek to understand who we are, and to have a sense of personal identity. You and I want to understand our past and to feel rooted to something bigger than ourselves. In a word, we want to feel CONNECTED.The Family Nexus helps people do exactly that.HistoryI launched The Family Nexus app for iOS in February 2017 at RootsTech in Salt Lake City, Utah. RootsTech is the largest genealogy conference in the world, where literally tens of thousands of enthusiasts gather to learn new skills and to explore the latest in family history related technology. The response was phenomenal. We added more features over the next year, and people told us how much they love the app. However, Android users have been left out in the cold! I am excited to engage your help in bringing this same awesomeness to the Android platform.A crowd of visitors to The Family Nexus booth at RootsTech 2018.Why?Like so many of you, I love my family. I also love the family members that came before me that contributed to who I am today. Family history is more than just a hobby. It is a part of the human experience. Too  many people in today's society are drifting without an anchor because they don't have a foundational understanding of who they are and where they come from.I believe that everyone has an interest in their family history. I also believe passionately that transformative experiences can occur when someone connects with an ancestor through photos and stories. That experience becomes even more powerful when linked to geography and the actual places where her ancestor's lived, loved, worked, and died.The Family Nexus is my attempt to create those types of powerful experiences in the lives of people all around the world.

column1: This app has ignited a renewed interest in family history. It has made it much much easier to put it into context for both place and time. I love the event alerts. It's really cool when I happen to be near a place and get an alert that one of my ancestors had been there too!"" -- Steamloco3985
David Taylor (aka Indiana Jones) demonstrates the app to 2 family history enthusiasts, while other visitors stand in line for a chance to win prizes at The Family Nexus booth at RootsTech 2018.

The Family Nexus combines the power of mobile technology with the world's largest online family tree to automatically map the locations of events  in your ancestor's lives. We bring this awesomeness to our users by employing a ""freemium"" model (see below). The app goes beyond just birth locations, and also maps marriage, residence, death, burial, and other locations as well.
The app goes way beyond just displaying these locations on a map. The app sends notifications to your phone when you get close to the locations of events in your family history.

Last summer, one user  took the trip of a lifetime to England and Wales. The Family Nexus app showed her which ancestors lived where, including some ancestors she wasn't aware of. She was able to customize her itinerary to visit the towns and villages where her ancestors lived and worked. The app greatly enriched her overall travel experience.
But you don't have to travel overseas to benefit from this incredible family history app.

In addition to notifications based on your location, you also get alerts on the anniversaries of births, marriages, and deaths. This simple reminder keeps you engaged with your family history and invites you to take a few minutes to learn about a different ancestor everyday!

One user has said, ""I appreciate the way this app makes me more interested and excited about family history."" This kind of feedback really keeps us motivated to continue bringing great new features to our app so people of all skill levels can get excited about their own family history.

Freemium is a very common business model for mobile apps today. In essence, some features are made available for free and others can be unlocked by paying for them. We have a very simple model. The Family Nexus app offers great free features to all users. In addition, Premium Subscribers can unlock ALL the other cool features. We feel this subscription approach is much better than ""nickel and diming"" you for each feature. Also, subscribers get access to all new premium features as they are developed!
Features that will always be free include:
Integration with FamilySearch to download 6 generations of your family tree
Automatically map birth, marriage, death, and burial locations
Display person details with key life events
Alerts to your phone when you are near the location of an ancestral event
Alerts to your phone on anniversaries of key moments in your family history
Accupin"" feature allows you to set the precise location of an event
Some of the Premium features include:
Check-in to an ancestral location, and keep track of the places you have visited
Get navigation directions to an ancestral location
Integrated Google Street View, to explore ancestral locations if you can't travel
Customize the map view with powerful filter controls
View your ancestor's family including parents/siblings or spouse/children view
Connect with your ancestors with photos and stories available right in the app
Custom events such as residence, naturalization, and more
Custom data layers show the locations of cemeteries, churches, or city halls

We are excited to offer some great perks to all our backers! Check out all the perks over on the right. Many backers are excited to be able to support the development of the Android version and get access to all the Premium features. If you have an iPhone or iPad you can still be a backer and get the premium features at a discount!

In addition to premium subscriptions, take a look at the ""Treasure Hunter"" contribution perk! This includes a super-cool T-shirt that reads ""Family History Treasure Hunter"" on the front, and ""Not all research is done in a library"" on the back! Printed on high-quality 60-40 blend ""Next Level"" t-shirts
We greatly appreciate each one of our backers
column2: we couldn't do it without you! Our goal is to make family history more accessible to people of all ages and skill levels. I believe that by using the power of mobile technology we can help people feel connected to their past in ways not seen before.

column1: This project and this campaign is about more than just adding a new platform or new features. It is about expanding the reach of an industry-changing application. With your help we can bring the power of special places to the world.

If you have ever visited the centuries-old church where your ancestors were married, walked through a field they farmed, or reverently stood at the headstone of an ancestor, you know the power of special places. Visiting places that were significant in the lives of your ancestors can be a deeply moving experience. It helps you visualize their lives and connect with them in ways not possible any other way. Sharing that experience with loved ones deepens your bond with your living family members as well.
Please join us on this journey. Make a contribution today. And don't forget to follow our social media accounts to stay up-to-date on our latest developments!
If we exceed our initial funding goal of $25,000 we will be able to add cool new features to the app. What's more, we will add these features to the Android platform first!

If we reach $35,000 we will add the ability to geocode rich media such as photographs and audio files within the app. This means you will be able to identify they precise GPS coordinates where a photo was taken and add that to your map. This feature will work on photos that are added to FamilySearch Memories, OR you can upload them directly from your device.

If we reach a total of $50,000 we will add new features to create custom travel itineraries in The Family Nexus app. Each itinerary can have up to 25 points of interest, and each location can be added to an itinerary quickly by tapping on it.

If we reach $75,000 in funding we will create an augmented reality experience within the app! Imagine recording your thoughts and feelings while visiting your ancestor's grave or homestead. Then you publish your virtual memorial for others to access when they are at that location, too! Or view historic photos of the church where your grandparents were married simply by holding up the phone while visiting that location.
This will change family history forever!
If you want to support our campaign, but just can't afford to contribute financially at this time you can still help!

Crowdfunding works by expanding beyond the network of people that I, as the founder, know personally. We need everyone to get the word out about The Family Nexus app and about our funding campaign on Indiegogo!
So tell EVERYONE you know about this! Let's make some noise!
Share on all your favorite social media platforms
Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools to maximize the impact.

About MeI am a family history enthusiast, but I remember keenly the struggles and frustrations of learning to do research. I also recognize that not everyone wants to do research! That doesn't mean they aren't interested in their family history, however.I spent 15 years in a technology consulting business helping organizations improve their processes. I am a certified Project Manager, and I love to deliver solutions that solve problems and make life easier for people.I am currently a Senior Product Manager responsible for the online catalog (including digital resources) for a large archival institution with significant special collections of interest to researchers.My work with The Family Nexus is a personal passion and a labor of love. I am thrilled to apply my experience to create a product that enables people to connect with their family history!Project RisksMobile software development can be a risky and an expensive proposition. We have already successfully developed and launched The Family Nexus app for iPhone and iPad. In the process we learned a lot, and we have contracted with a team of trusted developers who understand our product and the needs of our customers.Our current project is to bring the same functionality to the Android platform. I have a fixed bid contract with seasoned and expert Android developers in the same company that helped us develop the app for iOS.In addition, we have secured an outside investor who has pledged to fund all but the $25,000 we are raising through this campaign towards the Android development. When we hit our funding goal we will have all the funds we need to meet our budget!This means our risk is very low. A lot of the risks and challenges have already been resolved. For example, we have already completed the hard work of becoming a Certified FamilySearch Partner and learning how to use the family tree data that is critical to the app's success. In addition, we have laid the technical groundwork so that the app will work equally well on Android as it does on iOS.As with any software development, the biggest risk is not delivering on time. However, our experience with this team of developers gives us confidence that this won't be an issue. Beyond getting the same functionality on Android as we have in iOS we have some stretch goals that may present some technical challenges. If we reach our stretch goals we will develop them for Android FIRST!",9.0,0,"1 Campaign
Hello Indiegogo community! First, let's introduce ourselves to you. We are TUPLUS, a creative and award-winning luggage design team based in Shanghai and Dallas.

Today most of the luggage in market look similar and work similar. People even confuse their luggage with others at the luggage claim. Therefore we gathered top designers from luxury goods industry and engineering industry and established TUPLUS in 2015. Our design philosophy is to build the coolest and most reliable luggage with unbeatable design and innovation.

Our first generation product is the jaw-dropping TUPLUS X series aluminum carry-on which won the Red Dot Product Design Award and the International Travel Goods Show Innovation Award! People were shocked by every detail of TUPLUS design on that piece! Now, in order to better satisfy your travel needs, we are introducing you our 24'' hardside checked luggage, TUPLUS LINE!
TUPLUS LINE is featured with a precise symmetry design which provides it with identical front and back sides. It's simple, either way.

column2: PC plastic materials with injection modeling technique

column1: Unlike most of the luggage in market, the entire case of LINE was built with injection modeling technique which is more costly but creates a stylish and harder shell. Besides, the precise case design and the best ABS &
column2: PC materials we used add excellent durability to this sleek piece.

column1: Except for reliability, we also want to make sure the luggage in your hand is one of a kind and eye-catching. Both the pop-up extra wide pull rod and the ingenious sliding lock mechanism were created by TUPLUS. You only need to press the handle button to pop out the handle when you are about to start your journey. It cannot be easier to open or close your luggage by just sliding the lock with your finger. Four built-in mechanic hooks will hold the case tightly and seamlessly.

The LINE went through numerous lab tests under both simulated  environments and real travel situations to ensure you will have no concern when carrying it. Either a business trip or a vacation, we got your back!
","Hello Indiegogo community! First, let's introduce ourselves to you. We are TUPLUS, a creative and award-winning luggage design team based in Shanghai and Dallas.

Today most of the luggage in market look similar and work similar. People even confuse their luggage with others at the luggage claim. Therefore we gathered top designers from luxury goods industry and engineering industry and established TUPLUS in 2015. Our design philosophy is to build the coolest and most reliable luggage with unbeatable design and innovation.

Our first generation product is the jaw-dropping TUPLUS X series aluminum carry-on which won the Red Dot Product Design Award and the International Travel Goods Show Innovation Award! People were shocked by every detail of TUPLUS design on that piece! Now, in order to better satisfy your travel needs, we are introducing you our 24'' hardside checked luggage, TUPLUS LINE!
TUPLUS LINE is featured with a precise symmetry design which provides it with identical front and back sides. It's simple, either way.
Made from ABS & PC plastic materials with injection modeling technique

Unlike most of the luggage in market, the entire case of LINE was built with injection modeling technique which is more costly but creates a stylish and harder shell. Besides, the precise case design and the best ABS & PC materials we used add excellent durability to this sleek piece.

Except for reliability, we also want to make sure the luggage in your hand is one of a kind and eye-catching. Both the pop-up extra wide pull rod and the ingenious sliding lock mechanism were created by TUPLUS. You only need to press the handle button to pop out the handle when you are about to start your journey. It cannot be easier to open or close your luggage by just sliding the lock with your finger. Four built-in mechanic hooks will hold the case tightly and seamlessly.
Multiple rigorous lab tests for reliability

The LINE went through numerous lab tests under both simulated  environments and real travel situations to ensure you will have no concern when carrying it. Either a business trip or a vacation, we got your back!",20.0,0,"1 Campaign
FINALLY!  A Light Weight Version of the Revolutionary Shape Flexer® Sunhat!
In 2017, the ""Shape Flexer Sunhat"" took the the sun loving, crowdfunding public by storm to the both on Kickstarter, and on Indigogo!
The feedback and reviews were overwhelmingly positive!

minor problem...

As much as the vast majority of people loved the Shape Flexer, there were a few that found the copper cable make the hat too heavy.

So, we set out to remedy that problem, and designed a version of the Shape Flexer that weighs about 60% of what the original weighs.

 

Even though it weighs 60% of the original Shape Flexer, the Shape Flexer Lite has 100% of the same features!

 

Fold-able, Portable, Pack-able, the Shape Flexer Lite is as resilient and tough as you are!

 

The Shape Flexer Lite's brim will not fold or flop in a head wind of up to 40 mph/65 kph.

 

NO amount of water will harm the Shape Flexer Lite.  It'll hold its shape and not droop even in heavy rain (AND IT FLOATS!).

 

Thanks to the bendable/shape-able brim, you can Shape the Flexer in an UNLIMITED amount of styles!  Here are just a few...

 

The Shape Flexer Lite also comes with an attached/deployable neck cape to use when/if you need some extra neck protection (while gardening, digging, etc.)

 

 

 

Bend the back UP, to prevent the brim from smacking your pack while hiking!

 

If you require some extra ventilation, or have a lot of hair, the Shape Flexer Lite also comes with a partially or fully removable top crown!

 

For the Shape Flexer Lite, we've also designed the crown zipper to be hidden and well covered, as opposed to the exposed zipper of the first Shape Flexer.

 

The Shape Flexer Lite is also 100% Machine Washable AND Machine Dry-able.  No more cleaning your sunhat by hand!

 

The neck cape pocket is also a secure place to store some small valuables like cash, credit cards, or hotel room keys.

 

The Key Change to the Shape Flexer Lite is that the heavy plastic coated copper will now be replaced with a MUCH lighter foam coated wire.

Unlike the copper cable in the original Shape Flexer, the foam wire will be easily replaceable if the need arises.

 

The Zipper around the brim also acts as protective barrier between the stiff brim and obstacles such as bushes, branches, boulders, bark, tree trunks, etc.  This prevents possible scratching and tearing of the outer fabric.

 

We've also changed the main fabric of the hat to a thicker material, and the cape to a thinner material (all UPF 50+ of course!). 

 

We're also now using a thicker foam in the brim than we used with the first Shape Flexer.

 

For those of you who backed the original Shape Flexer Sunhat back in 2017, THANK YOU A MILLION TIMES OVER!  Now that we've ironed out the original problems that we had with the manufacturing, I GUARANTEE you'll be fulfilled MUCH FASTER this time!  Stock has already been pre-ordered to make sure we get fulfillment underway AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.  Plus, just like last time, there will be FREE USA SHIPPING!

Even a ""Heavy Duty Backpacker...""

Can ""Lighten Up"" sometimes!

 

So, stay flexible, stay in shape, and LIGHTEN UP with the Shape Flexer Lite!

 

Take your Pick of Colors

Note: if on the border between sizes, it's usually better to go larger, unless you like a snug fitting hat

 

Attention! ¡Atención! Achtung! Aandacht! Uppmärksamhet!  注意！ 주의!

International Supporters!
• PLEASE don't be scared off by the shipping cost for one hat.
• We realize it's high, but look at the shipping cost for 2, 3, or 4 hats.
• You will find the shipping price per hat for multiple hats is MUCH LOWER than the price for one.
• We recommend making a pledge with friends or family, or getting extra Shape Flexer as gifts to bring the shipping price down.

Risks and challenges

Thanks to all of you AMAZING Backers who took a chance on me, and then waited patiently while I sorted out my numerous manufacturing problems, the risks this time around are VERY minimal. The manufacturer I'm using is on the ball, AND a large amount of stock has been pre-ordered to ensure that backers get fulfilled as soon as possible!

Barring any natural disasters, we'll get people fulfilled MUCH faster than last time.

column4:
>Durable丨 Comfortable丨 No insects or mosquito丨 Potable Eco-friendly

Warm weather has arrived, which means people who have been quarantining for the last three months are itching to go outside.

 

Let’s kick the door, go chase the freedom while the outdoors offer fresh air and unlimited space to social distance as you please You need a little guy to free yourself, this is ETROL for sure!

As we have been working on how to make sure everyone can be more relax and comfortable when they begin a journey.

 

Keep trying and keep moving forward - here it’s the show time!

There’s nothing better than resting in a hammock, enjoying a frosty beverage, and enjoying the warm summer breeze. 

Multi-functional, this is why we here to make sure all your needs for your wonderful trip,long-lasting gears will make our beautiful earth happy as well.

70D Breathable Super Stable Fabric

You will feel comfortable when you lay down, this soft material makes hammock-lounging perfect for anyone, anywhere.

As the same material for parachute , which makes the hammock lighter but safer with qualified load-bearing.

 

Double Sharing Hammock Time

You must have been trying many hammocks, but can you compare each of them to this newbie ETROL with more room.
column5:
> 

This double gives you the option of two people sharing hammock time. This model have a width in around 5 ft when you stretch by the aluminum rods on both sides. In addition to offering a more spacious lounging experience without squeezing.

B3 Mosquito Net

Nothing can be more annoyed than mosquito bite, but also nothing can be effective to prevent those than B3 net. Indeed, nothing can compare the happiness I have during the hammock time.

Nothing can be more annoyed than mosquito bite, but also nothing can be effective to prevent those than B3 net. Indeed, nothing can compare the happiness I have during the hammock time.

Strap Installation :

01. Wrap the strap around the tree (change according to the size of the tree, about 2-3 circles).

02. Use one end of the multi-ring through the other end.

03. Try to tighten the rope.

04. Wait for the hammock installation to be completed, buckle the hammock.

Hammock Installation :

01. Open and install the support rod.

02. Pass it through 4 support nets.

03. Insert the ends into the fixed point.

Find a comfortable outdoors environment, take a hammock, relax and sleep peacefully

FAQ:

Q: What is the max weight capacity of the Pelican Hammock?

A: The max weight capacity is 440 Ibs or 200 Kgs. So Pelican Hammock is strong!

Q: Can you take the mosquito net off?

A: No but you can flip it over and use it without the net.

Q: Will the two shade cloth block the view?

A: Not at all, the radian of the pop-up is works great. It can block the direct light to you but not blocking the view.

Q: If buy now, when will you receive the hammock?

A: Since this event is a form of crowdfunding, ETROL will arrange the production and delivery of pelican hammocks as soon as the amount of crowdfunding is met. Please refer to the crowdfunding rules for a specific time.

ETROL guarantees that all people who support us will receive the goods within 2 months.

 

With one-year quality replacement policy, regardless of any damage we will resend a new hammock for our sincerely caring.

 

We will also use the fund to develop more environmentally friendly, useful outdoor products to support our global environmental protection business.

Our team keeps looking for better products with more outdoor enthusiasts.

 

There is nothing more pleasant than going out and enjoying the nature. We hope that the spirit of exploration and the eco-friendly environment can be shared to everywhere.

 

 To start all over to meet the challenges, to better the earth!

this invention is a result of pursuing our passion for freediving. We wanted to create goggles that overcome the limitations of a mask: that don't require to be equalized, are more hydrodynamic and will let you dive deep and with ease.
 
Hektometer goggles allow you to save up lots of air, without having to give up the comfort and clear visibility of a mask.

 

 

How do Hektometer goggles work:

 

The principle is quite simple: as you descend the silicone membrane placed on the inside of the frame will move towards your eyes, decreasing the volume of the airspace within the goggles. Simultaneously, water will flow through a small hole into the space between the frame and the membrane. On return to the surface the mechanism inverts and the water will flow out again.

 

 

Advantages of Hektometer goggles


1. you won’t have to equalize the mask* any more - its automatic!

2. you will be able to concentrate on the equalization of your ears - mouthfill becomes easy!

3. by using a noseclip you will be able to equalize hands-free - the dream of every freediver!

4. you will be more hydrodynamic - Hektometer goggles create almost no resistance compared to a mask. More importantly, you will gain in efficiency from a streamlined position of your arms due to hands-free equalization

5. you will need less weight - as you won’t have to carry unnecessary air in your lungs, just for equalizing the mask

6. with the same amount of air you will be able to dive deeper - as all the air will be available for equalizing your ears properly

7. you will be able to dive longer
as you can use the total air you inhale at surface

8. you will be more relaxed
as there will be one less problem for you to worry about on your journey

9. equalization will get easier
because you can equalize more often with less force (frenzel technique)

10. mouthfill equalization will become a piece of cake!
mouthfill is the ultimate way to equalize! Thanks to the Hektometer goggles it will become even easier. We recommend it to any depth, even for shallow dives and to absolute beginners.
…and it is the best way to take care of your ears!

11. bearded freedivers will not be annoyed any more by water entering the mask

* in traditional diving you have to equalize the mask while descending, i.e. you have to exhale air into your mask in order to avoid the phenomenon known as mask squeeze, and the subsequent injuring of your eyes. Hektometer goggles avoid all of this with a simple automatic equalizing system.
How do Hektometer goggles work - close up
see how the membrane moves during a short dive to 12 meters:
""No matter if at 10 or at 100 meters, Hektometer goggles allow for beautiful sensations, to be one with the ocean.""    Davide Carrera

Comparison of Hektometer goggles

 

 

 

Design of Hektometer goggles

 

in white (transparent)

 

or in black

in detail:

Freediving mask versus Hektometer goggles

- Comparison of required air volume

 

On an 80 meters dive with a low volume mask you need to take 1170 ccm of air at the surface (130 ccm in the mask + 1040 ccm in your lungs) just for equalizing the mask. This air has to be transferred entirely to the mask and will be compressed at depth (= 9 ATM) to 130 ccm.
With Hektometer goggles instead you start with 32 ccm, that will be reduced to 3,6 ccm at 80 m.
You can use all the air in your lungs for a longer and/or deeper dive.

 

 

Even on a 30 meters dive with a low volume mask you need to take 520 ccm of air at the surface (130 ccm in the mask + 390 ccm in your lungs) just for equalizing the mask. This air has to be transferred entirely to the mask and will be compressed at depth (= 4 ATM) to 130 ccm.
With Hektometer goggles instead you start with 32 ccm, that will be reduced to 8 ccm at 30 m.
Again, you can use all the air in your lungs for a longer and/or deeper dive.

 

 

included:

Hektometer Noseclip

 

The Hektometer noseclip is designed to be hydrodynamic, lightweight and comfortable.
With little force it closes and blocks the nostrils in order to allow either mouthfill or Frenzel equalization.

It is always included and comes with a neck lace.
Hektometer is the natural evolution of being in the water

Commonly Asked Questions

 

Q: What is the difference between fluid goggles and Hektometer goggles?

A: Hektometer goggles contain air inside and have flat lenses, while fluid goggles are filled with water and have strong convex lenses. Therefore, visibility with Hektometers is much better than with fluid goggles. Hektometers have a wide angle of view, while fluid goggles allow only a narrow cone of vision.
Fluid goggles are intended to be used by experienced freedivers, while Hektometers are for all freedivers, experienced and beginners.

Q: What is the difference between a freediving mask and Hektometer goggles?

A: A freediving mask has a bigger air volume which has to be constantly equalized by exhaling air through the nose. Consequently, a mask always has to cover the nose preventing you from using a noseclip. In order to equalize the ears you will have to pinch your nose from time to time. With a mask, mouthfill equalization is difficult and only partially possible.
In contrast Hektometer goggles equalize themselves. They do not cover the nose enabling you to use a noseclip. Mouthfill equalization becomes easy.

Q: How deep can I go with Hektometer goggles?

A: Until now Hektometers were used up to 100 meters / 330 feet (update 11/03/2018:  105.5 meters / 345 feet) by Davide Carrera, reporting still good visibility at such depths. He intends to use them in the near future below 100 meters.
Despite this depth achievements, as every eye cavity is different, we recommend to use them very consciously below 40 meters / 130 feet. If you should experience significant negative pressure at any depth, do not go deeper!
(note: regarding the risk of eye barotrauma we made dry experiments sucking out all of the air through a small hole in the lens in order to simulate unlimited depth. The result was that at a certain point the lens got very closed to the eye and visibility started to be reduced. Going on with air extraction at some point the test subjects instinctively closed their eyelids. The membrane and the eyelids filled up all the remaining space behind the lens, a bit like an octopus in a bottle. In case of the test subjects a barotrauma seemed to be impossible. Nevertheless, as every eye cavity is different, we cannot guarantee this. We recommend to proceed carefully at depth as these tests might not be valid for each and every eye cavity, especially skinny and deep ones.)

Q: How good is visibility with Hektometer goggles?

A: Visibility is the same or better than with a mask as Hektometer goggles have high quality lenses in acrylic glass. However it is essential to clean the lenses for good visibility.

Q: How do Hektometers feel at depth?

A: Up to around 30 meters / 100 feet you will almost not notice them. Below that you might feel the air space decreasing more and more.

Q: The lenses look small. How wide is the angle of vision with Hektometer goggles?

A: As the lenses are very close to your eyes the angle of vision is wider than that of a mask, a bit like contact lenses in comparison to glasses. Depending on the depth of your eye cavity the angle of vision might be even unlimited (as in the case of contact lenses).

Q: Is it difficult to switch from a mask to Hektometer goggles?

A: You just have to take your time to get used to them and you will benefit of their advantages. Some improved their personal bests on the first trial, some needed half a day to get used to the new sensations.

Q: Where can I try Hektometer goggles?

A: Right now you can try them in Italy, at Y-40, the world’s deepest pool in the world (www.y-40.com, Marco Mardollo), in Egypt, at dahab freedivers (www.dahabfreedivers.com, Miguel Lozano) and in Spain, at Apnea Canarias (www.apneacanarias.com, Miguel Lozano). More places are intended to follow.

Q: Are Hektometer goggles suitable for spearfishing?

A: Of course, especially for deep spearfishing. Vision is the same or better than with a mask. In addition to the already mentioned advantages, unlike a mask, they never create air bubbles which might disturb the fish.

Q: How resistant are the goggles?

A: The lenses are very fragile! We do not recommend to press on them as they could pop out and the membrane might get damaged. Otherwise the goggles have a good resistance.

Q: Are the lenses scratch resistant?

A: No. You should keep them always protected from any sharp objects. Best is to keep them in their box when not in use.

Q: Can I unmount the lenses?

A: Essentially not. It is very difficult to remount the lenses, and in addition the probability to damage the membrane is very high.

However in case it happened here is a video that shows how to remount the lenses: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=98B5FKAK1Z0

Q: How can I prevent fogging of Hektometer goggles?

A: We recommend to spit saliva on the clean and dry (!) lenses and distribute it carefully with a finger trying not to touch the lens. Then rinse the goggles shortly in sea or sweet water.
This “saliva coating” will last for an entire day if not washed out while taking off the goggles or if dried by the sun.

If during a dive session you have accidentally washed the “saliva coating” away, you can simply lick the lens with your tongue, although this method does not work as good as the dry application above.
Fingerprints or grease on the lens are always a problem for adhesion of any anti fog.
Therefore after diving always wash the lens with hot water and a dishwashing soap. This will be beneficial for better vision as well as for adhesion of the “saliva coating”.

As the distance between the eye and the lens is very small, we do not recommend commercial anti fog solutions as they might irritate your eyes.

Q: Do you plan to apply a permanent anti fog coating in the future?

A: We evaluated different anti fog coatings with a negative result, especially because they resulted not to be permanent. If somebody knows about a permanent solution we would be more than happy to apply it in future versions of the goggles.

Q: What is mouthfill equalization?

A: Mouthfill equalization is a method to equalize the ears when descending. Basically, you fill your mouth with air and exert a slight pressure on the Eustachian tubes in order to keep them open.

Q: Do I have to be an advanced freediver for mouthfill equalization?

A: Absolutely not. We managed to teach mouthfill in a few minutes to absolute beginners. On the contrary, for experienced freedivers it may be more difficult to learn, as they will have to get used to a different feeling.

Q: How do I make mouthfill equalization?

A: See explanation below. We are planning to post an instructional video in the future. Follow our youtube channel.

Q: When and how was the idea for Hektometer goggles born?

A: The idea was born in 2010 during a master class with William Trubridge (CNF world record holder, 102 m). In this discipline (Constant weight No Fins) it is especially annoying having to use your hands in order to equalize your ears. Years with many failing prototypes followed, until in 2016 a relatively simple version started to work.

Q: Are Hektometer goggles protected by a patent?

A: Yes, the principle of membrane goggles is protected by several international patents.

Q: What makes the Hektometer noseclip so special?

A: It is designed to be hydrodynamic, lightweight and comfortable.
According to some freedivers, it is the best noseclip out there.

 

Shipping, taxes, etc

Q: How much is shipping?

A: Shipping to
Europe                       11 euro
Rest of the world   16 euro

All shipping is insured and can be followed by a tracking number.

In alternative you can also pass by personally and
visit us in the beautiful historic center of Naples, Italy.
If you want to do so choose “Antarctica” as the country to ship.
Note: Of course we do not ship to Antarctica :-) It is just a workaround in order not to charge shipping.

Q: How much is shipping for several items?

A: You pay only one shipment. On your additional items please choose “Antarctica” as the country to ship in order not to be charged for shipping.
Note: Of course we do not ship to Antarctica :-) It is just a workaround in order not to charge shipping.

Q: Can I change my shipping address after I have paid?

A: Yes, you can. Follow the instructions at: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Q: How much are taxes?

A: Inside the European Union (EU) there are no additional taxes.
Outside the EU you might have to pay an import tax when you get the goggles.
However in many cases this will not happen.
In any case Hektometer is not responsible for additional taxes in your country.

Risks

Q: Is there a risk that you will not manage to deliver?

A: No. Differently to many other crowdfunding projects, we are already through the prototype and testing phase, the final mold has been made and production of 800 pairs is completed.

How to learn mouthfill equalization

(0) lock your nose with a noseclip

(make a first try at home sitting straight on a chair.
then try at sea, in vertical position, with the head out of the water)

(1) with a humming sound (mmmhh) (nasal: directed to your nose) fill your nose, mouth and cheeks with air (not too much in the beginning)
(2) block the air by stopping abruptly the mmmhh-sound
(3) feel how the slight pressure opens your ears (you can touch your upper nostrils, which should be inflated a bit by the pressure in the nose)
(4) while simply keeping the slight pressure (meaning that your eustachian tubes are open) pull yourself slowly down a weighted line or an anchor chain.

proceed very slowly, first to 1 m, then to 2 m, then 5 m.
Congratulations! You have done your first mouthfill equalization!

If you want to go deeper and you feel comfortable with the above exercise, you can stop at 3 meters, head down, and fill up your cheeks, following the same procedure (1) to (4), always with the humming sound. With the air in your mouth you can now go easily to 10 meters.
If you fill up your cheeks at 10 meters you can go down to 30 etc.

Important:
If you feel the slightest pressure or pain in your ears, turn immediately back to the surface!
Do not go for depth. Search for relaxation and depth will follow!
The secret to mouthfill is to be completely relaxed while keeping a slight pressure on your ears.

The technique is a lot simpler than you would think. It is just a matter of mentally getting used to it.

","this invention is a result of pursuing our passion for freediving. We wanted to create goggles that overcome the limitations of a mask: that don't require to be equalized, are more hydrodynamic and will let you dive deep and with ease. Hektometer goggles allow you to save up lots of air, without having to give up the comfort and clear visibility of a mask.  How do Hektometer goggles work: The principle is quite simple: as you descend the silicone membrane placed on the inside of the frame will move towards your eyes, decreasing the volume of the airspace within the goggles. Simultaneously, water will flow through a small hole into the space between the frame and the membrane. On return to the surface the mechanism inverts and the water will flow out again.  Advantages of Hektometer goggles1. you won’t have to equalize the mask* any more - its automatic!2. you will be able to concentrate on the equalization of your ears - mouthfill becomes easy!3. by using a noseclip you will be able to equalize hands-free - the dream of every freediver!4. you will be more hydrodynamic - Hektometer goggles create almost no resistance compared to a mask. More importantly, you will gain in efficiency from a streamlined position of your arms due to hands-free equalization5. you will need less weight - as you won’t have to carry unnecessary air in your lungs, just for equalizing the mask6. with the same amount of air you will be able to dive deeper - as all the air will be available for equalizing your ears properly7. you will be able to dive longeras you can use the total air you inhale at surface8. you will be more relaxedas there will be one less problem for you to worry about on your journey9. equalization will get easierbecause you can equalize more often with less force (frenzel technique)10. mouthfill equalization will become a piece of cake!mouthfill is the ultimate way to equalize! Thanks to the Hektometer goggles it will become even easier. Andrea Castillo: I been climbing for 12 years. I started competing indoors with the Ecuadorian Climbing Federation but I realized that my passion was to climb outdoors. I love traveling for climbing. I have experience climbing and competing in Colombia, Peru, Bolivia, Argentina, Chile and Cuba. Climbing is my way of life
column2: I always have climbing projects in mind and I like to challenge myself physically and mentally.

column1: This is the first project of the kind, so I want to promote and support climbing in my own country.

Mafer Cevallos: I started climbing 15 years ago but in the last 7 years, climbing has become my way of life. I travel to climb and climb to live. I have experience climbing in Colombia and the US where I have done 3 road trips from Tahoe CA to Denver CO. I love climbing internationally but now it’s time to promote climbing in my home country. Currently, I am empower to teach climbing for women and I am proud and excited to have this project.
•Ecuador has open and develop new areas of climbing but they are underuse
•Ecuador is still a chauvinist society that needs programs to empower women.

• We are going to create a Big Audiovisual Project which means. We are going to have several people filming the roc trip for a month. We also have the expenses of the trip and logistics,women's clinic events,etc.Therefore, we need funding for it $40.000
• We are going to show the episodes in youtube with a backup bitacora of the places. A final documentary will be also presented.

• This is an adventure trip where in each episode, we will show you : where to go, where to stay, what routes are available,and communities that surround them, etc. The idea is that people that travel to Ecuador are going to have all the necessary information about places to climb,camp or visit.

• People that help us raise money will get amazing gifts such as: T-shirts, stickers,rock climbing courses, rock climbing and mountaineering trips, homestay opportunities, Ecuador tourism advise, diverse souvenirs from Ecuador,advertisment.

column3: '> We are going to reach our entire goal one way or another because  we believe in it and
column5: '>this is one of the kind projects in Ecuador

column1: • The project will contribute to the local and international travel community
• Ecuadorian female climber's videos are going to motivate the local communities
• We will do first Ascent in many of the routes in Ecuador
• Promote local economy and community based tourism
The roc trip will be in December/January (34 days). We have four months to raise the money. The economy in Ecuador is on crisis therefore we are reaching internationally.
• Follow and like us on facebook, instagram and twitter. Help us spread the word
• You can share to other people that are interested in funding it.

What We Need & What You Get

We are going to create a Big Audiovisual Project which means. We are going to have several people filming the roc trip for a month. We also have the expenses of the trip and logistics,women's clinic events,etc.Therefore, we need funding for it $40.000
We are going to show the episodes in youtube with a backup bitacora of the places. A final documentary will be also presented.

This is an adventure trip where in each episode, we will show you : where to go, where to stay, what routes are available,and communities that surround them, etc. The idea is that people that travel to Ecuador are going to have all the necessary information about places to climb,camp or visit.

People that help us raise money will get amazing gifts such as: T-shirts, stickers,rock climbing courses, rock climbing and mountaineering trips, homestay opportunities, Ecuador tourism advise, diverse souvenirs from Ecuador,advertisment.
We are going to reach our entire goal one way or another because  we believe in it and this is one of the kind projects in Ecuador
The project will contribute to the local and international travel community
Ecuadorian female climber's videos are going to motivate the local communities
We will do first Ascent in many of the routes in Ecuador
Promote local economy and community based tourism
The roc trip will be in December/January (34 days). We have four months to raise the money. The economy in Ecuador is on crisis therefore we are reaching internationally.
Follow and like us on facebook, instagram and twitter. Help us spread the word
You can share to other people that are interested in funding it.

Is your business trip still like this?

Let’s See How Easy Your Business Trip Would Be with Lemore

Extra large capacity

column3: showinfo=0"">

column1:
Rolling Bag Sleeve (open fastener)

High Quality Backpack

Tarpaulin and Nylon Dobby are weather resistant and extremely durable to ensure your gear stays safe from the elements. Water repellent zipper is used to performance better in the The seams of the bag aren’t completely waterproof, but you certainly won’t worry about the little rain. Moreover, Lemore is designed with interior pouches that are shockproof and capable of keeping your gear from damage.

About the Nylon/PU

YKK zipper
column4:
High Quanlity

Our partner with backpack experts in China​

column1:
Lemore Plus

Lemore standard/ Pro​

Ergonomics design

weight distributiing system

There’s nothing worse that showing up to a meeting, taking off your bag and finding a sweaty outline of the bag on your shirt. With the Lemore, we wanted to keep cool in every situation, so we built in an airflow system that makes sure your skin isn’t drowning in sweat as you pull up to the meeting or peel away from the gym. The adjustable straps, make the Lemore comfortable, safe and light on your back.
Latest update: ALL BACKERS will get travel set including wash bag, bundle pocket (draw string bag), laundry bag and backpack cover free of charge.

Team story

We’re a team of designers who travel often and far for work. In our years of traveling for business, we grew tired of spinning luggage and ill-equipped backpacks better suited to singular activities, like daily commuting or long-term travel. What we really wanted was something that could satisfy our short-term business travel needs - light, minimal storage for formal attire in a cool, but office-appropriate style - while also giving us the space and compartmentalization we need to experience the new destinations we constantly find ourselves in. In the end, we’ve come up with the Lemore Business Travel Backpack, which we believe is ideally suited for anyone’s business travel needs. We hope you agree!

 

Risks and challenges

We’re confident in our abilities to deliver the goods on time and to your highest expectations, but we also want to be clear that there are always risks when launching such a product. We’re going to work hard to minimize these risks by closely coordinating with the manufacturer and running quality control checks throughout the manufacturing process. We will not rush through these steps and will tackle them carefully, one by one. Through it all, we’ll be completely transparent with you, sharing updates and making sure you’re always in the loop. Our target shipping is September 2017.

LOVE IS FOUND BETWEEN GRATITUDE AND GENEROSITY by Don Miguel Ruiz


About the Adventure
The Generosity on Wheels will be a charity cycling adventure like no other which will take me
through all Central American countries, plus Mexico with only <b>pockets full of

gratitude (Currency = Gratitude).

It would be about trusting people and getting to know the generosity of people.

But not just that. There will be a good balance between giving and receiving.

My intentions are pure and simple, yet powerful - I want inspire and be inspired by others, and raise awareness by moving beyond fear, stepping into the unknown to welcome the greatest growth of all.
We, humans, are meant to live our lives through joy and love. Nothing else shouldn't
matter but unfortunately we are being overshadowed by fear that's dominating

majority of our choices.

With this epic adventure I want fundraise for charity and to spread the word that traveling solo, and as a solo female traveler, can be done safely and with the beautiful support of the people that we meet along the way.
We are ever expanding beings with a great ability to live in harmony with the Mother Nature and with each other! Sometimes we forget or dismiss what's important.
I will not just cycle through the wild beauty of Central America
in search of excitement and self-growth
column2: I will also be raising valuable

column1:
fundraising dollars towards charity.

I have a big desire to give back to an orphanage, SA Perekodu in Estonia, where I spent the first 7 amazing years of my life in loving care.

I would
love to show my support towards those abandoned children who are in need of a

beautiful and loving environment to grow up.

NOTE: The charity has changed to Panamanian and everything is involved around bettering the lives of children in San Jose Malambo Orphanage, located in Panama.

The Route

Starting Point: Panama City
Embarking Date: April 2015
Cycling through: Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, Honduras, El Salvador, Guatemala, Belize, Mexico
contributions would get me a roadworthy bicycle and the necessary gear to keep

column5:
/>

Below you can find items that are listed in my bucket list:
column6:
>

SPONSORSHIPS: In the meantime I am also looking into sponsorships opportunities. If you or  your business is interested becoming on as a sponsor then feel free to get in touch with me by sending me a message.

Risks &

column1: <li>I will rely on the generosity of local people for food &amp
column2: water, and maybe even accommodation or seek help from Mother Nature

column1: <li>Basic Spanish. <i>NOTE: learning and getting better with speaking/listening this beautiful language day after day

I will stay out of danger zones and out of trouble by making good conscious choices but most importantly I will listen and trust my intuition!

I know that I am able to overcome all the obstacles because taking risks and challenges has become part of my nature, and I know that.

The Impact

One person can make a difference! We can all do that by starting at home or in our community.

Our awakened minds will gradually help to shift the consciousness of our closest ones. Take this leap of faith!
THE BIGGEST GROWTH LIES ON THE BORDER OF CHALLENGES AND SUPPORT by John Demartini

It says it all. There is never a positive without a negative, saint without a sinner, dark without lightness and so on. There is a fine balance in everything! When we see it then we come to a point of gratitude and we start embracing both sides. The outcome is unconditional love.

I want to offer something very special to locals which is beyond materialism.
<li>My time in helping them with their everyday duties
<li>Handing out handwritten hang tag thank-you notes made of recycled paper
<li>Learning some card (or other) tricks to break the ice

From my experience I can tell that poorest people are the most generous people I have ever met in my life.

If my actions and words will improve someones life, which I know they will, then my mission on this earth is accomplished.
column2:
>WE ARE ALL ONE

I want to light up hearts and put smiles on people's faces!

Hungry Traveler - Elsa Saks


Elsa, 29, is a World traveler from Estonia who has traveled through many beautiful parts of the World – Australia, 6 countries in Asia and 4 countries in South America.

Before she embarked on the road less traveled she was making a career as a Systems Business Analyst.

Over time, Elsa decided to step into the unknown to see what the World had to offer. She was extremely excited to discover her adventurous spirit that was longing to get out.
column3: >DON'T WORRY, BE HAPPY by Bob Marley

column1: I am a true believer that fear is an illusion created by our society.
generous contributions will be used only for the preparation of Generosity on

Wheels travels, to make this epic adventure come alive.

In return I will
endeavor to make your generous contribution fly high and far, through words and

actions, in a bigger scale.

NB: But do know that all the goods, after the adventure, will be kept or donated to people in need and acknowledged accordingly with an exception - if there's another mutual agreement between both parties (sponsorships) I will follow this through.

Grab a REWARD (perk)!

I have created some wicked perks to express my deepest gratitude to you. Check them out on the right sidebar!

Just think how much joy a handwritten thank-you note or a postcard, made specially for you, could bring to your doorstep. Or your name on the T-Shirt which will be seen and even get on to many photos and videos.
Help me to spread the word by making some noise in your network of friends, SHARING the campaign. This would go a long way in helping to build a steady foundation for the upcoming adventure.

than happy to recognize this support.
