I am Vytautas Jankulskas, passionate Traveler and Photographer from Lithuania. Last 4 years I was intensively travelling around the world.

column5: >During this Time I managed to hitchhike more than 100 000 Km in 37 different countries in 3 continents. On the way i did various photography projects and I was published in some newspapers.

column1: My Photographs from Remote village in Indonesia in Dailymail.
Interview about me and Photographs from photo series about Jakarta’s Slums (Lithuanian Only)

I want to hitchhike from my home country Lithuania all the way to Indonesia and create photo book of people that helped or inspired me one way or another. That's why the books will be called Many Faces of Kindness.

column2: >I want to show everyone that the world is not that scary place as we think it is, the world is full of kind and friendly people.
>I will hitchhike through countries like Turkey, Iran, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, China, Vietnam, Cambodia, Thailand, Malaysia and Indonesia, Maybe even more.
column3: >All this trip is gonna be done by Hitchhiking. I will rarely stay in hotels, only if its necessary. I will be camping, staying with locals and using Couchsurfing.

column2: >This trip should take me from 6 to 12 months.
>The route will look more or less like this:
>After the trip I will come back home to Lithuania, select the best portraits from the trip and create  Photo Book.

column5: >Examples of what kind of Photos I am going to take on this journey and what photos you can expect in this photo book:
>The book will contain 50-80 portraits. Mostly it's gonna be faces, with a little description of the person in Photographs.
>The exact shape and size of the book is not decided yet, but I will update you as soon as I will know.
>I will also create blog and I will update it regularly so you can follow my trip and know where I am and what I do.

column1: This trip and book no way can happen without you, awesome people!
Really hope you can help me to fund this trip so we can create this Photo Book together.
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me: vytautas@jankulskas.com
I am Vytautas Jankulskas, passionate Traveler and Photographer from Lithuania. Last 4 years I was intensively travelling around the world.
During this Time I managed to hitchhike more than 100 000 Km in 37 different countries in 3 continents. On the way i did various photography projects and I was published in some newspapers.
My Photographs from Remote village in Indonesia in Dailymail.
Interview about me and Photographs from photo series about Jakarta’s Slums (Lithuanian Only)

I want to hitchhike from my home country Lithuania all the way to Indonesia and create photo book of people that helped or inspired me one way or another. That's why the books will be called Many Faces of Kindness.
I want to show everyone that the world is not that scary place as we think it is, the world is full of kind and friendly people.

I will hitchhike through countries like Turkey, Iran, Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, Kyrgyzstan, China, Vietnam, Cambodia, Thailand, Malaysia and Indonesia, Maybe even more. All this trip is gonna be done by Hitchhiking. I will rarely stay in hotels, only if its necessary. I will be camping, staying with locals and using Couchsurfing.
This trip should take me from 6 to 12 months.
The route will look more or less like this:
After the trip I will come back home to Lithuania, select the best portraits from the trip and create  Photo Book.
Examples of what kind of Photos I am going to take on this journey and what photos you can expect in this photo book:
The book will contain 50-80 portraits. Mostly it's gonna be faces, with a little description of the person in Photographs.
The exact shape and size of the book is not decided yet, but I will update you as soon as I will know.
I will also create blog and I will update it regularly so you can follow my trip and know where I am and what I do.
Where your contributed money will go
To edit and print photo book
This trip and book no way can happen without you, awesome people!
Really hope you can help me to fund this trip so we can create this Photo Book together.
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me: vytautas@jankulskas.com

As a mechanical engineer my mission is to create really useful tools for humanity. I do believe the ioCamper is the one. When I came up with the idea of ioCamper many people said it was impossible... Anyway, for me ""impossible"" is just a word, it means no more or no less than the other words... My favourite saying is: "" I didn't know it was impossible, so I've done it"" This leads me day by day, and will continue ‘til the end of time.

Just take a look around and see how many vans are around you, and all of them are a potential motorhome, if you think about the advantage of the ioCamper. If you don't have a van, you can get one from your workplace maybe or borrow it from your family or friends. There are many options... With the ioCamper a camping holiday will be easily available for many more people all over the world.

I always dreamed -like many others- to buy or build a caravan or a motorhome to enjoy the freedom with my family. When my son asked me to go for a camping holiday, I decided to make it for him unforgettable. We could have rented a tent, a caravan or I could modify my old van to a motorhome, but I wanted more flexibility, more space, and more comfort. In addition, I wanted to keep my 9 seater van's original functionality.  Keeping these preferences in mind, I came up with the idea of ioCamper. I found the best local automation, electrical and technical experts and we spent thousands of hours in my small workshop over the last 2 years. And now I'm really proud to introduce to you the ioCamper. We found that the ioCamper could be a solution for many other families who are in the same shoes as us.

We created this campaign to make the ioCamper available all over the world. To reach this we have to industrialize the production. With your help we can take the camping holiday to a new level and many families could discover the beauty of nature with the ioCamper loaded in a normal van. We appreciate your support in advance! For our backers we are going to send as a gift a premium quality T-shirt with our ioCamper logo on it. Find it on the perk site.

The main benefit of the ioCamper is that the small size closed box can be put into almost any existing van. You do NOT need to transform your van to a motorhome spending huge amounts of money, and do NOT need to modify anything on your van. The only thing you need to do is to screw down the fixing plates for safe transportation (provided with ioCamper) to the floor of the cargo. So, with ioCamper, you won't lose your van's original functionality and you'll be able to carry goods or people in the van as normal in the future. ioCamper also offers great additional usage possibilities - you can use it as a standalone apartment in your courtyard, or as a fishing bungalow, or many other ways. Perhaps you want to invite your friend or family members but you don't have enough space. Just open the ioCamper in your garden and use it as a small guest-house.
• What kind of VAN can be loaded with ioCamper?

The standard model has a size of 2.5 * 1.3 * 1.7 m (l * w * h), which can be fitted to any L1 H2 (or bigger) van such as Fiat Ducato, Citroen Jumper, Peugeot Boxer, Renault Expert, Iveco Daily, Volkswagen Crafter, Mercedes Sprinter, etc …
• Do you need any skills or training to use the ioCamper?
No. Simply follow the user guide. The process is operated manually or by a mobile device which is connected to ioCamper's own Wi-Fi network, such as a mobile phone, tablet or laptop.
• How long does it take to open and use it?
The apartment can be used within 5 to 10 minutes, depending on which way you want to use the ioCamper.

You can choose between 3 different height sizes depending on your van (H1, H2 or H3), and also the appearance of the ioCamper (modern, vintage, country, summer style). Of course, we'll be able to customize the sizes in the future on demand.

Using all my free time I made a lot of 3D plans on my computer that were constantly built on one to another. The picture in my head and PC screen was cleansed from day to day regarding the feasibility of my idea. I found nearly the 20th version good enough to show to my family and my closest friends. I asked their opinion about its shape and usability...

Based on the latest designs, I created a working, realistic 2:1 scale model in 3 months. I built the most important operational features into the model. Based on the experience gained during the construction and operation of the model I fine-tuned the prototype plans...
I I rented a right-sized workshop and found the best partners to build the prototype. My team members are an IT programmer, an electrical technician, a mechanic technician, and an finance adviser.
We obtained the international patent for the ioCamper as a fully-comfort apartment house, with its unique opening technique.
We would like to raise as much financial support as needed for serial production with crowdfunding.
Subject to a successful Indiegogo project, a workshop of the right size must be equipped with the necessary equipment and tools. Then we need to find the skilled employees for successful production.

We need further development on the prototype and will build a second one, to apply the learnings from the last 2 years. We have to equip a proper size workshop with tools and the necessary precision equipment for the industrial production.

There will be a basic size ioCamper which fits to an average van but we understand not all vans are the same. We will be ready to build custom ioCampers to customer specifications based on their individual van.

We are half-way on our road. We worked hard in the last two years and faced up to many challenges during the prototype's design and construction. We are ready to work more to reach our dreams and goals.
Selling our product world-wide is a challenging task. We are willing to make contracts with manufacturers and distributors on each Continent.

As a mechanical engineer my mission is to create really useful tools for humanity. I do believe the ioCamper is the one. When I came up with the idea of ioCamper many people said it was impossible... Anyway, for me ""impossible"" is just a word, it means no more or no less than the other words... My favourite saying is: "" I didn't know it was impossible, so I've done it"" This leads me day by day, and will continue ‘til the end of time.

Just take a look around and see how many vans are around you, and all of them are a potential motorhome, if you think about the advantage of the ioCamper. Based on the latest designs, I created a working, realistic 2:1 scale model in 3 months. I built the most important operational features into the model. Based on the experience gained during the construction and operation of the model I fine-tuned the prototype plans...
I I rented a right-sized workshop and found the best partners to build the prototype. My team members are an IT programmer, an electrical technician, a mechanic technician, and an finance adviser.
We obtained the international patent for the ioCamper as a fully-comfort apartment house, with its unique opening technique.
We would like to raise as much financial support as needed for serial production with crowdfunding.
Subject to a successful Indiegogo project, a workshop of the right size must be equipped with the necessary equipment and tools. Then we need to find the skilled employees for successful production.

We need further development on the prototype and will build a second one, to apply the learnings from the last 2 years. We have to equip a proper size workshop with tools and the necessary precision equipment for the industrial production.

There will be a basic size ioCamper which fits to an average van but we understand not all vans are the same. We will be ready to build custom ioCampers to customer specifications based on their individual van.

We are half-way on our road. We worked hard in the last two years and faced up to many challenges during the prototype's design and construction. We are ready to work more to reach our dreams and goals.
Selling our product world-wide is a challenging task. We are willing to make contracts with manufacturers and distributors on each Continent.

I recently completed an Everest Base Camp trek with 3 fellow trekkers (my son Adam, my niece Alix, and her adventurous friend Keshvar) through Himalayan Glacier (Nepal) trekking company. Our trek guide, Dev Giri (""Giri""), led us on our high altitude journey (5,545 meters/18,192 ft), encouraging our heart and souls and our exhausted bodies, keeping us absolutely healthy and intact throughout our 13 day trek.  It was truly a 'once in a lifetime' experience, thanks to his mature, intelligent and caring guidance through some very difficult climbing days. 

Giri has been a trekking guide for >
column2: 25 years.  The 7.8-magnitude quake which struck Nepal on April 25, 2015, killing nearly 9,000 people, reduced his modest brick house to rubble. While he and his wife and children (a 17 year old son and 19 year old daughter) were lucky to escape without any physical harm (unlike some of their family and friends, many who perished), their small house was totally destroyed. Giri and his family are now living in 2 tents  (tent tarps provided courtesy of the Nepal government). The Nepal Reconstruction Authority (NRA) has promised a $2000 per-person hardship grant, but so far, earthquake victims have only received US $150 per person in compensation. Tourism in Nepal remains down by >
column3:
50% over prior years, so Giri's income as a trekking guide has greatly diminished. As the primary family earner, he is desperately trying to rebuild his home to literally put a roof over his family's head. 

My trekking companions and I would like to raise as much $ as possible to help Giri rebuild a one story house: It will cost Giri @ US $25,000 to accomplish this. 

While his home was destroyed, his humble spirit and belief in the goodness of life has remained strong and unwavering. ""Life is hard but not terrible since my family and I have each other and the kindnesses of others to help us"", Giri told me. Important to note that temperatures vary in the valleys surrounding Kathmandu during the year--while days can be hot (up to 90 degrees Fahrenheit) during the day, the temperature can severely drop into the 30s  at night. Monsoon season (June through Sept.) brings drenching rains.  Giri and his family (along with thousands of other Nepalese citizens), while clearly 'made of hearty stock',  struggle to just stay relatively warm and dry year round. And he is away from home when guiding treks (up to 15 days at a time) and he worries about his family's safety and security when he is away--tent living is harsh under the best of conditions (no sanitation, running water, etc.)

We are hoping that you will open your heart to lend support this wonderful man's plight. No contribution is too small! Your contribution of $5 or $10 (or more, if you can afford it) will go directly to Giri and his family. Our team will support all costs associated with wiring funds to Giri in Nepal.THANK YOU FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION.

column1: The campaign will help develop the Byurakan community in an innovative, responsible and sustainable way by collecting natural water melting from snow-capped Mount Aragats to create a new experience for visitors.

First, it brings “Responsible Agricultural Travel” to one of Armenia’s famous mountainous villages so visitors can enjoy first-hand experiences with host families. The project will enable about 25 households to be involved by opening their doors so visitors can experience village life and it will employ some 20 young people in newly created jobs.

Second, it creates the innovative ""Magic Dream"" glass domes atop a new reservoir. The reservoir will irrigate about 10 hectares of community gardens in August, when temperatures soar and water is at a premium.

This unique place will give visitors the opportunity for an incredible experience. Once filled, the reservoir pond will be stocked with indigenous fish and attractive to area wildlife. Adapting glass houses over the water will allow visitors to leisurely watch the water, mountain and stars in breathtaking vistas of our magical mountainous environment.

Visitors can take part in specially designed tourist packages around the four peaks of Mount Aragats, Amberd Fortress, ancient churches, unique hikes to seldom seen monuments and archeological secrets, the Astrological Observatory, the Art Academy, Byurakan Studios, a local potter or woodworker, and more. They can also help local women dry fruit and other favorite delicacies, milk cows, taste lavash right from a traditional oven, watch Armenian pasta being made.

Since 2014, young people from living and working in Byurakan have been initiating tourism development programs focused on the production and development of agricultural commodities, including Chir’s House, strawberry production in the transition to organic certification, as well as the production of honey and a tourism welcome center. They also have run agriculturally and environmentally oriented camps for children and youth ages 6 to 16.

We need 3,000 people to join us by booking their vacation in advance with a 50% discount. Doing so will make the entire project a reality and create even more opportunities for our young people to continue to live and work right here at home.

The total cost of implementation is approximately $250,000. We already have $100,000 of the total in the form of professional engineering and construction for the reservoir, government reviews and approvals, work with host families, skills trainings for youth, and more. About 30 young people are also actively involved, carrying out various tasks such as organizing community meetings, communication and working with other area businesses.
The missing amount is $150,000, which will be spent on the construction of the reservoir (3,000-4,000 meters cube) and the preparation and installation of the glass domes for visitors.
People who cannot organize their holidays with us but who believe in the realization of our project can  join in the following ways:
• Donate $10 and get a special stamp, your name will be engraved on glass that will be installed near the entrance.
• Donate $20 and you will be receive a bracelet made by women from the rural community to symbolize this initiative, and your name will be engraved on glass that will be installed at the entrance.
• Donate $100, $500 or $1,000 to become a special partner in this social development project for Byurakan, and your name will be engraved on glass that will be installed near the entrance.
If we succeed in raising 50% or more of the amount, we will a create a special fund to  continue raising the balance until we realize this dream.

If we only collect up to 50%, the money will be invested directly into the families who will serve as hosts for visitors to ensure they have the knowledge and skills to make it a memorable experience in Byurakan.
If you know other people who are ready to help us spread our idea, it also will be very helpful for us .
We consider it a courageous challenge to launch such an initiative in our rural community and we look forward to everyone's support in reaching for the stars in Byurakan.

With my experience of climbing in US, Norway, Italy, France, Switzerland, Iran and Georgia and skiing in all over Armenian and Great Caucasus range for many years, more like ever now, I have a strong feeling that I must do much more to rise the climbing and backcountry skiing activities in Armenia to the next level,  to make it well known for rock climbers and freeride skiers around the world.

I started climbing and skiing in Armenia since 2004. In 2008 I founded Up The Rocks club and in 2014 I co-founded Armenian Alpine Club SNGO. For many years we have been developing climbing and backcountry skiing in Armenia based on our enthusiasm. Under my initiative and management there have been organized numerous international and local events like Armenian Climbing Festivals (in 2009, 2011 and 2013), Armenan Climbing Cup, Rock Us in the Caucasus with American and Iranian Alpine Clubs, Armenian teams in international climbing camps in Norway and Gerogia. I have set up numerous climbing and skiing routes, created topos (climbing maps). With support of Daniel Domongo and Karen Marutyan I had built the first climbing gym in Armenia.

We have had numerous publications in famous magazines and website as well, like in Rock and Ice. Yet all this is still very little and slow compared to what I can do, which is so close to be realized.

Along with all this the rock climbing and alpine skiing is my profession as a mountain guide and tour operator. So the other side of this project is to aid me to drastically increase my guiding business which will make me self sufficient, free and independent to soak into climbing and skiing professionally and act like an artist to withdraw from this the best and the most. At this point it's obvious that the most of my income will be put back into the development of climbing and skiing in Armenia as always, it's a spiral cycle in my concept.

Assessing all the work for this project, I can tell that this is no longer to be done with an enthusiasm anymore.  It goes extremely slow without funds. I can't have much expectations from government neither from grants. This is a perfect and sufficient business plan but even with this perspective I had very hard times trying to get business loans from banks without any success.

So here is where your support to this funding is important and we'll do it together! This project is not only to make Armenia more popular among worldwide climbers and freeride skiers, to drive more tourists in Armenia and to improve my guiding business..  this is also important for the local youth who have slowly integrated into climbing and skiing during last few years.  This is to rise the bar high in Armenia, to open a space for them in these activities, so they would have motivation and stimulus to improve faster, rather than only watching high level of climbing and skiing in internet thinking that this is far away from from Armenia..
To Rise the adventure in Armenia to the next level I need $15.000. Here I'll be very clear with you in the breakdown:
• First things first, Indiegogo platform fees, if the goal is reached about 8% of it ($1200) will go there.
<li>$5000 will go directly into the projects like
column2: expedition expenses (included covering the expenses of skiing/climbing buddies who come to support the project by volunteering bases), expenses to pay the professional staff who come to assist the production process with their equipment, and as well for covering expenses of purchasing needed equipment during the process. $500 of these money will go into building a website with full information of services I will provide and online booking page.

column1: • $4000 will go for buying a car to be independent and mobile to drive wherever and whenever needed.
• $4800 will go to supply my financially to make me well to do on upcoming seven months while I will act like dedicated artist as a project manager, climber, skier and filmmaker.
What will you get if this amazing project is realized?

• For each donated $100 you will get one guided day with me in Armenia! It can be rock climbing, hiking or ski-touring/free-riding.  This will include the transportation cost as well, but the meals, accommodation and other expenses you will have to carry additionally. For each $150 you may have the same service in Georgia!  You can have multiple days of guided program according your donation.
• For donation above $50 you will get an ""Up The Rocks"" unique T-shirt.
• For donation up to $49 you will get my big appreciation and good energy sent back to you!
What if this campaign does not reach it's goal.

Well, first of all I hope it will reach the $15000 and even more which will bring more success to this project, but even if not, then your donation will still encourage me in this endeavor to realize this project, so any funding above $2500 will be a good aid. As you already know what have I been doing so far and it was upon my enthusiasm (often support of lots of friends), so I have an experience of finding ways to realize projects anyways.  In case the funding would be lower than $2500 I will close the campaign and refund you donations.

Many of my local friends and foreigners who visit Armenia ask me why is Armenia developing so slow and still being so unpopular since having such a big potential of rock climbing and freeride skiing. Well, this is a complex issue but I will try to give you a quick picture. First of all it's the lack of avid climbers and freeride skiers who live like dirtbag artists developing this cultures in their countries up to the highest levels. I have kind of taken this role in Armenia and was supported by friends and family for many years, but this is not enough yet. Here we come to the second topic which is the base of all. In some bigger western or Asian countries with better economics it has often being supported by governments, foundations, outdoor equipment producers and investments by stakeholders. Here in Armenia we do not have these opportunities at least at this stage, and that is why I need your support here!

One of the biggest impact of this project is that it will create larger space for local youth where they will step with confidence, guidance and in this space they will finally have a stimulus to reach and overcome! If you go through Up The Rocks website you will already see how much have I done for this purpose so far. That is why I encourage you with confidence to be the part of this great and beautiful perspective going to be realized soon!

The main risk and challenge is not to reach the goal of the campaign. The biggest challenge for me always was the only one thing - the lack of funds. But nothing else proves you better than my website that I overcome every challenge and do what I've got to do!

Please keep on sharing this campaign with people who believes that outdoor activities can change and educate our societies, making our world cleaner, kinder, full of solidarity and love. Feel free to use Indiegogo share tools!
P.S. the updates for FAQ and media will come soon.

Hello my fellow Indiegogo backers my name is David Dominguez and I founded the water buddy. I’m the owner of two super active boxer dogs, Roxy and her daughter Zoey. And this is a little inside scoop on how these two helped me design the perfect water bowl for the dog on the go!
Being a dog owner and keeping your pets hydrated while doing activities is a must. Just like in humans, water is responsible for keeping your pet’s body functioning at peak levels.

After trying multiple different water bottles on the market meant for your dogs. I realized one thing they all have in common, is that they are bulky and the extra weight can become a real inconvenience.

So I stuck to the concept of making the single water bottle work for both of us. But after plenty of wet floors and wasted water I thought there has to be a better way. And so the idea of the Water Buddy was born.

It was a long journey creating multiple prototypes, many hours spent on Research and Development to finally engineering the perfect patent pending bowl. We designed our bowl to be light weight leakproof and conveniently small, but big enough so all size dogs can enjoy. All our water buddy’s are made out of a very strong and durable biosourced and biodegradable PLA.
Ensuring there was no leaks while also ensuring our mechanism helped water get from bottle to bowl without cross contamination allowing you to still enjoy fresh clean water.
The most important part however, is that the cap is compatible to 90% of the markets water bottles. (all 1 inch plastic water bottles)

column2: > Ultimately, while out on the go with your furry family member and happen to run out of water simply stop at your nearest convenience store pick up your favorite bottled water and let the Water Buddy do the rest.
>And hydrate your pet with no cross contamination

>Introducing The Water Buddy adapter this patent pending cap will allow you to attach the already universal Water Buddy to even more brands. Simply secure smaller adaptor into the water buddy cap and now you're ready to attach to smaller water bottle openings world wide. (purchase adaptor at checkout)
>No spills no leaks no cross contamination just the right amount of water to get your dog re-hydrated

column1: Our bowl's will come attached to a snap clasp with key ring that will allow you to hang from any pant loop, bag, key ring or backpack.

column2: >What We Need And What You Get

column1: (All of our water buddy's are guaranteed to all backers of our campaign and will be made to order using the highest grade PLA filament.)
Our goal is to get our product tooled for physical (injected molds) made in Shenzhen China, packaged and shipped to us.
After tooling is complete we want to get the tools shipped so we can produce and manufacture the highest quality injected molded water buddy's made locally here in the USA.
All money raised we’ll help us get our water bowls tooled for mass production and other cost that would come with getting our product to retail.
If campaign isn’t able to reach our goal, all funds will still go towards improving the water buddy, more R&
column2: D, marketing and our dream of having The Water Buddy in stores world wide.

column1: Our team has also put together a concept of how the water buddy packaging will look. We wanted this packaging too look attractive but also informative, a packaging that wouldn't take up a lot of self space but you knew where it was at once you entered a store.

Let’s get excited!!! You as our backers will receive a fully functioning water buddy guaranteed. Our  water bowls are made to order just pick your favorite color at checkout. All water buddy's purchased through our campaign will be engraved with the water buddy logo, a one time exclusive offer to our supporters on Indiegogo. Just a little extra touch to show our appreciation to all who back and support us along this journey.

Another perk that only our backers will be able to receive is our Multi-Colored water bowls. Your custom bowl can be up to three colors, choose colors at check out. These bowls will also be engraved with the classic water buddy logo.

column2: >(IGG EXCLUSIVE this water buddy will not be available once campaign ends)

column1: Other dog water bottle companies force you to buy a complete water bottle with their added tray or it WONT WORK. They can also be very expensive and bulky. These brands NOT beIng universal gives you the inconvenience of having to carry around two water bottles. The average weight of the competitors water bottle when full and paired with your personal 500ml water bottle is 3.5lb

column2: >The Water Buddy Paired With A 500ml Water Bottle

column1: Having this issue dog owners are more likely to fill their pets water bottle with harmful water. There are differences between tap, distilled, and natural artisan water, To sum it all up, tap water is often treated using harmful chemicals like chlorine, fluoride, and heavy metals.
While these impurities might cause us to steer clear of tap water, most of us don’t think twice about it when filling our pet’s bottle.

column2: >The Benefits Of Giving Your Pet Clean Water

column1: Just like humans, our pets need nutrients and minerals in their diet. You and your pet can reap the health benefits of clean quality H20.
Most important during the growth and suckling stages of young puppies
About 99% of calcium is stored in your dog’s bones
Helps keep a balance of pressure with sodium
Helps balance the pressure in your dog’s cells
Encourages your pet to drink water, flushing out toxins and other minerals that may become stones
Needed to promote a working nervous system

Our Water bowls being universal, give you what you need and not what you don't. This benefit allows you to stop by any convenience store buy a new water bottle that's right for you and your dog, or just simply refill your previously bought personal water bottle with more purified water. This will cut your cost on buying a personal water bottle for your dog and allow them to reap the same benefits that you get from great quality water by just attaching The Water Buddy..
The Water Buddy makes life much easier allowing you not to attack your puppy with water but instead allowing them to efficiently and effectively get the most out of their drinks when on the go.

column2: >Let's make some noise let all your friends and family know about our Indiegogo campaign.
>(use the indiegogo share tool and lets spread the word)
>We can’t wait for every family to own their very own Water Buddy. From my family to yours

column1: Hello my fellow Indiegogo backers my name is David Dominguez and I founded the water buddy. I’m the owner of two super active boxer dogs, Roxy and her daughter Zoey. And this is a little inside scoop on how these two helped me design the perfect water bowl for the dog on the go!
Being a dog owner and keeping your pets hydrated while doing activities is a must. Just like in humans, water is responsible for keeping your pet’s body functioning at peak levels.

After trying multiple different water bottles on the market meant for your dogs. I realized one thing they all have in common, is that they are bulky and the extra weight can become a real inconvenience.

So I stuck to the concept of making the single water bottle work for both of us. But after plenty of wet floors and wasted water I thought there has to be a better way. And so the idea of the Water Buddy was born.

It was a long journey creating multiple prototypes, many hours spent on Research and Development to finally engineering the perfect patent pending bowl. We designed our bowl to be light weight leakproof and conveniently small, but big enough so all size dogs can enjoy. All our water buddy’s are made out of a very strong and durable biosourced and biodegradable PLA.
Ensuring there was no leaks while also ensuring our mechanism helped water get from bottle to bowl without cross contamination allowing you to still enjoy fresh clean water.
The most important part however, is that the cap is compatible to 90% of the markets water bottles. (all 1 inch plastic water bottles)

Ultimately, while out on the go with your furry family member and happen to run out of water simply stop at your nearest convenience store pick up your favorite bottled water and let the Water Buddy do the rest.
Pick The Perfect Size Water Bottle
And hydrate your pet with no cross contamination

Introducing The Water Buddy adapter this patent pending cap will allow you to attach the already universal Water Buddy to even more brands. Simply secure smaller adaptor into the water buddy cap and now you're ready to attach to smaller water bottle openings world wide. (purchase adaptor at checkout)
No spills no leaks no cross contamination just the right amount of water to get your dog re-hydrated
Our bowl's will come attached to a snap clasp with key ring that will allow you to hang from any pant loop, bag, key ring or backpack.
What We Need And What You Get
(All of our water buddy's are guaranteed to all backers of our campaign and will be made to order using the highest grade PLA filament.)
Our goal is to get our product tooled for physical (injected molds) made in Shenzhen China, packaged and shipped to us.
After tooling is complete we want to get the tools shipped so we can produce and manufacture the highest quality injected molded water buddy's made locally here in the USA.
All money raised we’ll help us get our water bowls tooled for mass production and other cost that would come with getting our product to retail.
If campaign isn’t able to reach our goal, all funds will still go towards improving the water buddy, more R&D, marketing and our dream of having The Water Buddy in stores world wide.

Our team has also put together a concept of how the water buddy packaging will look. We wanted this packaging too look attractive but also informative, a packaging that wouldn't take up a lot of self space but you knew where it was at once you entered a store.
Free Graphic t-shirt With Your Pledge

Let’s get excited!!! You as our backers will receive a fully functioning water buddy guaranteed. Our  water bowls are made to order just pick your favorite color at checkout. All water buddy's purchased through our campaign will be engraved with the water buddy logo, a one time exclusive offer to our supporters on Indiegogo. Just a little extra touch to show our appreciation to all who back and support us along this journey.

Another perk that only our backers will be able to receive is our Multi-Colored water bowls. Your custom bowl can be up to three colors, choose colors at check out. These bowls will also be engraved with the classic water buddy logo.
(IGG EXCLUSIVE this water buddy will not be available once campaign ends)

Other dog water bottle companies force you to buy a complete water bottle with their added tray or it WONT WORK. They can also be very expensive and bulky. These brands NOT beIng universal gives you the inconvenience of having to carry around two water bottles. The average weight of the competitors water bottle when full and paired with your personal 500ml water bottle is 3.5lb
The Water Buddy Paired With A 500ml Water Bottle

Having this issue dog owners are more likely to fill their pets water bottle with harmful water. There are differences between tap, distilled, and natural artisan water, To sum it all up, tap water is often treated using harmful chemicals like chlorine, fluoride, and heavy metals.
While these impurities might cause us to steer clear of tap water, most of us don’t think twice about it when filling our pet’s bottle.
The Benefits Of Giving Your Pet Clean Water
Just like humans, our pets need nutrients and minerals in their diet. You and your pet can reap the health benefits of clean quality H20.
Most important during the growth and suckling stages of young puppies
About 99% of calcium is stored in your dog’s bones
Helps keep a balance of pressure with sodium
Helps balance the pressure in your dog’s cells
Encourages your pet to drink water, flushing out toxins and other minerals that may become stones
Needed to promote a working nervous system

Our Water bowls being universal, give you what you need and not what you don't. This benefit allows you to stop by any convenience store buy a new water bottle that's right for you and your dog, or just simply refill your previously bought personal water bottle with more purified water. This will cut your cost on buying a personal water bottle for your dog and allow them to reap the same benefits that you get from great quality water by just attaching The Water Buddy..
The Water Buddy makes life much easier allowing you not to attack your puppy with water but instead allowing them to efficiently and effectively get the most out of their drinks when on the go.
Let's make some noise let all your friends and family know about our Indiegogo campaign.
(use the indiegogo share tool and lets spread the word)
We can’t wait for every family to own their very own Water Buddy. From my family to yours",46.0,0,"1 Campaign

The initial product design took over 6 month of meticulous prototyping, finding best microfiber material, which would work with various fluid solutions, and as importantly be lightweight, ergonomic, and easy to use. Then, during the intense testing phase we went over few dozen solution types from various global manufacturers to offer our backers the choice of the best available. We also tested Splash under different conditions for leaks, tearing, and breakage to make sure that the product you'll get will exceed your expectation. Finally we already aligned the environmentally friendly high quality manufacturing and ready to go into full scale production.

- Serge - founder:

Hi, backers! You may actually recognize me as the guy on the toilet. In fact, several of our  team members starred in the Splash video! But besides acting, SplashTech is a group of dedicated individuals experienced in the fields of product design, information technology, and environmental studies. The idea came from everyday commuting on a public transportation and frequent travel. 

- Mila - product design

At some point we noticed how often we get sick, even during warmer, non-flu seasons. We shared our frustration with each other and found few things in common - using public transpiration, spending time in public buildings, and of course touching our phones all the time. We also have kids who like to play outside and like to pick up random things and inadvertently... catch a nasty bug. 

- Andrew - co-founder

These findings were supported by various university studies. Once the initial concept was formalized we reached out to specialists in different areas: product design, biotech and industrial solutions. The rest is history.  We ourselves and our families and friends already use Splash prototypes, and hopefully soon the product will be used by our backers.

column4: >We lose a large percentage of our body heat through our heads. Most Beanies are itchy and provide zero wind protection on cold days. Add to that many don't pack small enough to fit inside a pocket and require that it be put away inside a backpack or a purse. Meet TATSU, The Down Beanie You've Been Waiting For:
column5:

column2:
>

We have spent many hours developing the Tatsu Beanie and are now ready to move into production. To make this happen we need your support. A pledge of  any amount, however small, will mean a lot to us:
column4: >
column5: >
column7:
/>

How to wash your down beanie

When properly cared for, your FÜRST Tatsu Down Beanie will last for decades. Regular washing will help your down beanie last longer and perform at its best.

Machine-wash

column1: • Machine-wash your down beanie on a gentle cycle at 28 °C (or 82 °F). If it's available, select the ‘extra rinse’ option. Use a down-specific soap or detergent, like Nikwax Down Wash
• Skip the spin cycle. It’s better for your beanie to drip dry and/or use a tumble dryer.
•  Soak your down beanie for up to 60 minutes in a sink. Again, go for a down-specific detergent like the Nikwax Down Wash
• Rinse by lightly squeezing out excess water (don’t wring it!) and follow the drying steps below.
• Once the wash is complete, carefully remove your beanie — it'll be heavier than you think — and lay flat to dry on a clothing rack. As you do this, gently fluff up the down.
• It’ll take around 24–48 hours to drip dry depending on the weather conditions. As it dries, keep giving it the occasional fluff, particularly around any wet clumps of down.

• When the beanie is almost dry, put it in the tumble drier on a low heat and check it regularly. To maximize the loft of your Tatsu Beanie, throw in two to three tennis balls, this will really help fluff up your down beanie

Things to avoid:

Down is a tough performer against the cold, but when wet, needs a little extra attention from you. To ensure you don’t damage your beanie, here’s what you should avoid:
•  Fabric softener. Stick to a down-specific detergent for the best results.
•  Dish washing detergent. It will strip the naturals fats and oils found in down that prevents it from clumping together and provides the incredible loft associated with down
•  A dry clean. The solvents they use in the dry cleaning process can damage your beanie.
•  A top loader with an agitator. It’s a rougher wash, and your versatile beanie deserves a gentle hand.
•  The spin cycle. Down is heavy when it’s wet, so err on the side of caution to avoid damage.
•  Wringing. Don’t wring your beanie, no matter how heavy it is. If you must, gently shake any excess water off while supporting its weight and squeeze out excess water

WYN LABS™ is an innovative team focused on creating useful and creative products perfect for the everyday use.  We are back to present our latest and most proud creation: a life-saving tool.
column3:
>

 

Introducing WYN Bullet™ - the world's most powerful spring-loaded emergency window breaker.  Its patent pending direct-impact technology delivers a powerful strike directly to a tungsten carbide tip, allowing the vehicle occupant to easily break car windows for emergency escape.

column1: In case of an emergency: press the bullet tip against the car side window.  The spring-loaded internal striker will release and hammer the ultra-hard carbide tip with a powerful force and shatter tempered glass.
WYN Bullet is a must-have car escape/rescue tool for all safety conscious drivers.  When every second matters, you can count on it to save your life, and the lives of other people.
column2: >

column1:
In 2017 there were 20,800 accidents related to fire or water submersion, resulting in 1,874 deaths in the US.  In an accident, a car may lose all electrical power or its doors are jammed.  When a car falls into the water, you only have a few seconds to escape to safety.

Extensive study by AAA (American Automotive Association) published in 2019 confirmed that emergency vehicle escape tools are a lifesaver.
Developed for first responders (firefighters, law enforcement and EMT) WYN Bullet is compact, powerful and efficient.  When your job is to save lives, you must use the best tools!

Our Patent-Pending Technology positions the internal striker inside the bullet head, directly behind the tungsten tip.  This innovative design is very compact and efficient, allowing you to break tempered glass windows with ease.

This small, efficient and easy-to-use tool is made of precision machined parts with high quality materials.

Designed to mimic the look of a real bullet, WYN Bullet looks strikingly beautiful and is amazingly powerful.  You will definitely enjoy holding this revolutionary rescue tool in your hands.

WYN Bullet is compact for easy storage and access.  It comes with a removable pocket clip and key-ring loop so you can always carry it with you.  It is an essential addition to your everyday carry (EDC).

Need to focus, stay calm, stay awake or boost your excitement?  WYN Bullet is a highly addictive and effective focus tool.  Pressing and releasing the bullet head with your finger has a tantalizing effect. The bullet tip creates a high pressure point but is not sharp to cut your skin. The more you press, the higher the pressure.  If you press it all the way and release the internal striker, it will give you anything from a jolt to a sharp shock, depending on where you place the tip. The goal is to get as close to the edge without being struck.

Why Emergency Window Breaker

In September 2017 on the way home from work I witnessed an accident on the other side of the road. A car turned sideways and slammed into a tree.  People immediately ran to help but the two occupants were unconscious and the car doors were locked. It took a few minutes for the firetruck to arrive, but it felt like an eternity.

I checked the news the next day and found out that the driver died. I kept wondering what if they could get to him sooner.

We all hope that accidents never happen, but hope is not enough. When it does happen are you prepared?  Even if it never happens to you, knowing that you are prepared would give you that peace of mind.

Join us today and help bring this product to life. If we could save a single life, it would all be worth it!
column5: >
column6: >

column1:
WYN LABS™ is a small creative team based in the Pacific Northwest. We have shipped our products to over 50 countries.

THANK YOU OUR BACKERS FOR YOUR AMAZING SUPPORT!!!

column2: >

column1: •  Why do I need this?  WYN Bullet is an essential safety and survival tool, allowing you to break car windows for emergency escape/rescue.
•  Does WYN Bullet work on all car windows?  NO.  It only works on tempered glass.  It will NOT work on laminated glass.

•  Is it easy to use WYN Bullet?  Yes.  It's very easy to use WYN Bullet to break car window for emergency escape.  Just hold the body of the tool firmly and press the tip against the window near the bottom corners.
Is the tip safe to touch?  Yes.  The tungsten carbide tip is not sharp to cut the skin even if pressed against your finger.
What material is the tip of the bullet?  It's made of Tungsten Carbide, one of the hardest man-made material on earth.  (It's often used to machine hardened steels)
Do I need to reset the WYN Bullet after use?  No.  The WYN Bullet's internal springs will reset themselves.
•  How do I carry WYN Bullet?  It comes with a removable pocket clip and a key-ring loop.
Is the WYN Bullet reusable?  Yes.  The WYN Bullet can be used multiple times.  Its internal spring-loaded striker and head reset automatically.  The tip is ultra-hard and durable.

•  How does it work?  When pressing the tip of the bullet against the glass window the internal spring is compressed.  The spring-loaded internal striker then releases, moves forward and strikes the back of the tungsten tip.  This high impact force will shatter glass.

column2: >It is evident that we cannot STOP it, but what if we could predict it prior to its occurrence? We can curtail the heavy losses of life and economy.  And thus here we have Cu-REO to do the work for us!

column1: CubeSat for Remote Earth Observation(s), is an initiative by students of <b><i>University
of Petroleum and Energy Studies (UPES), India, to design and develop a
nanosatellite which is going to aid in prediction of the earthquakes prior
the initial stage it will be used as a '<b><i>test bed for verifying the hypothetical
research work in the detection of seismic activity by studying the perturbations
in the magnetic field of Earth', however, in later stage it will be used to detect the earthquakes solely.

column1: it be great to know about earthquakes before they actually hit us? Well, these
perturbations are observed prior to actual occurrence with a time span
varying from a week to a even a month.

column1: an operation. Its ancestor, the Demeter satellite was launched in 2004 by
France, for carrying out a similar task, but the satellite was much larger and

Tremors, Evacuate!7.0 on Richter scale!6.9 Magnitude Quake!Catastrophic 9.0 Earthquake!

Though these are small decimals, but they represent huge damage when it comes to Earthquakes, which are unpreventable acts of nature beyond the control of humans. These account for huge loss of human life and economical resources following their
occurrence and often leads to adverse effects on the economy of a nation.

It is evident that we cannot STOP it, but what if we could predict it prior to its occurrence? We can curtail the heavy losses of life and economy.  And thus here we have Cu-REO to do the work for us!
CubeSat for Remote Earth Observation(s), is an initiative by students of University
of Petroleum and Energy Studies (UPES), India, to design and develop a
nanosatellite which is going to aid in prediction of the earthquakes prior
the initial stage it will be used as a 'test bed for verifying the hypothetical
research work in the detection of seismic activity by studying the perturbations
in the magnetic field of Earth', however, in later stage it will be used to detect the earthquakes solely.
This is what Cu-REO looks like:
it be great to know about earthquakes before they actually hit us? Well, these
perturbations are observed prior to actual occurrence with a time span
varying from a week to a even a month.
Weighing merely a kilogram and having dimensions of 10 x 10 x 10 cm, this cube is being designed to do wonders.
Cu-REO is first CubeSat to be designed for such
an operation. Its ancestor, the Demeter satellite was launched in 2004 by
France, for carrying out a similar task, but the satellite was much larger and
Lets have a look at the various components/systems being installed on-board this satellite:
Cu-REO would be deployed at altitude ranging in between 675 – 750 km, where it will carry
out this task. Since these perturbations fall on the Ultra-Low Frequency (ULF)
and Very Low Frequency (VLF) bands of the magnetic wave spectrum of earth, a
high sensitivity magnetometer is being installed on-board Cu-REO, to detect the

Panacea for losses relating Earthquakes Verification of the hypothetical work relating the prediction of earthquakes is the main motive of the mission. If proved successful, it will help the society reduce the losses due to earthquakes.

Effective Way of Providing Student's Education.Cubesats provide students a platform to deal with real-life problems and proves to be an efficient way of inculcating the true aspect of subject in them.
Paves a path for Young Minds in countrySuch a technical development looked forward to pave the way for a large student audience in
country allowing the fresh minds to explore the space for advancement in space sciences.

English text Below - 
820 km uzunluğundaki Karia Yolu üç arkadaşın büyük kentler dışında çok da bilinmeyen bir bölgede yaptıkları araştırmalar sonucunda oluşturuldu. Yürüyüş rotası ücra köyler, harabeler, plajlar ve çok değişken coğrafyalardan geçiyor. 2012 yılında MUTSO ve GEKA’nın desteği ile proje hayata geçirildi. Şimdi işaretleri yenilemek, kapanmış patikaları açtırmak ve çeşitli sebeplerle zarar görmüş yönlendirme levhalarını değiştirmek için desteğinize ihtiyacımız var. 2 aylık bu çalışma sürecinde bölgede yaşana halk ile çalışıp yerel ekonomiye destek sağlamaya özen göstereceğiz. 

Hikayemize gelince...

İsmim Altay Özcan ve Karia Yolu'nun kurucularından biriyim. Doğa tutkunu biri olarak, gerçek anlamda bir ekspedisyona 2007 yılında fotoğrafçı ve deniz kanosu rehberi olarak katıldım. Suriye sınırından başlayıp İstanbul'a kadar giden proje boyunca kıyı şeridini daha iyi görme fırsatına sahip oldum. Acaba bir sonraki köy nasıl bir yer, peki ya bir sonraki koyda neler var, şu dağın tepesinden etraf nasıl gözüküyor, hep daha ileride ne var diyerek bir adım daha attım. Ve bunu insanlarla paylaşmayı çok sevdim, çünkü bence başka yerler, köyler, manzaralar ve en önemlisi hayatlar görmek ön yargılarımızı aşmak, algılarımızı açmak, daha iyi bir insan olmak demek. İşte Karia Yolu'da bu şekilde doğdu.

2009 yılında kazısına katıldığımız Tlos antik tiyatrosunda otururken projenin yaratıcılarından biri olan Yunus Özdemir, Karia’da yeni bir yürüyüş rotası oluşturmak fikri ile geldi. Ben bölgenin sahilini kano ile geçerken görmüştüm, Yunus ise bu bölgedeki az bilinen antik kentleri üniversitedeki hocaları ile beraber gezmişti. Bu konuşmadan 3 ay sonra, Kasım ayında neye karıştığımızı tam olarak bilmeden yola çıktık. Yazın rehberlikten kazandığımız paralarla 4 yıl boyunca bolca kaybolduk, patikalar araştırdık, köylüler ile konuşup bilgi almaya, boyumuzu aşan çalıların arasında yolumuzu bulmaya çalıştık, bir kaç kez balıkçı tekneleri tarafından kurtarıldık, kimi zaman hayvan hırsızı kimi zaman defineci olarak düşünüldük…Ve en nihayetinde Türkiye’nin en uzun mesafeli yürüyüş rotasını oluşturmuş olduk.

İlk işaretlemeler, levhalar, patikaların temizlenmesi ve rehber kitabın basımı Muğla Ticaret ve Sanayi Odası ve GEKA’nın desteği ile 2013 yılında gerçekleştirildi. Bu dönemden sonra rota üzerinde yapılan her bakımı kendi cebimizden ve kitap satışlarından elde ettiğimiz gelirler ile yaptık. Fakat herkesin bu bölge için yapabileceği bir şey var. Sizin yardımlarınızla rota üzerindeki işaretleri yenileyecek, levhaları tamir edebilecek, kapanmış patikaları açtırabilecek kısacası bu parkurları herkesin kolaylıkla gezip görebileceği bir hale getireceğiz.

Bu patikalarda yürürken doğanın muhteşemliğinin farkına varabiliyoruz fakat rotaların bu hale gelmesi için ne kadar çok çaba harcandığını fark edemeyebiliyoruz. Örnek vermek gerekirse, 2 kişilik bir ekip günde maksimum 10 km işaretleyebiliyor
column2: bir 3 km’lik bir patikanın temizlenmesi için 3 kişilik bir ekip tam 3 gün çalışıyor. Bu kampanyaya destek olarak her yıl binlerce kişinin yürüdüğü bu rotaların bakımlarında sizin de bir katkınız olacak. Bu sayede yerli ve yabancı Akdeniz ve Egenin buluştuğu bu harika bölgeyi keyifle keşfetmeye devam edebilecekler.

column1: • Hesaplamalar gönüllülerden oluşan 5 kişilik bir ekibin tüm rotayı işaretlemesinin 2 ay süreceği düşünülerek yapıldı. Buna ek olarak köylülerden oluşan 4 işçinin gerekli yerlerdeki patikaları temizlemesi için 1 aylık bir süre düşünüldü.

Patikaların açılması. Patikaların açılacağı köyden 4 işçi günlük 100 TL yevmiye çalıştırılacak. Farklı yerlerde yapılacak olan bu çalışma toplam 1 ay sürecek. Böylece hem kapanmaya yüz tutmuş patikalar açılacak hem de yerel ekonomiye katkıda bulunulmuş olacak.
Toplam: 12000 TL / 3500 USD

Araç Kiralama - İşaretleme çalışmaları sırasında pickup tarzı bir araç kiralanacak. Aylık 3000 TL ile 2 ay kiralanacak. 
Toplam: 6000 TL / 1750 USD

Yakıt - Ortalama olarak her gün 50 TL’lik bir yakıt harcanacağını düşünüyoruz. 
Toplam: 3000 TL / 860 USD

Konaklama - Bazen uygun fiyatlı bir pansiyonda bazen de kiralanan bir dairede konaklama yapılacak. 5 kişi için günde ortalama 200 TL den 60 gün olarak hesaplandı. 
Toplam: 12000 TL / 3500 USD

Yemek - Olmazsa olmaz. Yorgun bünyelerimizi kendine getirmesi için kişi başı günlük ortalama 50 TL harcanacağını düşünüyoruz. Yani 60 gün boyunca 5 kişinin yemek masrafı.
Toplam: 15000 TL / 4300 USD

Boya - İki buçuk litrelik bir teneke boya 45 TL, bir adet beyaz bir adet de kırmızı alınacak. Geçmiş deneyimlerimiz her kutu ile 25 km işaretleyebildiğimizi gösterdi. Yaklaşık 600 km’lik bir etabın yeniden işaretlenmesi gerekiyor, ki bu da her bir renk için 48 teneke yapar.
Toplam: 2160 TL / 625 USD

Malzemeler - Çalışmalar süresince eldiven, tel fırça, tiner ve benzeri malzemeleri ihtiyacımız var. Her kişi 1 haftada 1 çift eldiven ve 1 fırça değiştiriyor. 
Toplam: 500 TL / 150 USD

Levhalar - Bir çok sebepten zarar görmüş bazı yönlendirme levhalarının yenilenmesi gerekiyor. 50 adet yönlendirme levhasının tanesi 100 TL.
Toplam: 5000TL/ $1500

Eğer hedeflediğimiz miktara ulaşamazsak elde edilen para yine de bu amaç için kullanılacak. Süreç daha uzun sürecek belki ve bütün rotayı işaretleyemeyebiliriz fakat yine de boya alıp, ulaşım ve konaklama masraflarını karşılayabileceğiz. 
Sizin desteğiniz ile rotanın daha iyi bir hale gelmesini ve Türkiye’nin pek keşfedilmemiş bu muhteşem yerlerine sürdürülebilir alternatif turizmin gelmesini sağlayabiliriz. Çevreye zarar vermeyen, doğa, tarih ve kültüre değer veren bir turizm. Rota üzerindeki ana turizm mekanlarından uzak köylerde yerel ekonomiye katkıda bulunacağına inanıyoruz. İster maddi olarak yardımda bulunarak, isterseniz de sosyal medyada kampanyamızı duyurarak, herkesin katkıda bulunabileceği bir şey olduğuna inanıyoruz.

------------------------------------------
My name is Altay Ozcan and I am one of the creators and managers of the Carian Trail. As someone passionate about nature, I did my first expedition as a sea-kayak guide and photographer in a project that aimed at and succeeded in paddling Turkish coast from the Syrian Border to Istanbul. I have always liked exploring new places, seeing the next village, one more cove, the view from the very top of a mountain, always striving to go further. The next step has been to share these discoveries, experiences and landscapes and hopefully have a positive impact on their lives. This is how the Carian Trail was born.

In 2009, Yunus, co-creator, brought up the idea of setting a new hiking trail while we were sitting above an ancient theatre of Tlos. Previously I had paddled along the same coast where he had toured unknown ruins as an archaeologist in the ancient region called Caria. We started our research not knowing what we were getting ourselves into. After 4 years of getting lost, looking for new paths, talking to villagers, blazing through overgrown bushes, being rescued a few times by fisherman and draining our bank accounts, we found ourselves having completed Turkey's longest hiking trail.

The initial waymarkings, signposts and printing of the guidebook was sponsored. Since then, we have personally funded all upkeep of the trail that spans from the Mediterranean to the Aegean. But now, we need your help. With your generous donations, we will be able to continue to renew the fading way markings, fix the signposts that were damaged over time, clean the overgrown paths and help to keep the trail alive.

While walking along paths, it is easy to appreciate the beauty but you may not realize how much work goes in to the maintenance of these trails. If we are to give an example, the re-waymarking of a 10 km route takes an entire day, and cleaning of a 3 km overgrown path takes a team of three 3 days. By contributing to this cause, you will be playing a role in maintaining the trails that thousands of hikers walk each year. Thus locals and foreigners alike can continue to explore this beautiful part of the Southwest coast of Turkey.

column3: '>We have estimated
column5: '> that it will take 5 friends (volunteers) two months to renew all the waymarks. In addition, we will need to hire a group of 4 workers for a month to cut and clean all the paths.

column3: '>Trail cleaning- We will pay each of four workers 100TL a day for 30 days.
column5: '>They will open up and clean any overgrown paths.

column3: '>Car rental- We will need a pickup for transportation throughout the waymarking process. This will cost 3000 TL a month and be used for two months.
'>Fuel- Of course, that car also needs gas. We are estimating that it will take about 50TL worth of gas per day to get us around.

column1: • Accommodation- The five of us will have to stay somewhere, be it a few rooms in a budget hotel or renting an apartment to share, we are estimating 200TL a night for 60 days.
• Food- Everyone's favorite! It will cost about 50TL a day per person to keep our bellies full. We will be feeding our group of 5 for 60 days.

• Paint- Each can of paint is 45TL, we need one red and one white at all times. We have learned that these two cans last about 25 km. About 600km of the trail need fresh waymarks, so that's 48 cans of paint.
• Supplies- We also need to buy gloves, brushes, paint thinner, and the like. Each person tends to go through a brush and a pair of gloves a week.
• Signposts- We need to renew many of the signposts. Planning to have 50 new signs made, each costing 100TL.

If we don't succeed in reaching our $16,185 goal, the money that we do collect will still be put to good use. The upkeep process will take much longer, but we will still be able to buy paint, pay for transportation and accommodation so we can mark some of the trails ourselves.

With your help, we can keep the trail alive and in good condition, thus continuing to bring the right kind of tourism into one of the most beautiful and undiscovered regions of Turkey. We hope to promote the economy on a local level, bringing a source of income to those living in traditional villages along the trail, while at the same time sharing the history, culture, and landscapes found here without harming the natural environment. Any bit of help is appreciated, including a 'share' or 'like' on any of our social media platforms:

------------------------------------------My name is Altay Ozcan and I am one of the creators and managers of the Carian Trail. As someone passionate about nature, I did my first expedition as a sea-kayak guide and photographer in a project that aimed at and succeeded in paddling Turkish coast from the Syrian Border to Istanbul. I have always liked exploring new places, seeing the next village, one more cove, the view from the very top of a mountain, always striving to go further. The next step has been to share these discoveries, experiences and landscapes and hopefully have a positive impact on their lives. This is how the Carian Trail was born.

In 2009, Yunus, co-creator, brought up the idea of setting a new hiking trail while we were sitting above an ancient theatre of Tlos. Previously I had paddled along the same coast where he had toured unknown ruins as an archaeologist in the ancient region called Caria. We started our research not knowing what we were getting ourselves into. After 4 years of getting lost, looking for new paths, talking to villagers, blazing through overgrown bushes, being rescued a few times by fisherman and draining our bank accounts, we found ourselves having completed Turkey's longest hiking trail.

The initial waymarkings, signposts and printing of the guidebook was sponsored. Since then, we have personally funded all upkeep of the trail that spans from the Mediterranean to the Aegean. But now, we need your help. With your generous donations, we will be able to continue to renew the fading way markings, fix the signposts that were damaged over time, clean the overgrown paths and help to keep the trail alive.

While walking along paths, it is easy to appreciate the beauty but you may not realize how much work goes in to the maintenance of these trails. If we are to give an example, the re-waymarking of a 10 km route takes an entire day, and cleaning of a 3 km overgrown path takes a team of three 3 days. By contributing to this cause, you will be playing a role in maintaining the trails that thousands of hikers walk each year. Thus locals and foreigners alike can continue to explore this beautiful part of the Southwest coast of Turkey.
We have estimated that it will take 5 friends (volunteers) two months to renew all the waymarks. In addition, we will need to hire a group of 4 workers for a month to cut and clean all the paths.
Here's a breakdown of all expenses:
Trail cleaning- We will pay each of four workers 100TL a day for 30 days. They will open up and clean any overgrown paths.
Car rental- We will need a pickup for transportation throughout the waymarking process. This will cost 3000 TL a month and be used for two months.
Fuel- Of course, that car also needs gas. We are estimating that it will take about 50TL worth of gas per day to get us around.
Accommodation- The five of us will have to stay somewhere, be it a few rooms in a budget hotel or renting an apartment to share, we are estimating 200TL a night for 60 days.
Food- Everyone's favorite! It will cost about 50TL a day per person to keep our bellies full. We will be feeding our group of 5 for 60 days.

Paint- Each can of paint is 45TL, we need one red and one white at all times. We have learned that these two cans last about 25 km. About 600km of the trail need fresh waymarks, so that's 48 cans of paint.
Supplies- We also need to buy gloves, brushes, paint thinner, and the like. Each person tends to go through a brush and a pair of gloves a week.
Signposts- We need to renew many of the signposts. Planning to have 50 new signs made, each costing 100TL.

If we don't succeed in reaching our $16,185 goal, the money that we do collect will still be put to good use. The upkeep process will take much longer, but we will still be able to buy paint, pay for transportation and accommodation so we can mark some of the trails ourselves.

With your help, we can keep the trail alive and in good condition, thus continuing to bring the right kind of tourism into one of the most beautiful and undiscovered regions of Turkey. We hope to promote the economy on a local level, bringing a source of income to those living in traditional villages along the trail, while at the same time sharing the history, culture, and landscapes found here without harming the natural environment. Any bit of help is appreciated, including a 'share' or 'like' on any of our social media platforms:

Dear Furiends, we are Martina and Leo, sister and brother. 

We are campaigning to open the very first CAT HOTEL in the world, a beautiful botique hotel in a beautiful location near Rome. It is an innovative evolution of the cat-cafe concept!

We are cat lovers since we were children and we always enjoyed the companionship of many cats, our favourite furry friends. We feel that too many cats live a feral life, struggling to stay healthy and to get enough food. Especially in Italy, because of the ongoing economic crisis, the Government and the activists do not have enough money to offer real solutions to this problem. As a result, colonies of stray cats keep growing, making the problem worse day after day for our furry friends, that struggle to cope without the care they deserve.

With your donation, you will contribute in making the most innovative idea of the year become true: the creation of the very first ""CAT HOTEL"" in the world, a social enterprise that will rescue stray cats, and will give them a chance to be adopted by the guests of the hotel. Moreover, the guests of the Hotel will enjoy the healing property of cats, and will get loads of purrs and meows!

In order to make this paw-tastic idea become true, we will need £230.000. About £180.000 will be invested to purchase a beautiful manor near Calcata, a beautiful medieval town located near Roma. The other £60.000 will be utilised to refurbish the manor and create all the facilities of the B&
column2:
B, such as eight guests' rooms, kitchen, garden pool, guests parking etc...

We have some special presents for every cat-lover that will contribute to this campaign
column3: for donations of up to £20 we will give access to a blog in which we will document the creation of our social enterprise. For donations of £250, we will offer a weekend at The Cats' Lodge, inclusive of airport shuttle service from Rome's airports. For greater donations, you will receive an invitation to the opening of The Cats' Lodge, and a complimentary 3-night stay for two people. Are you thinking to donate more? For our super donors, a life-long free accommodation at The Cats' Lodge may be offered! In case we will not reach the target of money needed, we will open a similar business concept in the UK
column4:
all the donors will be notified and will be able to get a refund if they want to!

We really feel that this concept is a clever evolution of the cat-cafes' idea. In fact, if successful this concept will be embraced by other entrepreneurs, helping thousands of kitties in the world to get shelter and a chance of finding a forever home.

My brother and I are aware of how difficult is reaching the target of donation needed, however, we know that there are millions of cat-people like us, that love cats unconditionally and feel that they all deserve a human family that takes care of them, for all their life.

Even if you cannot contribute personally, you can still help us a lot! How? By sharing our mission! Please utilise the sharing tools of this Indiegogo page, then put a like on our Facebook page, follow us on Twitter and tell all your friends! This would really be great and help us... and our feline furiends.

Also, please write your thoughts and your love' messages on the comment section, we will respond to everyone!

Sincerely

Martina and Leo,

Founders of The Cats' Lodge, the first hotel where humans will be cats' guests!

Especially in Italy, because of the ongoing economic crisis, the Government and the activists do not have enough money to offer real solutions to this problem. As a result, colonies of stray cats keep growing, making the problem worse day after day for our furry friends, that struggle to cope without the care they deserve.With your donation, you will contribute in making the most innovative idea of the year become true: the creation of the very first ""CAT HOTEL"" in the world, a social enterprise that will rescue stray cats, and will give them a chance to be adopted by the guests of the hotel. Moreover, the guests of the Hotel will enjoy the healing property of cats, and will get loads of purrs and meows!In order to make this paw-tastic idea become true, we will need £230.000. About £180.000 will be invested to purchase a beautiful manor near Calcata, a beautiful medieval town located near Roma. The other £60.000 will be utilised to refurbish the manor and create all the facilities of the B&B, such as eight guests' rooms, kitchen, garden pool, guests parking etc...We have some special presents for every cat-lover that will contribute to this campaign
column5: for donations of up to £20 we will give access to a blog in which we will document the creation of our social enterprise. For donations of £250, we will offer a weekend at The Cats' Lodge, inclusive of airport shuttle service from Rome's airports. For greater donations, you will receive an invitation to the opening of The Cats' Lodge, and a complimentary 3-night stay for two people. Are you thinking to donate more? For our super donors, a life-long free accommodation at The Cats' Lodge may be offered! In case we will not reach the target of money needed, we will open a similar business concept in the UK
column6: all the donors will be notified and will be able to get a refund if they want to!We really feel that this concept is a clever evolution of the cat-cafes' idea. In fact, if successful this concept will be embraced by other entrepreneurs, helping thousands of kitties in the world to get shelter and a chance of finding a forever home.My brother and I are aware of how difficult is reaching the target of donation needed, however, we know that there are millions of cat-people like us, that love cats unconditionally and feel that they all deserve a human family that takes care of them, for all their life.Even if you cannot contribute personally, you can still help us a lot! How? By sharing our mission! Please utilise the sharing tools of this Indiegogo page, then put a like on our Facebook page, follow us on Twitter and tell all your friends! This would really be great and help us... and our feline furiends.Also, please write your thoughts and your love' messages on the comment section, we will respond to everyone!SincerelyMartina and Leo,Founders of The Cats' Lodge, the first hotel where humans will be cats' guests!",1.0,0,"1 Campaign
