The Astronaut Travel Pillow gets its name for its resemblance to astronaut suits and the use of spatial material (memory foam). It has an original ergonomic design with a built-in hood and a super supportive memory foam filling that accommodates everyone’s neck for the best unimaginable comfort.

ADVANCED FOAM: thanks to the Premium memory foam core, your head, chin, and neck will be perfectly supported throughout your trip, no matter how long this one is. The pros of memory foam are:

column1: Relief and prevent pressure points by distributing weight across the surface of the pillow
Support spinal alignment for a better positioning of the back and lumbar when sitting
Reduce allergens, as the foam is naturally inhospitable to microbes and dust
Have a long-lasting lifespan (average of 3 years) because the foam is more resilient

ORIGINAL DESIGN: a detachable hood made of eyelet fabric - which is a super soft, machine washable and breathable fabric, makes this travel pillow smarter to stand out from the rest. The hood will allow you to escape from what’s surrounding you to fall into a deep sleep. The region of the hood that falls over the eyes has a double-layer fabric to prevent the light from bothering you, as well as to giving you some privacy to comfortably rest. The size of the hood is suitable for children and adults and is ample enough to use even if you are wearing headphones.

A FIT FOR ALL USERS: to ensure that every neck can benefit from the support of the Astronaut Travel Pillow, an adjustable buckle strap system is added to enlarge or narrow the pillow’ neck size so that it fits every traveler. The strap is made of durable black nylon to match this spatial neck pillow!

ELASTIC SIDE STORAGE POCKET: situated on the right arm of this travel pillow, an elastic deep pocket allows you to place your smartphone without falling down while you listen to music. It is also the perfect place to store the hood when you don’t use it, as well as any other small item or device such as a mp3 player.

EASY CARRY: fold both arms towards the inner part of this pillow and roll the body up to wrap the arms for a more compact size. Then use the matching color pouch that is included with the pillow to store it and ease its transport. You can easily attach it to your backpack or tuck it inside. The Astronaut pillow will not slow down your trip pace as it only weighs 1.27 lbs. (575 g)

1. BASIC POSITION WITH HOOD: use the travel pillow as a U-Shape model with the longer pillow section facing downwards. You will experience great chin, neck and head support. Put the hood on to isolate you from your surroundings and to prevent the light from bothering you for a pleasant sleep during your trip.

2. UPSIDE-DOWN FOR EXTRA HEAD SUPPORT: if you need to add extra support to your head, turn the pillow upside down and use the longer pillow section to rest your head on its padded surface. To prevent the hood from bothering you when using the pillow in this position, you can easily unzip it and store it inside the right arm pocket.

3. LEANING AGAINST A WALL FOR SIDE SUPPORT: if you travel in the window seat of a train, bus, aircraft or car, you can turn the long pillow section towards the window to comfortably lean against it and sleep on this well-padded surface. You will prevent your head from annoyingly knocking on the window.

4. ON YOUR LOWER BACK FOR LUMBAR SUPPORT: place the pillow in your lumbar region with the concave part of the pillow facing your back and the longer pillow section downwards. The pillow wraps around your lower back and lumbar regions to keep your back properly aligned, reduce stress and alleviate pain. It is highly recommended for those that spend too many hours sitting at work.

5. IN THE CAR SEAT HEADREST: fasten the pillow on the car seat headrest with the buckle strap and rest your head against the pillow section so your neck and head will be properly aligned and supported, preventing pain and stiffness in your neck, especially when driving for long hours.

6. AS A WEDGE PILLOW: fold both arms towards the inner part of the body pillow to shape it as a wedge pillow. You will be able to lean your head against the long pillow section when lounging on a recliner, laying on the floor when camping or to take a few minutes to rest on your office desk.

LANGRIA is a home &
column2:
office brand that was born to help you live an easier life without spending a fortune. We are in constant search of furniture and goods that are good quality, functional and contemporary. It was exactly this seeking-for-improvement spirit that drove some of our most avid staff members to draft the design of a new innovative travel pillow, after realizing that every time they traveled, the same issue repeated: the lack of comfort, support, and portability all-in-one single pillow.

And this is how the idea got started.

A lot of hours, drafts and tests happened before we came up with the final design. A unique travel pillow which offers great SUPPORT thanks to its high-quality memory foam,  BREATHABILITY with the outer eyelet fabric, to help to dissipate body heat, EASY CARRY as its normal size can be squeezy into a more compact one and UNIVERSAL COMFORT for every user thanks to the 6 different ways in which this pillow can be used. And that is how the Astronaut Travel Pillow was born.

Can I choose other colors?
The Astronaut Pillow is only available in its dual blue &
column3: grey sky-like colors. Let us know if you have other color combinations that you'd like to have
column4:
)

What are the dimensions of the pillow?
The Astronaut travel pillow measures 12 x 11 x 11 inches (30 x 28 x 28 cm) and weighs 1.27 lbs. (575 g)

My PayPal transaction doesn’t work, what should I do?
Email the Indiegogo Customer Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any payment issues.

How much will it cost to ship the Astronaut Travel Pillow to my country?
We offer free shipping to every country.

I have other questions not answered here. Who can help me?
We’re happy to respond to any further queries you might have about the Astronaut Travel Pillow. You can ask us in the Comment section of this page or visit our official website: www.langria.com/pages/astronaut-travel-pillow

We want to ask for your help and support so the whole world and outer space can learn about the Astronaut Travel Pillow! Tell your traveler friends, family and everyone else around you!

All help is welcomed here! Share on your Facebook wall, Twitter, tell your friends, your neighbours, your butcher…! Help us spread the word, we need your support.

HAPPY SLEEPING!

 

","The Astronaut Travel Pillow gets its name for its resemblance to astronaut suits and the use of spatial material (memory foam). It has an original ergonomic design with a built-in hood and a super supportive memory foam filling that accommodates everyone’s neck for the best unimaginable comfort.ADVANCED FOAM: thanks to the Premium memory foam core, your head, chin, and neck will be perfectly supported throughout your trip, no matter how long this one is. The pros of memory foam are:

column1: Relief and prevent pressure points by distributing weight across the surface of the pillow
Support spinal alignment for a better positioning of the back and lumbar when sitting
Reduce allergens, as the foam is naturally inhospitable to microbes and dust
Have a long-lasting lifespan (average of 3 years) because the foam is more resilient

ORIGINAL DESIGN: a detachable hood made of eyelet fabric - which is a super soft, machine washable and breathable fabric, makes this travel pillow smarter to stand out from the rest. The hood will allow you to escape from what’s surrounding you to fall into a deep sleep. The region of the hood that falls over the eyes has a double-layer fabric to prevent the light from bothering you, as well as to giving you some privacy to comfortably rest. The size of the hood is suitable for children and adults and is ample enough to use even if you are wearing headphones.A FIT FOR ALL USERS: to ensure that every neck can benefit from the support of the Astronaut Travel Pillow, an adjustable buckle strap system is added to enlarge or narrow the pillow’ neck size so that it fits every traveler. The strap is made of durable black nylon to match this spatial neck pillow!ELASTIC SIDE STORAGE POCKET: situated on the right arm of this travel pillow, an elastic deep pocket allows you to place your smartphone without falling down while you listen to music. It is also the perfect place to store the hood when you don’t use it, as well as any other small item or device such as a mp3 player.EASY CARRY: fold both arms towards the inner part of this pillow and roll the body up to wrap the arms for a more compact size. Then use the matching color pouch that is included with the pillow to store it and ease its transport. You can easily attach it to your backpack or tuck it inside. The Astronaut pillow will not slow down your trip pace as it only weighs 1.27 lbs. (575 g)1. BASIC POSITION WITH HOOD: use the travel pillow as a U-Shape model with the longer pillow section facing downwards. You will experience great chin, neck and head support. Put the hood on to isolate you from your surroundings and to prevent the light from bothering you for a pleasant sleep during your trip.2. UPSIDE-DOWN FOR EXTRA HEAD SUPPORT: if you need to add extra support to your head, turn the pillow upside down and use the longer pillow section to rest your head on its padded surface. To prevent the hood from bothering you when using the pillow in this position, you can easily unzip it and store it inside the right arm pocket.3. LEANING AGAINST A WALL FOR SIDE SUPPORT: if you travel in the window seat of a train, bus, aircraft or car, you can turn the long pillow section towards the window to comfortably lean against it and sleep on this well-padded surface. You will prevent your head from annoyingly knocking on the window.4. ON YOUR LOWER BACK FOR LUMBAR SUPPORT: place the pillow in your lumbar region with the concave part of the pillow facing your back and the longer pillow section downwards. The pillow wraps around your lower back and lumbar regions to keep your back properly aligned, reduce stress and alleviate pain. It is highly recommended for those that spend too many hours sitting at work.5. IN THE CAR SEAT HEADREST: fasten the pillow on the car seat headrest with the buckle strap and rest your head against the pillow section so your neck and head will be properly aligned and supported, preventing pain and stiffness in your neck, especially when driving for long hours.6. AS A WEDGE PILLOW: fold both arms towards the inner part of the body pillow to shape it as a wedge pillow. You will be able to lean your head against the long pillow section when lounging on a recliner, laying on the floor when camping or to take a few minutes to rest on your office desk.LANGRIA is a home & office brand that was born to help you live an easier life without spending a fortune. We are in constant search of furniture and goods that are good quality, functional and contemporary. It was exactly this seeking-for-improvement spirit that drove some of our most avid staff members to draft the design of a new innovative travel pillow, after realizing that every time they traveled, the same issue repeated: the lack of comfort, support, and portability all-in-one single pillow.And this is how the idea got started.A lot of hours, drafts and tests happened before we came up with the final design. A unique travel pillow which offers great SUPPORT thanks to its high-quality memory foam,  BREATHABILITY with the outer eyelet fabric, to help to dissipate body heat, EASY CARRY as its normal size can be squeezy into a more compact one and UNIVERSAL COMFORT for every user thanks to the 6 different ways in which this pillow can be used. And that is how the Astronaut Travel Pillow was born.Can I choose other colors?The Astronaut Pillow is only available in its dual blue & grey sky-like colors. Let us know if you have other color combinations that you'd like to have
column2: )What are the dimensions of the pillow?The Astronaut travel pillow measures 12 x 11 x 11 inches (30 x 28 x 28 cm) and weighs 1.27 lbs. (575 g)My PayPal transaction doesn’t work, what should I do?Email the Indiegogo Customer Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any payment issues.How much will it cost to ship the Astronaut Travel Pillow to my country?We offer free shipping to every country.I have other questions not answered here. Who can help me?We’re happy to respond to any further queries you might have about the Astronaut Travel Pillow. You can ask us in the Comment section of this page or visit our official website: www.langria.com/pages/astronaut-travel-pillowWe want to ask for your help and support so the whole world and outer space can learn about the Astronaut Travel Pillow! Tell your traveler friends, family and everyone else around you!All help is welcomed here! Share on your Facebook wall, Twitter, tell your friends, your neighbours, your butcher…! Help us spread the word, we need your support.HAPPY SLEEPING!",26.0,0,"1 Campaign

CASE is NOT just a Smart Suitcase.  It is is a total solution to your travel needs.  It is your TRAVEL CONCIERGE.

I am looking for a seed funding of US$35,000.  The fund sought will be used to finance part of production cost of the first batch of keaCASE and the launch the keaCASE apps on the cloud.  I will seek funding from other sources to finance the remaining.
My vision is this ""we, frequent travellers, deserve a real travel tool which is more than just a suitcase with various impractical gimmicks. We want a travel  concierge""
For people who share the same vision as me and is willing to making contribution to this never seen before solution, I am willing to provide the following perks:
- 40% discount off retail price of keaCASE

- A unique limited edition keaCASE souvenir - 330 pieces ONLY in total.  You can even have your name engraved if your contribution amount is more than $80 [please see the photo below that is am indicative example of the souvenir - also designed by myself]
I manage innovation products for various industries. I am an electronic engineer by training.  I need to travel frequently for business and for pleasure.

I love travelling although for many years,  I always get myself tangled up with annoying travel details the moment I confirm a trip.  I need to check weather forecast a couple of days before departure to make sure I bring the appropriate clothing.  I need  to find a way to pack efficiently and to make sure luggage is not overweight.

On the day of travel, I need to make sure I leave for the airport early enough and not to be caught by traffic conditions.  I then need to know which terminal to go to.   At the terminal, I need to look up the localities of counters to check in.  Then I need to find my way to the departure gate before I can finally go on board and relax!
BUT the story does not end there. On arrival, i need to find out which baggage carousel i should go to. Then comes the endless wait ... ""where is my luggage""
keaCASE looks after all of them for you.
I completed all the design and built the first prototypes.  I want to put it in production.  I will be the first one to use keaCASE.  I am sure you will love to use keaCASE too.
I have deep product design experiences and excellent business management skills to ensure it is will be a successful project - a product solution that will change the way we travel.

column2: >With you all the way - travel independence for travellers with reduced mobility.

column1: Traveller Chair is a carry-on bag that turns into a wheelchair. It’s a revolution for travellers with reduced mobility - in particular anyone who has difficulty walking between modes of travel.
No more waiting at airport terminals for service providers to bring you a wheelchair - Traveller Chair is with you all the way.
Traveller Chair transforms from a carry-on case into a wheelchair in about thirty seconds.
• Meets the carry-on specifications of over 40 airlines
• Comes with a shoulder strap for carrying when not in use as a wheelchair
• Has easy reach pockets on the front and rear for your travel documents, novels and guide books
If you’re travelling with reduced mobility, you’ve got enough stress without the additional worry of locating a wheelchair or waiting for a service provider.

With Traveller Chair you are completely in charge of your travel experience. When not in use as a wheelchair, simply fold it down and take it through security as your carry-on bag. Once you're through, unfold into chair mode as you move around the departure lounge for shopping and dining.

You and your travel companion are independent, and with reduced waiting times you are free to peruse the departure lounge at your leisure. 

 

With You All The Way
Once you arrive at your destination, unfold the chair straight away for an easy journey through arrivals.
No more waiting for a service provider, or for your chair to be retrieved from the hold. Traveller Chair is with you all the way, whenever you need it.
Greater freedom leads to greater self-esteem and a better travel experience from home to destination and back again.
• Quick and easy to fold and unfold

column2: dimensions 350 x 550 x 200mm folded, making it suitable for use as a carry-on bag on over 40 airlines

column1: • Carry strap and handle offer multiple carrying options

We’re launching on Indiegogo to raise funds towards the first shipment of completed products. We’re a small company without outside investment, so any funds we have in advance of our factory order will help us.
For Indiegogo backers we have Traveller Chairs with up to £50 off the retail price, with worldwide shipping.

Our goal is £22,000. If we don’t reach that, we’re still launching in July 2020 and you will still get your Traveller Chair!

 

About the Company
Traveller Chair was created by Richard Williams - an experienced engineer and manufacturing specialist.

Richard’s wife Jane has cerebral palsy and finds it difficult to walk long distances. The couple love to travel, and frequently encounter difficulties at airports having to wait for third-party wheelchair providers to help them or, at worst, not getting any help at all.

On a return trip from a holiday in Asia, they arrived back in the UK where their arranged service provider didn’t turn up. At 4AM, with no staff around to help, Richard had to search the airport for a wheelchair that they could use. It was at this point that he had a lightbulb moment and realised that with his expertise, he could fix this.

Over the last few years, Richard has worked on numerous proof of concepts before settling on a design that has been iterated by designer Stephen Carnelly. In 2019 they received the first factory prototype which they used for destructive testing and design tweaks.

In January 2020 they received factory prototype version two, which has been approved for manufacture with only minor cosmetic tweaks.

 

Risks, Challenges and Timeline
We have just approved the second factory prototype with minor changes, so at this point there are very few challenges ahead.
The latest prototype has passed all necessary tests and has been given the green light for manufacture.

The factory is tooling up and will take 8 weeks to make the first batch of Traveller Chairs. This batch will then take 6 weeks to arrive in the UK to start shipping worldwide from our chosen fulfilment centre in Swindon.
Even if Traveller Chair isn’t a product you need, please share this page wherever you can.
Someone you know might know someone who would really benefit from our product, whether that’s someone with reduced mobility that is lifelong or temporary (e.g. injuries or post-op).

Hey! I'm Dave Odd, I was a stand-up comedian for 15 years and have been a lifelong naturalist. I have been Chicago's only full time professional forager since 2009 serving Chicago's finest restaurants and guiding my Eat the Neighborhood foraging tours for the public. It was always my dream to own property in the wilderness where people could come enjoy and learn about the splendor of nature. This is what the Land of Odd is all about. I will also be running very unique survival camp programs in conjunction with award winning chefs there.

The Land of Odd in Beaverville IL sits on 2 acres of pristine Kankakee Sands Prairie, one of the most unique habitats in the United States. 18 species of reptiles and amphibians, countless bird species, deer, turkey, bobwhite quail, coyotes, red fox, groundhogs, rare insects and butterflies, endangered species, and dozens of species of plants and wildflowers have all been observed on the property.

I've poured my heart and soul and life savings into this place and unfortunate events with shady contractors doing shoddy work or none at all have delayed the completion of the cabin and this is the last little bit I need to get it finished. My intention is that the Land of Odd will be a community center and meeting place for herpers, birders, wildlife photographers &
column2: enthusiasts, botanists, researchers, hunters, fisherman, and anyone and everyone who enjoys the outdoors or just needs an escape.

column1: I found a reliable, certified contractor to finish up the cabin, which will include insulating the ceiling, finishing the bathroom walls, and general shoring and sealing up and correcting the mistakes of previous work done. I need about $5000 to complete this with labor and materials and any left over will go towards furnishing the interior.
I have included a wide selection of perks, from use of the Land of Odd and campsites, to admission for my Eat the Neighborhood foraging tours, to produce bags, and more.
Thanks you in advance for your support!

column3:
>

 

The legendary stability of the round Mongolian Ger meets the innovations of the modern tent to introduce the most durable, portable, affordable, and comfortable living space ever in a four-season tent.

 

Sturdy architecture. Trusted for 3,000 years.

The Mongolian ger has a unique architectural structure with a sturdy round shape that was introduced over 3,000 years ago due to its hardiness and ease of transportation required by a nomadic lifestyle. Using this same trusted architecture, with improvements from modern innovations and materials, GerTent has successfully tested against the strong winds of the Great Plains of Mongolia and withstands the harshest elements of all four seasons.

 

Setup in 15. Takedown in 10.

assembled in 10-15 minutes by two people and can be broken down and packed away in as little as 10 minutes. Not only is this ideal for the nomadic but it's perfect for natural disasters and emergency response teams to set up base and aid camps quickly.

column1:
Can't transport a yurt? You can

Separated into 2 bags of equal weight, GerTent is easy to carry and can go pretty much anywhere weighing in total only 35-40 kg (77-88. Let's see a yurt do that!

 

Don't be a square. here.

design invites a welcoming atmosphere that is convenient and communal. It also allows for optimal air ventilation and even distribution of heat.

 

Space to stand, meet, breath, and expand.

Sprawl out, stretch, hold a party, host a gathering, or even add on additional tents. With GerTent, there's always room to live the way you want to. 

 

Not 1, not 2, but 4 doors.

A distinctive feature of GerTent is the 4-way door that emphasizes an open design and increases accessibility. The porch has a height of 1.8 meters (5.9 feet), so you can your head as you go in and out. The other three doors are 1.6 meters (5.3 feet) high and can become very large windows during the daytime, as well as divide each room into separate bedrooms and connect additional sleeping tents.

 

Complete with Sky Window.

Highlighting a key Mongolian feature, the roof is designed like the crown wheel of yurts which provides access to light and air. And don't worry, it has a fly and mosquito repellent mesh protection to keep out those pesky pests.

 

Your campfire—INSIDE your tent.

a 4-seasonal tent, therefore it is possible to make a fire in the stove during the cold weather to keep the tent cozy. You can also cook right from the comfort of your tent. A chimney made from non-combustible material will not burn +200 degrees.

 

Attachable Front Porch

The porch can be connected to the front-facing door. In addition to using it for storage, it can also be used to sleep 2-3 people.

 

Room Divider

Since GerTent has 4 doors, 2-3 households can make their own sleeping area and use it as a room.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Breaking - Traveling without a good tent can be uncomfortable, not to mention the risk of severe storms and floods. While we were traveling through the windy Mongolian steppe, we saw all the tents were collapsing and only Mongolian was fine. And that’s how we made our product. Therefore, it has become the most durable and comfortable product. We have been experimenting with our product for four seasons to make it the most durable and best product. The round shape, joint parts, sockets, fabric material, assembly and dismantling of our tent can completely reduce the risk of breakage. When you build your tent, it has a very durable structure that does not need any ropes. Just like Mongolian Even though there is a rope to use on special occasions, it is not necessary to use it on normal days.

Size and Capacity - The tent is spacious and capacious, and the material is resistant to any natural phenomena, therefore it has a lot of weight, but we have been very careful about keeping the size small. Even though it’s a spacious tent, we were able to provide the correct structure to fit in the back of a small car when packaged.

Competition - There are a lot of similar products in the market, but we have made our product better with technical solutions, in quality, designing to users’ needs, and is available not only for travel and leisure but also on many other occasions, as well as for environmental friendliness and reliability. In addition to using GerTent as Camping, it is also possible to use it as Glamping.

Development and Certificate - All tests of water, moisture, wind, cold, assemble and dismantle, etc. and patented. Now, with your support, it is ready to go into production and to the market. This is not a prototype, but it is a product that is ready to go into production. Also, we designed a lot of products that can be used in GerTent and are now in the middle of the process so there will be a whole ecosystem of products.

Production - We are working together with the best luxury tent manufacturers with over 20 years of experience to reduce our production risk.

Price - For customers, the product price is the most important. We have worked hard on every detail to make our product a durable, water-proof, fire-resistant, and consumer-friendly product. Therefore, we are offering our customers the best affordable price for competition in the market and appropriate for the quality of the product.

Delivery and Shipment - Our product will be delivered to you at the beginning of the summer season. With warm weather, relaxing in the backyard, Glamping, our products can provide unbelievable comfort. Since it is a 4-season tent, it's best for adventurous trips even in winter. Because we made the most durable and comfortable product that meets the needs of our customers.

Also, we designed a lot of products that can be used in GerTent and are now in the middle of the process so there will be a whole ecosystem of products.Production - We are working together with the best luxury tent manufacturers with over 20 years of experience to reduce our production risk.Price - For customers, the product price is the most important. We have worked hard on every detail to make our product a durable, water-proof, fire-resistant, and consumer-friendly product. Therefore, we are offering our customers the best affordable price for competition in the market and appropriate for the quality of the product.Delivery and Shipment - Our product will be delivered to you at the beginning of the summer season. With warm weather, relaxing in the backyard, Glamping, our products can provide unbelievable comfort. Since it is a 4-season tent, it's best for adventurous trips even in winter. Because we made the most durable and comfortable product that meets the needs of our customers.",28.0,2,"1 Campaign

This campaign has ended, but Firefly is now available for immediate purchase on our website tortoisegear.com and is shipping now (ships within 3 business days)!  Please come and visit us.   

Disclaimer:  We want to make it abundantly clear to everyone that we are not affiliated with or endorsed in any way by Victorinox AG or their trademarked name Swiss Army.  The Firefly is a patent pending aftermarket accessory designed by us for use with the Swiss Army knife. 

 What is the Firefly?

The Firefly is a custom sparking-steel fire starting tool designed to work seamlessly with a large variety of Swiss Army knives.  

The Firefly is tailor made to replace the toothpick in a Swiss Army knife or tool, it is plug-and-play, and no knife modifications are required.

 

 

 Featured in:

 

  

Tap on the icons below to throw some sparks! #SAKFirefly

Help grow the community.  We've done the work for you, just click and share!
column3:
description="" rel=""noopener nofollow"">

Features.

The Firefly comes in two sizes:  

The regular Firefly - for medium and large sized Swiss Army knives.  

And the Firefly Mini - for smaller and Classic key chain style knives.   

 

The Firefly comes in two colors:

Neon Green-Yellow Glow:

Ivory / Glow:

The Firefly is hard to lose:

The thumbnail grip on the end of the Firefly is bright in the day and it glows in the dark which makes it is highly visible both day and night. 

 

 

 The Firefly won't fall out. Even after many uses when much of it has been scraped away it still fits snugly. 

Well used, but still fits snugly in place without falling out.

The Firefly is easy to use: 

The Firefly fits easily into any Swiss Army Knife toothpick slot. 

Fits Any Knife with a Toothpick

It also fits in Swiss Army tools with toothpicks.

The injection molded thumb grip makes the Firefly easy to remove for use.

The Firefly is easy to spark.  It's custom mixed sparking material is about twice as easy to spark as a typical firesteel / ferrocerium rod.

The Firefly is designed to be a soft sparking steel, so it can be easily used with any sharp edged tool on the Swiss Army Knife.

Any of these tools and more can be used to start a fire.

The Firefly throws large, long-lasting sparks so it is easy to light a variety of tinders or fuel.

The Firefly is a tested design and its stronger:

As well as being easier to spark, it is also stronger.  

We've been able to carefully tailor the sparking material mix to double the break strength of a typical ferrocerrium/firesteel mix.

On our testing rig the custom firefly sparking material measured twice as strong as conventional firesteel sparking material mixes, which means less breaking and more sparking.

The Firefly is a very capable fire starter, able to light many different types of tinder and fuel.

Light weight and takes up no space:

Using the toothpick slot as a holder for the Firefly means that no extra pocket bulk is added, and the Firefly weighs almost nothing.

No Bulky Pockets!

Pledge With Confidence.

We will ALWAYS Deliver!

We don't just create crowd funding projects we help fund them too and we know how frustrating it is to pledge for a project that never delivers.  We will never do that to our valued supporters.

We WILL deliver PERIOD.

Rewards.

Just click on the reward you want from the column at the left, enter the pledge amount and hit continue.  

If you want more you can add that to your pledge amount.  

For example: If you want the Firefly 8 Pack perk, but you also want a Firefly Mini 3 Pack, just select the Firefly 8 Pack perk and add in the additional amount of the Firefly Mini 3 Pack. You can tell us exactly what you pledged for in the order details.

How many should I get?  We recommend at least two per Swiss Army knife
column4:
one for practice and use, and one for a backup.

 

 

Supporters of the $14 and $18 perks will be able to choose all of one color or all of the other, no mix and match will be available for these pledge levels.  

Supporters of the $35 perk will have a choice between all of one color or half one color and half the other color (half and half reg and half and half Mini). No custom mix and match at this level. 

Supporters of perks $60 or more can mix and match the colors and sizes they want.

Timeline.

2009 - Idea, early prototypes.

2012 - Stronger materials testing and development begins.

2015 - Discussions begin with suppliers.

2016 - Special tooling ordered to produce sparking steels.

June 2017 -  Production samples of Firefly arrived and tested

August 2017 - Discussions with US production manufacturers for injection molding.  

September 2017 - Manufacturer chosen.  Crowd funding project begins. Plastic injection molds designed.

October 2017 - Crowd funding period.

November 2017 - Pre-orders. Production begins on Firefly tooling

December 2017 - Production starts on first run of the Firefly.

April 2018 - Perk shipment begins.  

Meet The Team.

This is an Eagle Scout project that will reinvigorate this beautiful park and bring back a more modern yet natural feel to it. The money that I raise will go towards the construction and placement of these three new kiosks throughout the park. These new kiosks will be a tremendous upgrade for the older ones, with new features such as an enclosure that is easily opened so that information can be switched out more efficiently, and a beautiful new roof design that will compliment the surroundings. The funds will go to things like lumber, tools and the transportation of materials that will be essential to the completion of the project. The rank of Eagle Scout is something that I have been working towards for the last seven years and with this being the last stepping stone I am more motivated then ever to complete it to the best of my ability. If you would like to see my progress throughout this project please feel free to join the Facebook group ""Ocean County Park Eagle Project"", and help spread the word. So please help me breathe new life into this historic and beautiful park.

","Help Me Raise Money to Finish My Business So I Can Help OthersMy name is Laura Rachel, and I am in the process of renovating an Atlanta-area building for the purposes of housing my fledgling business. That business is Gem Marigold Transformational Tattoo where I help mastectomy patients regain a measure of normalcy with cosmetic restoration in the form of 3D ink. So what does all that mean? It means that as a tattoo artist, I apply new areolae and nipples to the remaining breast tissue or reconstructed breast tissue of former cancer patients in such a way as to give the effect of appearing three-dimensional. In addition to mammographic artistry, I also perform scar minimization tattooing in order to reduce the appearance of surgical scars and scars incurred through other forms of trauma.While I have had great success with these techniques, and I am blessed to be performing a service that I am so passionate about, I do need help getting my business to the next level. I hope to be able to do that through the support of the Atlanta medical community, and this is where you come in. The area of town I was able to set up in is undergoing a renaissance of sorts and requires a lot of TLC. As I am in the early stages of my business, I lack the capital to make the improvements to the building I’m in that so desperately need to be made. My hope is to hold an open house for both the public and the medical community in order to get the word out about my business, but I can’t do it in the current state it’s in.If you were to give to my cause, this is what your contributions would be going towards: Starting with the exterior of the building, the parking lot needs surfacing, an awning needs to be erected and several yard improvements need to be made. As to the interior, I have already made numerous repairs and upgrades, but there are plumbing repairs (I must meet many stringent codes for my particular business) and soundproofing from the business upstairs, among other things, that still need to be addressed. My goal in life is to give back by helping others feel better about themselves, and I hope to do it through this medium. If this campaign exceeds my wildest dreams I will acquire a laser to address the one kind of scar tattoo cannot cover.If breast cancer and breast cancer awareness are important subjects to you, please consider donating. Your generosity here today can help others heal in ways that are unimaginable to most people untouched by this devastating illness. Thank you for taking the time to read this, and it is my sincerest wish that you find it within your heart to donate to my cause.All perks have numbers that add up to the number 9 which enables completion of the process, thus making it whole - with the exception of 1111 which is a digital translation of connection.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hop on now and HELP us change the way we move the world!

The Trikaroo Boomer (patent pending) is a small footprint two person three wheel electric vehicle, that is small enough to go through a standard doorway. It is both fun and functional with plenty of storage, including a removable grocery basket.  It carries two passengers
column2: one behind the other making this an ADA compliant vehicle allowing usage on sidewalks, bike lanes, and if the operator or passenger has a disability it can be driven in malls, large shopping centers, and theme parks.  It can travel at speeds of up to 18 mph with a 500 pound load capacity.  With a single charge costing as little as 12 cents, you may go a distance of 40 miles. Making the Trikaroo Boomer one of the most cost effective passenger vehicle on the market.

column1: You can fit 10 Trikaroo Boomers in one parking space.
Our founder Gina Garcia has had a love for trikes
ever since her parents purchased her a Big Wheel in the 70’s. Her fondness
towards anything on wheels grew to BMX, Rode, and Mountain bikes.<span>  Finding herself volunteering for the Military
Cycling Association during her time in the Navy.  At the end of Gina’s enlistment she found
herself at a cross roads between College and Entrepreneurship and decide on
opening a local bicycle shop. During her many years as a shop owner she has
come across many styles of bicycles and tricycles.  But became fixated with an ornate Pedicab a
customer had brought in, that reminded her of the pictures and stories from her
mother operating them in the Philippines in the 50’s and 60’s.
Gina’s wheels began to spin with the
idea of why can’t they operate something like this in the United States and
with that initiative she had began to operate and design a modern version of
this old world technology. With her traditional
designs of pedicabs she was receiving common feedback.<span>  Can these be made smaller and do you have
something I don’t have to pedal? With the knowledge of what people had wanted,
the idea of creating something fun to ride like her Big Wheel and functional
like her mother's pedicabs. Gina had packed up and moved to Southeast Asia for a
year to study the transportation in the Philippines, Thailand, and China. Gina’s
explorations emerged with an innovative Urban Design of an E-Trike sturdy
enough take a passenger as well as cargo and small enough to go through a standard
doorway.  Her mission, fun and functional, is
now complete with her creation of the Trikaroo Boomer.
was derived from two words ""trike"" (vehicle having three wheels) and
kangaroo"" the largest member of the marsupial family (animals that
carry their young). Think of it like a kangaroo on roller skates!
Trikaroo's are named after kangaroos. So of course we
had to name our flagship vehicle “Boomer” (the Alpha male kangaroo).
a Trikaroo and experience the coolest most unique way to get around. Take your
kids or your favorite copilot and hop on this convenient electric-powered
vehicle and zip around town, see the sights, and more.
<li>Is to use the funds for manufacturing larger
• To buy tooling for in house customization.
• To attend trade shows to introduce our product to dealers so they can carry the Trikaroo Boomer in stores near you.
three wheels with the rear wheels having a negative camber (wheels leaning in)
in turning so little balance is required.
• Orange arm rest for additional visibility and comfort
• Motor: 48 volt 350 watt rear wheel single drive
*Speed and distance varies by riders weight, terrain, road surface, temperature, average speed and acceleration.
• Post this campaign on your facebook, twitter, instagram, pinterest and any other social media outlet.
• Forward it to any news outlet that maybe looking for a story.
Hop on now and HELP us change the way we move the world!
The biggest factor that mitigates the risk of supporting us is that we
are already an on-going  company. We are turning to Indiegogo to
expand and accelerate our growth, so we can connect with more consumers
about our energy-efficient vehicles and build an
even larger and more engaged community of people who share our vision.
We can only ship to a airport or port - contributor is responsible for picking up freight and paying for duties and taxes.

To Mexico City - $500 - $800
*Must be sent to a business location 

To a Port in Germany $1000


To a Port - Madrid, Spain - $650 - $850
 
To UK - $650 - $850

To China - $650 - $850
 
To Bahamas  - $600 - $800
*All freight pricing are estimations and we always try to keep the shipping costs down.  Pricing and transit times may vary.
Please email us for a specific shipping quote at info@trikaroo.

column9: >FireDragon is the perfect companion whatever your outdoor pursuit.
column13: >FireDragon is a solid cooking and fire lighting fuel that is lightweight, environmentally friendly, water-proof, and non-toxic. It is used by outdoor enthusiasts to light fires and cook food in all weather conditions.

column1: • Easy and quick to ignite – use a flint, match, or lighter
• Does not spoil the taste of food being cooked
• Can be used in a variety of portable cookers

column7:
/>

FireDragon is the perfect companion whether you are camping,

column1: enjoying a festival, lighting a fire or BBQ.
FireDragon has been designed to meet the need for a cleaner, greener,
and safer fuel for outdoor hobbyists.
For many years campers, hikers, trekkers, climbers, back packers,
survivalists, and ramblers alike have commented on their need for a new fuel
that can be used quickly and effectively. They wanted a fuel that was easy to
light, safe to carry, and performed whatever the weather.
Traditional solid fuels can suffer from unreliable performance, soot, foul
Fire Dragon is the product to fix these problems.

solid fuel we have currently tested.

","FireDragon is the perfect companion whatever your outdoor pursuit.FireDragon is a solid cooking and fire lighting fuel that is lightweight, environmentally friendly, water-proof, and non-toxic. It is used by outdoor enthusiasts to light fires and cook food in all weather conditions.
Easy and quick to ignite – use a flint, match, or lighter
Burns cleanly with very little soot
Does not spoil the taste of food being cooked
Made from sustainable, naturally derived bio-ethanol
Fast water boil times (500 ml in 5 minutes)
Will light and burn even when wet
Average block burn time of 8 minutes
Can be used in a variety of portable cookers
FireDragon is the perfect companion whether you are camping,
enjoying a festival, lighting a fire or BBQ.
FireDragon has been designed to meet the need for a cleaner, greener,
and safer fuel for outdoor hobbyists.
For many years campers, hikers, trekkers, climbers, back packers,
survivalists, and ramblers alike have commented on their need for a new fuel
that can be used quickly and effectively. They wanted a fuel that was easy to
light, safe to carry, and performed whatever the weather.
Traditional solid fuels can suffer from unreliable performance, soot, foul
Fire Dragon is the product to fix these problems.Our research has
shown that FireDragon solid fuel offers the fastest water boil time of any
solid fuel we have currently tested.

Update:

Some of our friends wanted to share a video they made about why they are supporting us
column2: ""Are you a Devil's Advocate?"" showcases their answers. We couldn't be more honored by their support.
column4:
amp...

I’m Matthew Feiner, owner and founder of The Devil’s Gear Bike Shop in downtown New Haven.


I started The Devil’s Gear Bike Shop 15 years ago because I saw a real need for a New Haven-based shop that wasn’t just about selling bikes, but about building a community of riders. Our motto has always been “Turning folks into riders, and riders into cyclists.”


For 15 years now, we’ve been helping to grow and support cycling, not only as a sport or means of recreation, but as a viable transportation choice in the city.  


The Devil’s Gear strives to be a good community partner. We donate our supplies and expertise to schools, events, and charities. We’ve provided all of the technical support for the Smilow Center’s ‘Closer to Free’ ride for 4 years. We assemble, tune, and deliver hundreds of bicycles purchased for star students by the City of New Haven.


We work closely with Elm City Cycling, ArtSpace New Haven, and the International Festival of Arts &
column5:
Ideas to build a world-class cycling community in New Haven, hosting bike tours, maintenance clinics, and weekly training rides. We’ve partnered with the City of New Haven to implement bike friendly amenities (bike lanes, bike racks) throughout the city, including New Haven’s first separated cycle track to be built in 2015. The Devil’s Gear has been a key participant in bringing real progress to our city and we’re proud of all we’ve done.


We made changes in recent years to provide better service to our customers, including moving into a bigger, more central location, hiring more staff, and bringing in more stock. Some of these initiatives didn’t work out as we hoped, and the economic downturn affected us as it did so many businesses.  


We’ve tried to always be there for friends in need, whether individuals, nonprofits, arts organizations, or the City of New Haven. Now, we’re the ones in need and we’re asking for help. We’re trying to raise some money to help cover debts we incurred during our growth.


We’re in a tight space, and we could really use a hand. If you’ve ever wanted to thank us for changing your flat, or supporting you on a ride, now is the time to help. Thank you.
