column1: Our integrated laundry bag helps you stay organized while traveling and is a great place to store dirty clothes. It also fits perfectly in the 24L backpack so you can compress and pack your dirty clothes.
Do These Bags Come With A Warranty?

Of Course! We stand behind our products 100%. We built these bags to last, and we include a lifetime warranty with every bag. For as long as you own the product, we will provide a warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.
It does not cover general wear and tear or by using the item for other than its intended purpose.
Unfortunately, we can not mark any rewards as a gift... and we won't do it. It is illegal to do so.

Import duties and taxes are not included in our reward levels. It is next to impossible to build in customs charges into our individual rewards, so, unfortunately, we cannot include this in our reward levels.

We have found multiple online tools that can help determine duties and have have included an example below.  We are not the creators of this online tool, and in no way shape or form are affiliated, so please use this as an estimate.
We believe in our products, and will replace or repair items that fall within our warranty guidelines, However, we do not offer refunds or returns on any Kickstarter rewards.

We have worked tirelessly to ensure we have everything lines up and is ready to go once we are funded and our campaign ends. We have personally visited the factory, and are in constant contact with our manufacturer. We are and will do everything in our power to follow our projected timeline and deliver a quality bag as soon as humanly possible.
With anything, there can and always be unforeseeable risks and challenges. We will do our best to mitigate and resolve those issues when they arise to get you your product as soon as possible.

Built from Necessity and First-Hand Experience
I learned to sew during cancer treatment. It was a great creative outlet for me at a time when I needed it the most.""

WANAKA was founded from a need for a better daypack. From sewing the first prototype to working with the best manufacturers, this brand has evolved from life events that have shaped who we are. For us, WANAKA and our gear reflect the passion for taking advantage of every opportunity, embracing the unknown, and experiencing wild places. We produce quality gear, captivating content, and give our customer something that will last forever.
Months of designing and refining, a trip halfway across the world, and 11 prototypes later... we nailed it

We spent weeks abroad meeting with different manufacturers until we found the perfect fit. From there, we produced sample after sample, testing dozens of different material and hardware combinations. We got closer and closer with each prototype. 11 prototypes later, we nailed it!

From there, we tested the backpack in every way possible: hiking, biking, trail running, canyoneering, rock climbing, ski touring, air travel, bus travel, river trips, mountaineering, bouldering, and more. It was tested in the harshest of conditions during the most rigorous activities. It blew away all of our expectations.

We tested dozens of different fabrics, buckles, and zippers throughout 11 different prototypes. We didn't cut any corners with quality or durability. Top of the line material is used all throughout the WANAKA Adventure Pack.
The Best Materials and Hardware Were Used All Throughout This Pack
EVERYTHING YOU NEED FOR ANY ADVENTURE

The 24 Liter single compartment daypack is the perfect size to hold just enough gear for your daily adventures. You can also split the 24L pack into two separate compartments to keep your gear separate.
The quick pull open and cinch close system and full-length bottom zipper give you quick access to your gear
With a DWR finish the WANAKA Adventure Pack is extremely water resistant

column3:
backpack construction, it allows you to open your bag anywhere, get changed in a clean compartment and carry a clean bag when you are done.

The invention of our utility patent started in Pacifica CA, while changing our wetsuit standing in a plastic box. Like many products' briefs, the reason to invent a bag you can change into was first and foremost because their was a void on the market.

Then came the time to work with lawyers to write a 25 pages utility patent full of ""latin words"". On the utility patent planet the G.Y.S.T bag is ""a clean carrying apparatus"" which we translate into ""a bag that transforms in a changing station you step into.""

BP-30 Features and Specifications

column1: • Expandable pockets, soft inner liners and reflective tape
• Elastic gore to secure items, lateral pockets
• Sternum and waist straps, hook and loop/magnets
• Opens fully flat and contains a stand in mat to change gear

column1: We love adventuring outdoors with friends and family. We also love hammocks, but traditional hammocks are limited to where you can use them.
This is the problem we set out to solve after many frustrating (and treeless) camping adventures in the amazing deserts of southern Utah.

Our goal was to design a portable solution that would allow outdoor adventurists to use their hammocks anywhere in the world. Whether it be a desert, beach, music festival, hotel balcony, bedroom, or your very own backyard.

As development began, we discovered many hammock-lovers shared the same problems we faced such as unpredictable weather, storage needs, bugs and animals. This gave us the idea of putting a protective tent around a relaxing hammock. And so, the Tammock was born. You can now take your hammock adventure anywhere.
Not a tent. Not a hammock. It's a TAMMOCK.

column1: We know you're going to love your Tammock as much as the adventures you take it on. To see how others are using their Tammocks, and to share your unique Tammock styles with the rest of the world, connect with us on Instagram @litoutdoors.
We love adventuring outdoors with friends and family. We also love hammocks, but traditional hammocks are limited to where you can use them.
This is the problem we set out to solve after many frustrating (and treeless) camping adventures in the amazing deserts of southern Utah.

Our goal was to design a portable solution that would allow outdoor adventurists to use their hammocks anywhere in the world. Whether it be a desert, beach, music festival, hotel balcony, bedroom, or your very own backyard.

As development began, we discovered many hammock-lovers shared the same problems we faced such as unpredictable weather, storage needs, bugs and animals. This gave us the idea of putting a protective tent around a relaxing hammock. And so, the Tammock was born. You can now take your hammock adventure anywhere.
Not a tent. Not a hammock. It's a TAMMOCK.
The Tammock is completely freestanding which allows you to hammock absolutely anywhere.
Versatility is built into The Tammock frame. Use it with or without the tent.
DOUBLE ZIP OPENINGS FOR TWICE THE VIEW
Waterproofing provides a comfortable shelter in unpredictable weather.
Storage pockets keep everything within reach.
Additional storage above is perfect for lights and other accessories.
The Tammock packs away into a carry bag.
Read what our friends in the Media are saying.

LIT Outdoors started in 2016 when Daniel Goldfinger (Geography) & Nick Bierwolf (Mechanical Engineering) met as students at the University of Utah. Both had a passion for hammocks, and designing functional outdoor products that could be used around the world in different settings.

As development progressed, so did need for additional collaborators. In 2017-18, LIT Outdoors added wordsmith, Abraham Tinklepaugh as Creative Director, and Riley Hughes to work on Design & Development, one of the first students in the Utah State University Outdoor Product Design program.
To create a community around love for the environment that strengthens human connection to nature and brings people closer to the world that is so gracious to us

You asked for it: Our Titanium carabiner 2.0 is rounded for more capacity and has a lay-flat design.

 

Made from solid, grade 5 aircraft Titanium, our carabiner is lightweight and super strong. Only weighs 6 grams (0.2 oz). 

 

No springs or levers to break, lose or wear out. Just a lifetime of reliable, strong service.

Titanium has good resistance properties (resilience) and high corrosion resistance. It will never rust or wear out due to its 1-piece solid titanium design.

The patent pending Little Pinch More is the first 6 proto types ever manufactured and now displayed with a movie demonstration and pictures on this project that have an overwhelmingly successful results because of my experience gathered while designing and manufacturing fine detailed titanium ideas, similar to jewelry craft.

The machine hours with the high quality EDM wire cutting work shop including the high quality CNC machining work shop is 3 hours for each Little Pinch More that is manufactured direct from 8mm Gr5 titanium plate.
I have also invented the patent pending Carabiner Split Second Key Ring for the perfect match that is offered as an add on reward.

My latest invention Gr5 Titanium key ring accessory called the ""Little Pinch More""  is almost unnoticeable on a key ring that has compact items such as EDC tweezers, fingernail file and clippers, electrical wire cutter an strippers with philips and flat screw drivers, two  size leavers, knife, scissors, bottle and can opener with hidden features such  as a wrench to undo boat trailer shackles and much more.
The Gr5 titanium strength and light weight structure is skin friendly, 100% rust proof, none magnetic, also an item neatly tucked away in a survival kit for when a disaster strikes.
The ""Little Pinch More"" is the perfect gift that will  ""WOW"" the receiver, as the little things can mean a lot.

The Little Bit More Gr5 titanium scissors are designed to compete with the convention nail clippers that are too bulky for key rings, unattractive and rust, the Little Pinch Mores combination of tweezers with a blade on each inside of the tweezers allows left and right hand operation usage.

The Little Pinch More is also designed to compete with conventional tweezers that have sharp edges, bulky, rust and not suited for key rings, the Little Pinch More tweezers are folded into a small structure the size of  6mm X 6mm X 36mm, and is surgical friendly
The little Pinch More is designed to have a small knife neatly unfold from inbetween the tweezers which is also a leaver and flat screw driver.
The Little Pinch More has a compact bottle opener designed to fold out of the structure and combine the tweezers as a leverage to open cap.
The Little Pinch More tweezer with the combined main structure become scissors to cut electrical cord appliances items as well as wire strippers.

The Little Pinch More hole that holds the key ring is used to cut heavy duty three phase electric wire without damaging the cutter blade edge, the wire is placed through the hole and then a weight is pressed down on top of the wire side into the main structures blade that acts as a guillotine to neatly cut the three phase wire,  also the wire plastic surrounding can be rotated around in the hole against the blade in the main structure that cuts the plastic surrounding to allow the electrical cable to be wire stripped.

The little Pinch More tweezers can have a small screw placed in the end of tweezers, the screw driver part automatically presses the top of screw firmly so the screw can be placed and screwed into holes hard to get at.
The Philips screw driver can have added leverage when the main structure is unfolded for extra torque on the screw fixture

The Little Pinch More flat screw driver can have added torque to undo tight screw fixture when the main structure is unfolded,  for extra torsion the tweezers can also fold out to assist as an extra leaver bar on the screw fixture
The Little Pinch More combination knife flat screw driver part can also be used as a lever to pry open can lids

The Little Pinch More tweezers also can be used as a larger lever which has the knife blade part between the tweezers to act as a laminated titanium metal structure that gives it a superior structure strength.

The Little Pinch More knife part also is good for prying open small objects like the small plug in the picture above that covers the screw hole or remove staples or open soft drink cans without damaging finger nails
The Little Pinch More is so small it can be used as a zipper handle for suit cases, tool bags or clothing zippers.
The little Pinch More is handy when wanting to pick or trim flowers
The Little Pinch More scissors can cut strong strapping that is used to secure cardboard packaging.
The Little Pinch More scissors have a scalloped region to allow the finger nail close the cutting edge also because the blade is on both sides this allows right hand and left hand usage.

The Little Pinch More scalloped teeth region act as a gripping handle for when used as a screw driver or knife, especially if oil or grease is on the hands, most of all is a very good fingernail file.

The Little Pinch More can be used as a wrench to undo shackles, such as on a boat trailer that the shackle pin may have rusted in place, or to secure the shackle pin tight, making sure the shackle pin will not undo when in use.
The Little  Pinch More when combined with the Carabineer Split Second Key Ring for added leverage on knife part, is used as a can opener

The Little Pinch More is the perfect match for the Carabineer Split Second Key ring for when one will want to remove quickly and use the Little Pinch More without the Carabineer Split Second Key Ring attached that the Short movie below demonstrates quickly removing the Little Bit More and the keys.
Above pictures are the 6 Little Pinch More prototypes displayed
Pictures is a high quality laser welding machine manufacturer and I who welded the Gr5 titanium pin on the 6 Little Pinch More structures.
The manufactures procedures are in order to start manufacturing which I personally supervise, including the detailed sanding, polishing and laser welding.

The challenge was to make the Little Pinch More, high quality, compact and unique to combine everyday use items on a key a ring that would justify the 3 hours machining time cost and hand craft finishes.

Over time for the last two years I have formed a close team relationship with the EDM and CNC work shop owners in China which the CNC workshop manufacture super fine mold tooling for watches and  jewelry,  the  EDM wire cutting work shop is the best I have  seen for manufacturing fine structures  during a time of over 12 years’ developing  inventions  China.
I have allowed 6 months to manufacture and to mail rewards which this time is needed for the start of the first production run hence the machining hours, sanding and polishing time.
Thank you for viewing  my Little Pinch More Indiegogo Project.
5 Best EDC Multi Tool Gadgets You Must Have !

column2: the birth of a Bike Park

column1: By now you may have watched the video and realised that I'm neither an actor, a videographer, nor do I have access to big budget production. However, what I am is a passionate Mountain Biker with a background in business within the cycling industry. I could also be described as ""somewhat impatient"". You see, I've spent my fair share of time watching videos of people riding amazing trails in Canada whilst thinking, ""I'd like to go and ride something like that one day"". My impatiens told me that frankly, ""one day"" had an indefinite time line and was definitely too long to wait.

The only way that these fantastic trails found across the globe could be made any better, is if they didn't require the need for plane tickets. So, two years ago, I grabbed the bull firmly by both horns and made the first steps on this journey.

I've got myself to a point where I've secured 46 acres of prime gradient woodland for a period of 20yrs. GNAR Bike Park is my full time job as well as my long term passion. Now it's time to share it with you.

column5: >Once we have the access / uplift roads (marked yellow) in place, along with the car park (green) and trailhead building, we can open and operate with 7/8 of the planned 38 total tracks whilst continuing to build more throughout the year.

column1: • Yes, £78,012 does seem a rather specific target. However,as you can see, we have some rather specific needs in order to open GNAR.

column2: >Whilst it's true that I was offered the opportunity to fund this project through traditional high street banks, their aggressive loan repayments would have meant me increasing my price structure for the customers. Sometimes, in order to retain one's core values, a different path must be chosen. This method allows me to stick to my original price plan of £27 for an uplift day and £15 for ride up / push up access with no car parking fees.

column1: The Perks - Three ways to be involved
The GNAR Bike Park Wall Of Fame - £20 for for 20yrs of unique and exclusive experiences (see more details below).
Direct donations - Should you choose to donate directly for a piece of equipment, we'll place your name / company name on there with a message of thank you from myself for your support.
Corporate Sponsorship - 24 months of advertising for your company on site,on the trails themselves, through our media and via our web pressence.

column3: >THE GNAR BIKE PARK WALL OF FAME

column1: When we receive your pledge to the hall of fame your name and donation are confirmed to us via Indiegogo. After you've donated, send us a selfie in .jpeg format to gnarwalloffame@gmail.com .Please take the clearest picture possible and please ensure your full name is printed visibly and is easy to read.

At the end of this campaign, all the photos will be printed onto a large canvas of 50x50 selfies. This GNAR Bike Park Wall Of Fame will be a permanent feature behind our counter in the trail head. For the next 20yrs, we'll use it as a tool to pick random participants for unique GNAR experiences that money can't buy (essentially, a giant target board for blindfolded shots with childrens sucker darts etc). We'll film the process of picking each winner and post the videos up on our Facebook page (alongside sending you an email alert), There'll be all sorts of unique opportunities for our ""Wall of Famers"" over the years but we'll kick things off with:

1 x One year GNAR VIP pass (to be chosen annually there in). 5 x Invites to name a trail. 30 x invites to our pre opening party. 12 x Invites to come and meet with me, have a pre opening tour of the venue and participate in a Q&
column2: A session...and that's just for starters with more opportunities as we think of them!(I'll be inviting suggestions from our facebook community over the course of the campaign).

column1: Q - WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DON'T MEET OUR GOAL.....IS THAT THE END OF GNAR?

A - Absolutely not !! OK, plans and timescales may need to be adjusted but we've committed to the site for the next twenty years now. We'll take whatever we manage to raise and move forwards with that. I am 100% committed to GNAR Bike Park and all pledges / donations we manage to raise will be used to get GNAR Bike Park open. I can't wait to meet all you guys up on the trails!

OTHER WAYS TO BE INVOLVED  - I understand that not everyone is in a position to donate to GNAR Bike Park. Don't worry! You can still help out by sharing this campaign around with friends and help to spread the word of GNAR.
","Ben Eggleston & the birth of a Bike Park

By now you may have watched the video and realised that I'm neither an actor, a videographer, nor do I have access to big budget production. However, what I am is a passionate Mountain Biker with a background in business within the cycling industry. I could also be described as ""somewhat impatient"". You see, I've spent my fair share of time watching videos of people riding amazing trails in Canada whilst thinking, ""I'd like to go and ride something like that one day"". My impatiens told me that frankly, ""one day"" had an indefinite time line and was definitely too long to wait.

The only way that these fantastic trails found across the globe could be made any better, is if they didn't require the need for plane tickets. So, two years ago, I grabbed the bull firmly by both horns and made the first steps on this journey.

I've got myself to a point where I've secured 46 acres of prime gradient woodland for a period of 20yrs. GNAR Bike Park is my full time job as well as my long term passion. Now it's time to share it with you. Big plans!.....why dream small?

Once we have the access / uplift roads (marked yellow) in place, along with the car park (green) and trailhead building, we can open and operate with 7/8 of the planned 38 total tracks whilst continuing to build more throughout the year.
Yes, £78,012 does seem a rather specific target. However,as you can see, we have some rather specific needs in order to open GNAR.

Whilst it's true that I was offered the opportunity to fund this project through traditional high street banks, their aggressive loan repayments would have meant me increasing my price structure for the customers. Sometimes, in order to retain one's core values, a different path must be chosen. This method allows me to stick to my original price plan of £27 for an uplift day and £15 for ride up / push up access with no car parking fees.
The Perks - Three ways to be involved
The GNAR Bike Park Wall Of Fame - £20 for for 20yrs of unique and exclusive experiences (see more details below).
Direct donations - Should you choose to donate directly for a piece of equipment, we'll place your name / company name on there with a message of thank you from myself for your support.
Corporate Sponsorship - 24 months of advertising for your company on site,on the trails themselves, through our media and via our web pressence.
THE GNAR BIKE PARK WALL OF FAME

When we receive your pledge to the hall of fame your name and donation are confirmed to us via Indiegogo. After you've donated, send us a selfie in .jpeg format to gnarwalloffame@gmail.com .Please take the clearest picture possible and please ensure your full name is printed visibly and is easy to read.

At the end of this campaign, all the photos will be printed onto a large canvas of 50x50 selfies. This GNAR Bike Park Wall Of Fame will be a permanent feature behind our counter in the trail head. For the next 20yrs, we'll use it as a tool to pick random participants for unique GNAR experiences that money can't buy (essentially, a giant target board for blindfolded shots with childrens sucker darts etc). We'll film the process of picking each winner and post the videos up on our Facebook page (alongside sending you an email alert), There'll be all sorts of unique opportunities for our ""Wall of Famers"" over the years but we'll kick things off with:

1 x One year GNAR VIP pass (to be chosen annually there in). 5 x Invites to name a trail. 30 x invites to our pre opening party. 12 x Invites to come and meet with me, have a pre opening tour of the venue and participate in a Q&A session...and that's just for starters with more opportunities as we think of them!(I'll be inviting suggestions from our facebook community over the course of the campaign).

A - Absolutely not !! OK, plans and timescales may need to be adjusted but we've committed to the site for the next twenty years now. We'll take whatever we manage to raise and move forwards with that. I am 100% committed to GNAR Bike Park and all pledges / donations we manage to raise will be used to get GNAR Bike Park open. I can't wait to meet all you guys up on the trails!

Tony’s Alternative Guide to Prague - Experience the Real Face of the Most Beautiful European City
If you come to Prague do you want to wander around without knowing where to go?
Do you want to spend your few precious days by visiting places which are overpriced but well-presented in popular tourist guides and where only foreigners spend their time?
Do you want to see the real Prague or only touristic attractions? Do you want to see Prague the same way we - who have been living here for a long time – see it?

Tony’s Alternative Guide through Prague is an independent project which offers you tips for the best places in Prague which you should see when you stop by. We pointed out for you the most authentic venues with great genius loci.
We visited all the places by ourselves that’s why we really know what we are talking about! No one paid for being advertised
column2:
it is all based on our personal opinions. Most of the photos are unique, took specially for this guide. Because Antonin, author of the guide, is a photographer.
 
 

What Is in the E-Book?

The Alternative Guide through Prague takes you to places where it lives! To places where new ideas pop up every minute and where the amount of creativity overwhelms you.
/>Over 130 places – cafes, bars, pubs, music clubs, galleries, cultural and experimental venues, modern art, parks, cinemas, technical monuments, museums and much more

column1: • All-over-a-year list of different types of festivals

Our city has been changing a lot lately. Now you can find here emerging alternative communities and Prague becomes more cosmopolitan. New co-working places are opening, local workrooms are being built and charming cafes with tables and stools in front of their entrances are becoming very popular among locals. Pop-up galleries, bistros with home-made food or local products from Czech farmers are gaining more and more popularity as well. Now it is the only time when you can experience this change with us!
The Only Authentic Guide to Prague You Were Waiting For

We’ll help you to find the nicest cafes, very typical Czech pubs or the most unique music clubs. You’ll see where modern art, contemporary theatre or so called new cirques come to life. And when you are tired we’ll tell you which parks and public gardens offer the best place for your rest. On a blanket with bottle of wine, if you wish.

Tony's Guide will take you to the most unique small art cinemas in Prague where all the movies are being screen in the original language version.

column3: >Have you made an earthen coffee mug for your own coffee in a coffee bar?
>Have you watched a movie out of the freight car?
>Have you enjoyed a romantic view over a city out of a smokestack?
>Can you choose out of a 27 different types of beer?
>Have you tried the Porn de Jeremy Burger named obviously after the popular porn star?
>Have you had party in a nuclear bomb shelter?

column1:
Guide E-Book for Your Smartphone

You can download the e-book for all the devices:

My name is Antonin Jelinek, I was born and raised in Prague and due to my passion for the not-so-obvious places I have been exploring my country and its amazingly beautiful capital of Prague for as long as I can remember.
I have lived here as student, full-time employee and freelancer as well so I know the city from different angles.

This guide book is my hobby on which I focus in my free time. Otherwise I’m webmaster and photographer. My girlfriend Inka helps me with the guide book when she is not in her office working with Roma (Gypsies) in an NGO or producing cultural events. While bringing foreign bands in Prague we realized how difficult it is for them to find cool local places.

Also while traveling in my free time I have always thought about electronic guide book like the one I’m working on, which would help me to get to know the local enviroment as fast as possible.  But I have never found one. That is why I decided to make one for others who could appreciate it as much as I would.

What I Need? Why I need your help?

The Guide Book is ready but only in the Czech language. Unfortunately my knowledge of English is not sufficient enough to translate it by myself. But I study hard and try to improve.

That is why I need to collect some money for professional translation. The Guide Book offers more than 130 places on 170 pages which means a lot of time and work for some translator. After the translation also proofreading must be done so you can enjoy the whole Guide Book while going through it.

Thank you very much for your help and your contribution!
Appreciate it.
Looking forward to see you in Prague:)
Stretch Goals - Mobile App in The Future
In case we collect more money than what we are aiming for we use it for the development of mobile apps for Android and iPhone (iOS).

We are a group of dynamic Tokyoites preparing to launch a new luxury magazine about our favorite city. We want to share some of the reasons we love living here.

column2:
What's In It For Us?

To launch this exciting new title we are looking for some help with seed funding.

  • We are looking for funding to help us launch the first issue of I WANT... Tokyo. The seed funding raised here will cover some of the production costs for the initial issue and other start-up costs.

column1: • In return for your support we are offering a wide range of perks that include beautiful photographic prints, goodie boxes, personal experiences in Tokyo (such as an evening at an izakaya with us and a visit to a cat cafe) and the chance to be an associate publisher. At the $1,000 level we have two stunning B&
column2: W photographic prints of cherry blossoms by local artist and I WANT.. contributor Kit Pancoast Nagamura (shown below).

column1: • Even if we don't meet our goal, the funds raised on Indiegogo will help underwrite the launch issue of the magazine.
I WANT...Tokyo aims to fill a gap in the luxury travel market
and provide English and Chinese-speaking visitors with interesting content tailored to their
worldview and needs. With our well traveled, multilingual,

international team we feel we are well positioned to deliver the right publication for savvy business travelers and well-heeled tourists. We are a group with a passion for good design, writing, photography, food, coffee and ... maybe we should stop there.

Our editorial team has extensive experience covering Japan for the domestic and international market. From magazines and newspapers to web content and TV, we have done it all. From NHK to Details, Fodors Guides and The Japan Times to POL Oxygen, our experience and knowledge of Tokyo has been recognized worldwide. Our team is experienced in all sides of the business, from editorial and design to sales, marketing and publishing. We are a group of dedicated, seasoned professionals looking to create a publication that helps visitors discover more of the city we love.

column2:
Challenges

Many people think that print media is dying. We think they are crazy! Don't get us wrong, we love digital media and we'll be developing a strong online presence for the brand, but we also love printed magazines. We are also an advocate for quality free publications and so I WANT...Tokyo will be distributed free to a very select international audience. The challenges involved in launching a new publication are not insubstantial, but we believe that our experience in both paid and free publications gives us the right perspective to pull this off—with your help.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are unable to support us with a financial pledge, there are still ways you can help:

    • Help us to get the word out and promote our campaign. Retweet, share on Facebook—you know the drill!

column1: • Tell us why you love Tokyo or why you want to visit.
• Follow us on Twitter and Instagram.

column5: >Hi. This is a follow on campaign from our Kickstarter campaign (here). We sold about 450 units on Kickstarter and are looking to give the Indiegogo community a great deal on the Fogo before we introduce retail pricing. We are building 1000 units in the first batch arriving in January, and you will get yours even if we don't meet our goal. This campaign is the last chance to pre-order the Fogo. Thanks!

>Meet Fogo, the only gadget that includes GPS, bluetooth, voice and text messaging, a USB backup battery, a powerful LED flashlight and much MORE! Have peace of mind knowing you have all these safety features wherever you go.

column8: >With a bulit-in GPS and walkie-talkie, the Fogo allows you to do things you couldn't do before, like automatically sending a message to your friends if you are in need of help. Fogo can also control the flashlight with the GPS to help you find your way home in the dark. Whether you're biking or hiking, fishing or hunting, navigating or camping, the Fogo keeps you safe and lightens your load.

column1: Help bring the Fogo into the world by backing this project today!
Whether you're at the campsite or on the hunt, the Fogo is there for you.
Light up the campsite if you need to set up your tent after dark
• Keep track of your friends and family with Fogo’s location sharing and get alerts if the kids have strayed from the campsite
Send out a text message so everyone can be back in time for marshmallows
• Use the Fogo to send text messages from your smartphone when you are off the grid (no towers, routers or satellites required)
• Chat with friends or family who are away from camp with the Walkie-Talkie
• Easily find the Fogo in a dark tent using the motion-sensor feature
Charge up your USB devices in your tent, using the Fogo as a backup battery
Get off the beaten path and keep safe while exploring.
• Using the GPS and built-in pedometer, track your steps and route so you know how far and where you've gone
Navigate waypoints to find your trail or points of interest
Create waypoints on the fly for spontaneous geocaching
• Use the Automatic light control to save battery life and protect your night vision (point to the ground for dim and far away for bright)
• Easily navigate terrain at night--the Fogo will warn you if you are getting off course by blinking the light
Uphill, downhill, or cross country, the Fogo was made to ride.
• Track your speed, distance, elevation, rate of ascent/decent and see your stats on the Fogo or download to Strava after your ride
Share locations with your riding buddies and get real time alerts when someone is falling behind, getting too far ahead or stopped
Track your heart rate or cadence to maximize your output using the Fogo's bluetooth connectivity
See your friends' heart rate and let your friends see your heart rate
column2: great for training or making sure you don't wear anyone out too early in the ride

column1: Chit chat with your buddies, during your ride, to communicate directions, give inspiration or hints on the trail
• Ride into the night with automatic brightness adjustment based on speed and ambient light
• Have peace of mind with the Fogo's crash detection feature which automatically alerts your friends if you need help
One of the most exciting features of the Fogo is the SmartCap interface. The SmartCap is an end cap on the Fogo that comes off with a simple twist and allows you to do many things, including:
• Charge the Fogo using standard USB chargers
Add hardware capability such as the Walkie-Talkie SmartCap
More SmartCaps are in the works, including a satellite modem, laser range finder and avalanche beacon. These future SmartCaps will allow all Fogo users to add these capabilities!

column2: >Click here for more in-depth specifications

column1: • GoPro Mount Adapter - compatible with all GoPro mounting accessories
The Fogo also includes your choice of reflector (add $15 to your pledge to get both):
Fogo has an upgradeable app-based OS. You can load apps on the Fogo using the Fogo Hub.  The following apps will come pre-installed on the Fogo.

Activity  The Activity app allows you to track your ride, run, or hike using the built-in GPS. You can also see real-time metrics like speed, distance, and travel time. When riding at night, the Fogo can automatically adjust light brightness based on speed. It can also switch automatically between road mode (flashing) and trail mode (solid).
Clock  The Clock app provides basic watch functionality including a stopwatch, timer, and alarm.
Compass  The Compass app gives you a magnetic heading using the tilt-compensated ecompass.
Flashlight The Flashlight app gives you classic flashlight modes such as low, medium, high and strobe.

Maps The Maps app allows you to view simple maps as well as navigate from waypoint-to-waypoint. At night, the flashlight can automatically blink to keep you on course. The light will also adjust automatically based on whether you are looking at the ground in front of you (low-beam) or at objects in the distance (high-beam).
Maps can be created using online hiking or biking sites (bikemap.net or Google Earth).  You can also convert Activity tracks to Maps.
Messages The Messages app allows you to send voice and text messages to other Fogo users. You can also view the messages on a map which shows the sender's location.
This has been an amazing journey for us, and we are excited to get the Fogo into your hands. The most important part of this project is delivering a great product to our backers!

We have worked hard on the Fogo and leveraged our personal experience as product designers to produce a sound design and solid user experience. As engineers, we have first hand experience with the many risks and challenges in bringing a hardware project to fruition. Our promise to you, our backers, is to tirelessly apply our obsessive attention to detail and hard earned experience in manufacturing to overcoming the hurdles.

We have approached this project conservatively and added padding to our delivery schedule to allow for the unknown unknowns. We promise to keep you up to date on our progress during and after the campaign. Rest assured that we are working hard to deliver a high quality product to you on time.
We are excited to get the Fogo out on the trail and helping you enjoy the outdoors!

With a bulit-in GPS and walkie-talkie, the Fogo allows you to do things you couldn't do before, like automatically sending a message to your friends if you are in need of help. Fogo can also control the flashlight with the GPS to help you find your way home in the dark. Whether you're biking or hiking, fishing or hunting, navigating or camping, the Fogo keeps you safe and lightens your load.
Help bring the Fogo into the world by backing this project today!
Whether you're at the campsite or on the hunt, the Fogo is there for you.
Light up the campsite if you need to set up your tent after dark
Keep track of your friends and family with Fogo’s location sharing and get alerts if the kids have strayed from the campsite
Send out a text message so everyone can be back in time for marshmallows
Use the Fogo to send text messages from your smartphone when you are off the grid (no towers, routers or satellites required)
Chat with friends or family who are away from camp with the Walkie-Talkie
Easily find the Fogo in a dark tent using the motion-sensor feature
Charge up your USB devices in your tent, using the Fogo as a backup battery
Get off the beaten path and keep safe while exploring.
Using the GPS and built-in pedometer, track your steps and route so you know how far and where you've gone
Navigate waypoints to find your trail or points of interest
Create waypoints on the fly for spontaneous geocaching
Use the Automatic light control to save battery life and protect your night vision (point to the ground for dim and far away for bright)
Easily navigate terrain at night--the Fogo will warn you if you are getting off course by blinking the light
Uphill, downhill, or cross country, the Fogo was made to ride.
Track your speed, distance, elevation, rate of ascent/decent and see your stats on the Fogo or download to Strava after your ride
Share locations with your riding buddies and get real time alerts when someone is falling behind, getting too far ahead or stopped
Track your heart rate or cadence to maximize your output using the Fogo's bluetooth connectivity
See your friends' heart rate and let your friends see your heart rate
column2: great for training or making sure you don't wear anyone out too early in the ride

column1: Chit chat with your buddies, during your ride, to communicate directions, give inspiration or hints on the trail
Ride into the night with automatic brightness adjustment based on speed and ambient light
Have peace of mind with the Fogo's crash detection feature which automatically alerts your friends if you need help
One of the most exciting features of the Fogo is the SmartCap interface. The SmartCap is an end cap on the Fogo that comes off with a simple twist and allows you to do many things, including:
Charge the Fogo using standard USB chargers
Add hardware capability such as the Walkie-Talkie SmartCap
More SmartCaps are in the works, including a satellite modem, laser range finder and avalanche beacon. These future SmartCaps will allow all Fogo users to add these capabilities!
Click here for more in-depth specifications
GoPro Mount Adapter - compatible with all GoPro mounting accessories
The Fogo also includes your choice of reflector (add $15 to your pledge to get both):
Fogo has an upgradeable app-based OS. You can load apps on the Fogo using the Fogo Hub.  The following apps will come pre-installed on the Fogo.

Activity  The Activity app allows you to track your ride, run, or hike using the built-in GPS. You can also see real-time metrics like speed, distance, and travel time. When riding at night, the Fogo can automatically adjust light brightness based on speed. It can also switch automatically between road mode (flashing) and trail mode (solid).
Clock  The Clock app provides basic watch functionality including a stopwatch, timer, and alarm.
Compass  The Compass app gives you a magnetic heading using the tilt-compensated ecompass.
Flashlight The Flashlight app gives you classic flashlight modes such as low, medium, high and strobe.

Maps The Maps app allows you to view simple maps as well as navigate from waypoint-to-waypoint. At night, the flashlight can automatically blink to keep you on course. The light will also adjust automatically based on whether you are looking at the ground in front of you (low-beam) or at objects in the distance (high-beam).
Maps can be created using online hiking or biking sites (bikemap.net or Google Earth).  You can also convert Activity tracks to Maps.
Messages The Messages app allows you to send voice and text messages to other Fogo users. You can also view the messages on a map which shows the sender's location.
This has been an amazing journey for us, and we are excited to get the Fogo into your hands. The most important part of this project is delivering a great product to our backers!

We have worked hard on the Fogo and leveraged our personal experience as product designers to produce a sound design and solid user experience. As engineers, we have first hand experience with the many risks and challenges in bringing a hardware project to fruition. Our promise to you, our backers, is to tirelessly apply our obsessive attention to detail and hard earned experience in manufacturing to overcoming the hurdles.

We have approached this project conservatively and added padding to our delivery schedule to allow for the unknown unknowns. We promise to keep you up to date on our progress during and after the campaign. Rest assured that we are working hard to deliver a high quality product to you on time.
We are excited to get the Fogo out on the trail and helping you enjoy the outdoors!

We Need a Place To Grow

Albuquerque Roller Derby is the newest league and the only 501c3 derby league in Albuquerque. We were established by six veteran skaters in January of 2015, were officially a nonprofit as of March 2015, and now have twenty-two members.
Our current practice location is an outdoor community basketball court which leaves us to fight the weather and occasionally some basketball players (and who can blame them!).
In the photos below, that's us in the black. A game in Texas on the left, in Hobbs, NM on the right - entertaining our crowds!

With our own place we'll be able to:

  • Give you better, entertaining roller derby game watching
• Start a junior roller derby program (get more underprivileged kids a chance at a great sport)

• Grow and recruit more members
  • Have an area to teach newbies
• Safely store equipment for cross training and loaner gear
• Start outreach programs to our neighbors and youth programs

• Explore our options to have a community health fair or other community programs from our building

    • We're more than just athletes who enjoy a great sport
column2: we want to entertain, encourage others to get in shape, and be the best at what we do. Besides, roller derby is a highly entertaining sport to watch, so you get to be part of the exciting future of roller derby. FYI: Roller derby almost made it into the 2020 Olympics!

What You Get

We need a building. Specifically a 108 by 88 feet facility without poles or the poles have to be 40 feet apart due to the size of a flat derby track (because those pesky poles get in the way of skating). Albuquerque Roller Derby has found what we need in a beautiful building we call Xanadu.

column1: The administrative and overhead costs are to cover signage, loaner gear for juniors, and other things we'll need when we move into the new place.
The building we want is currently occupied, but they are moving out in a month.
And what if we don't make our target? We can use what we get to get us in the door, and we have some sponsors beginning to step up.
Perks Baby! We've got your roller derby related Perks!
You're fast, spectacularly fast, and you don’t want to be weighed down with things. Plus, you’re awesome for donating $5 and we love you for it! No really, we do!
A friendly and appreciative shout out to you on our Facebook fan page. Plus you'll receive monthly email updates on our progress.

We'll give you your very own official derby name, printed on a certificate, signed by a member of the team and mailed to you. Tell us a little bit about yourself (or make us guess about you), and we'll come up with something interesting.
+ You also receive the True Fan perks
Join our league! You’ll get two months of practices free (that's six hours of practice a week, 24 hours a month, 48 hours total).
+ You also receive the perks from Derbification! and True Fan. And, if you do join us, you can always change your derby name that we gave you.
This does not include any transportation, you must live in or near Albuquerque to take advantage of the perk.
Get one (1) black t-shirt or tank top with our logo, designed by our own Blazian Boom. Let us know if you want the tank or t-shirt and let us know what size.
Tanks are women's small, medium, large or extra large
column3: small, medium, large, extra large, double extra large.

column1: The look is awesome and made by a local screen printer, 111 Media Collective.
+ You also receive the perks from Derbification! and True Fan
Picture of the actual shirts modeled by Carson!
Luckily for you we won't send you our stinky, sweaty derby gear. It could be a unicorn wearing roller skates (11x13) made by Christine Chronis
column2: A set of earrings with a unicorn and colorful beads from our own Author of Pain
column3: or something our group comes up with at our next brainstorm session (where we have milk and cookies and talk secret derby stuff). It could be quite interesting! (Do tell us what you'd prefer, but it's not guaranteed since we won't know how many requests we'll get - but the first person to donate at $70 can definitely get the first unicorn.)

column1:
+ You'll receive the perks from Derbification! and True Fan.

We looked far and wide for someone willing to make us a unicorn with roller skates. We found that someone in Christine Chronis of Design Chickadee. Not only a jewelry maker, but as you can see a fine toy maker, as well.

column20: >.  (When she bought them the store owner asked what she was making, when he heard it was for roller derby he was like, ""You're so petite. Really? Roller Derby?"" She gets that a lot.)

column1: You'll get two (2), one-hour roller skating lessons with one of our experienced and brilliant trainers.
+ You also receive the perks from Derbification! True Fan and Unicorn Power.
You will be required to sign a waiver and this perk does not include any transportation. Scheduling will be based on trainer availability.

You'll receive a two (2) electronic tickets to a 2016 home game and be given an up close and personal reserved seat near the track (must be over 18 to sit in the reserved/suicide section). And you'll get a shout out at our 2016 bouts.
+ You also receive the Derbification! True Fan, and Unicorn Power perks.
A gloriously awesome, signed by the team, 16 x 20 photo of the Albuquerque Roller Derby league taken by photographer Brian Spencer.
+ You also receive the perks from True Fan, Derbification! and Unicorn Power.

You'll receive four (4) electronic season tickets to all of our 2016 games and be given an up close and personal reserved seat near the track (must be over 18 to sit in the reserved/suicide section). And you'll get a shout out at our 2016 bouts.
We can promise at least three games, maybe up to six games for 2016. This perk does not include transportation.
+ You also receive the perks from Derbification! True Fan, and Unicorn Power.
Businesses only! We'll come to your business for two hours, talk it up on our social media, get you noticed!
+ You also receive the perks from True Fan, Derbification! and Unicorn Power.
(Sorry! No personal birthday parties, personal homes, etc.)

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? Live in Albuquerque? Then consider:

column9: >igning up to be a volunteer (help out at games)

column5: >Becoming a ref (get to yell at derby people when we break rules)
>Joining us as a roller derby newbie and we'll teach you

column1: • Checking out our website www.rollerderbyalbuquerque.com  or follow us on Facebook and come visit us at our practices
And, no matter where you're from, please:
• Share our campaign and ask your friends to contribute
Recently, our own Author of Pain had an article published in the Weekly Alibi about the leagues in Albuquerque. Check us out in the fun pictures.

Warm summer days, easy holiday mood, time for chilling and recreation. Why carry a big, heavy cooler when you can chill with style?

HYPERCOOL is the fastest portable cooler. It's battery powered, compact and lightweight. You can take it to beach, picnic, training, boating or road trip – anywhere you go!

HYPERCOOL chills your drinks all day long. The cooling method ensures perfect quality of your drinks
column3: there's no loss of bubbles or foaming.

column2: >Fill the cooling insert with tap water and place it in freezer for min. 10 hours. The freezing time depends on the power of your freezer.
>Add two standard size cans or one large can and switch on the motor.

column1: We like our drinks cold, fast. We came up with the idea for HYPERCOOL, and it took us over three years to bring this revolutionary cooling technology to you. We spent months after months of extensive development e.g. experimenting the energy efficiency and speed of cooling. We've also gone through a whole lot of challenges like expansion of water when freezing. After lot of hard work, we are so excited to present HYPERCOOL to you.

column2:
>... to bring HYPERCOOL to you!

Here are just a few examples of our development during those 800 days.

column1:
HYPERCOOL has been designed and developed by Sami and his technical team. He enjoys exploring  ideas and engineering new products in his workshop, as well as cooling cans. 
 
 
The eager lady behind keeping the campaign wheels in motion. Too much talk, too many ideas and she's always on the go - with HYPERCOOL of course. 
 
 
Ida-Maria is always online and keeps the rest of us updated with the coolest trends on social media.
 
 
Pia has been the heart and soul of the team from day one. Combined with her solid experience in marketing and PR she keeps things cool and always on track.
 
 
Our beautiful campaign video production and the photographic contents are brought to you by easy-going and artistic Joonas.

 

 
 
What is HYPERCOOL?
HYPERCOOL is a new invention that cools room temperature cans to cold in 60 seconds, ice-cold in 90 seconds. It's compact, lightweight and portable. Take it to beach, picnic, boat, camping or training – anywhere you go!
Does HYPERCOOL change the quality of my drink?
No. There's no loss of bubbles (carbonates) due to controlled rotation speed, small vibration and extremely low friction between the cans and ice. Your drink stays perfect!

column2: >Yes. The cooling insert is placed in a freezer overnight (min. 10 hours). The freezing time depends on the power of your freezer.
>Yes. HYPERCOOL runs on 2 AA-batteries (very long battery life, upto 200 cans).
>What kind of cans can I use with HYPERCOOL?

>You can use standard aluminium cans. Simultaneously 2 x 33 cl (11.3 oz) or 1 x 50 cl (16.9 oz) / 56.8 cl pint (19.2 oz) or any other can height with the same standard diameter. We do not recommend plastic or glass bottles (much slower cooling time and not practical).

>It depends on various conditions such as the starting temperature of your drink, temperature of the cooling insert and the desired temperature of your drink. In general, 60 seconds to cold (5 C / 41 F) and 90 seconds to ice-cold (2 C / 36 F). Whatever temperature you want, it's your choice with HYPERCOOL.
>How long does the cooling insert stay frozen?

column3: >It depends on the temperature of the cooling insert as well as the outside temperature (and direct sunlight etc.) In general the cooling insert is usable from a few hours up to a day whenever the cooling insert is kept inside HYPERCOOL.

column2: >Length 30 cm (11.8 in), width 16 cm (6.3 in), height 15 cm (5.9 in ). Empty weight 0.9 kg (2 lb) - with full cooling insert 1.9 kg (4.2 lb)

>Yes. It's safe for adults and children. Hypercool only uses ordinary water. No chemicals are used. HYPERCOOL uses 1.5 V batteries. The rotation of the motor/cans uses extremely low energy and is very safe.

>""Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."" 
Paypal and others need the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page.
We are confident that we will deliver to you all. Hypercool has been designed and tested for a long time. The parts are straightforward to manufacture, It's not a complicated product like smartphone.

Add two standard size cans or one large can and switch on the motor.

We like our drinks cold, fast. We came up with the idea for HYPERCOOL, and it took us over three years to bring this revolutionary cooling technology to you. We spent months after months of extensive development e.g. experimenting the energy efficiency and speed of cooling. We've also gone through a whole lot of challenges like expansion of water when freezing. After lot of hard work, we are so excited to present HYPERCOOL to you. It took us ...
... to bring HYPERCOOL to you!Here are just a few examples of our development during those 800 days.

HYPERCOOL has been designed and developed by Sami and his technical team. He enjoys exploring  ideas and engineering new products in his workshop, as well as cooling cans.   The eager lady behind keeping the campaign wheels in motion. Too much talk, too many ideas and she's always on the go - with HYPERCOOL of course.   Ida-Maria is always online and keeps the rest of us updated with the coolest trends on social media.  Pia has been the heart and soul of the team from day one. Combined with her solid experience in marketing and PR she keeps things cool and always on track.  Our beautiful campaign video production and the photographic contents are brought to you by easy-going and artistic Joonas.   What is HYPERCOOL?HYPERCOOL is a new invention that cools room temperature cans to cold in 60 seconds, ice-cold in 90 seconds. It's compact, lightweight and portable. Take it to beach, picnic, boat, camping or training – anywhere you go!
Does HYPERCOOL change the quality of my drink?
No. There's no loss of bubbles (carbonates) due to controlled rotation speed, small vibration and extremely low friction between the cans and ice. Your drink stays perfect!
Yes. The cooling insert is placed in a freezer overnight (min. 10 hours). The freezing time depends on the power of your freezer.
Yes. HYPERCOOL runs on 2 AA-batteries (very long battery life, upto 200 cans).
What kind of cans can I use with HYPERCOOL?

You can use standard aluminium cans. Simultaneously 2 x 33 cl (11.3 oz) or 1 x 50 cl (16.9 oz) / 56.8 cl pint (19.2 oz) or any other can height with the same standard diameter. We do not recommend plastic or glass bottles (much slower cooling time and not practical).

It depends on various conditions such as the starting temperature of your drink, temperature of the cooling insert and the desired temperature of your drink. In general, 60 seconds to cold (5 C / 41 F) and 90 seconds to ice-cold (2 C / 36 F). Whatever temperature you want, it's your choice with HYPERCOOL.
How long does the cooling insert stay frozen?

It depends on the temperature of the cooling insert as well as the outside temperature (and direct sunlight etc.) In general the cooling insert is usable from a few hours up to a day whenever the cooling insert is kept inside HYPERCOOL.
Length 30 cm (11.8 in), width 16 cm (6.3 in), height 15 cm (5.9 in ). Empty weight 0.9 kg (2 lb) - with full cooling insert 1.9 kg (4.2 lb)
Does HYPERCOOL come with a warranty?

Yes. It's safe for adults and children. Hypercool only uses ordinary water. No chemicals are used. HYPERCOOL uses 1.5 V batteries. The rotation of the motor/cans uses extremely low energy and is very safe.

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."" Paypal and others need the above disclaimer to be displayed on the page.We are confident that we will deliver to you all. Hypercool has been designed and tested for a long time. The parts are straightforward to manufacture, It's not a complicated product like smartphone.
We cannot accept donations. Thank You!

The last time a road trip defined a generation, the year was 1957 and Kerouac had just unleashed On the Road to the world. Since then, his story has dominated the narrative of a free-spirited America. Until now.

A new generation is ready to claim the roadways. One built not just on breaking out of the monotony and challenging the status quo, but instead built on the pillar of purpose. A generation with that same ecstatic lust for travel and adventure, but with a deeper goal of never-ending education and learning.
Kerouac did it in literature. We’re doing it with the gap year, a concept that when done right, sets in motion a lifetime of curiosity, competence, care and courage.

It’s time for this generation to blaze its own path, zigging and zagging over 6,000 miles of American terrain to tell a new story. One that breaks down the conventions of the way it’s been done, transcending boundaries and ultimately leaving a tribe of connected, global citizens energized in its wake.
The mission departs from Portland, Oregon on March 14, 2016.

column2:
What You Get

Here's the deal. We have awesome partners like Starwood Hotels and the American Gap Association helping us out, but we're missing a critical piece of the roadtrip puzzle: a CAR!

column1:
In order to set out on this epic trip and inform more American families about the benefits of time away from formalized education (of which there are SO MANY), we need a way to get to them. That's where you lovely human beings come in. Here's what we need:

  • $4,000 to rent the car. This would get us from Portland to Boston in about 6-weeks, stopping at 24 cities along the route.
• $250.00 in gas (and maybe some beef jerky.) Just kidding. We'd use this to pay for fuel and guesstimated how much we'd need using the website GasBuddy.
In exchange for helping us out (seriously, every 5 cents helps!), you'd get any number of things, including:

column2: >A signed copy of ""Gap to Great: A Parent's Guide to the Gap Year""
>Call outs on social media during our trip
>Mentions in our handy, dandy blog we'll be writing
>A chance to meet up with us along the route and film some fun videos

column1:
The Impact

Guys and gals. Let's be real for a moment. This project is near and dear to our hearts, but not just because it's going to be really freaking awesome. It's also going to spread the word of gap years, which are SO IMPORTANT for young people today to have as an option. Why's that?

For one, hardly any of us know what we want to be ""when we grow up,"" which means we end up doing majors and taking jobs that don't fire us up on the insides. That sucks. It's painful. And it leaves us sad and confused and not sure what to do to get fulfillment from life.

The gap year is a time to hit pause and learn about oneself. To start DESIGNING your life instead of just blindly following a pre-determined path. AND IT WORKS. Gap year students report higher levels of confidence, self-awareness, global citizenship, leadership ability and more.

We believe that the success stories of the future won't be the Harvard degrees hanging in corner offices, but instead those who've made conscious decisions to gather unrelated experiences outside of the classroom (the #1 driver to creativity and innovation).

The world needs more global citizens, and the gap year is the start to creating them. 

Risks &
column2:
Challenges

In terms of risks and challenges, there's always the risk that we'll head out on this thing and no one will show up. That people won't care about our message. But the truth is, Millennials and Gen Z are kind of worried about college. It's no longer a ""safe bet."" So we're taking the risk that students will want to hear from us, and by flexing our voice, we're hoping that maybe they won't feel so alone, or pigeonholed into making a decision that's not right for them and their future.

column1:
So yes. There are risks. But we think this trip can help and we'll do our best to make you proud. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to contribute with the cash-ola, you can still help us out:

  • Make some noise about the trip. Tell people to check out GaptoGreat.com and the American Gap Association.
• Follow us on Twitter and join our Facebook group.

• Use the share buttons to spread this campaign to the masses. 

    • And thank you. From the very bottom of our hearts. We love you all already. 

    ","What's All This About?

The last time a road trip defined a generation, the year was 1957 and Kerouac had just unleashed On the Road to the world. Since then, his story has dominated the narrative of a free-spirited America. Until now.

A new generation is ready to claim the roadways. One built not just on breaking out of the monotony and challenging the status quo, but instead built on the pillar of purpose. A generation with that same ecstatic lust for travel and adventure, but with a deeper goal of never-ending education and learning.
Kerouac did it in literature. We’re doing it with the gap year, a concept that when done right, sets in motion a lifetime of curiosity, competence, care and courage.

It’s time for this generation to blaze its own path, zigging and zagging over 6,000 miles of American terrain to tell a new story. One that breaks down the conventions of the way it’s been done, transcending boundaries and ultimately leaving a tribe of connected, global citizens energized in its wake.
The mission departs from Portland, Oregon on March 14, 2016.

What We Need & What You Get Here's the deal. We have awesome partners like Starwood Hotels and the American Gap Association helping us out, but we're missing a critical piece of the roadtrip puzzle: a CAR!

In order to set out on this epic trip and inform more American families about the benefits of time away from formalized education (of which there are SO MANY), we need a way to get to them. That's where you lovely human beings come in. Here's what we need:  $4,000 to rent the car. This would get us from Portland to Boston in about 6-weeks, stopping at 24 cities along the route.
$250.00 in gas (and maybe some beef jerky.) Just kidding. We'd use this to pay for fuel and guesstimated how much we'd need using the website GasBuddy.
In exchange for helping us out (seriously, every 5 cents helps!), you'd get any number of things, including:
A signed copy of ""Gap to Great: A Parent's Guide to the Gap Year""
Call outs on social media during our trip
Mentions in our handy, dandy blog we'll be writing
A chance to meet up with us along the route and film some fun videos

The Impact Guys and gals. Let's be real for a moment. This project is near and dear to our hearts, but not just because it's going to be really freaking awesome. It's also going to spread the word of gap years, which are SO IMPORTANT for young people today to have as an option. Why's that?

For one, hardly any of us know what we want to be ""when we grow up,"" which means we end up doing majors and taking jobs that don't fire us up on the insides. That sucks. It's painful. And it leaves us sad and confused and not sure what to do to get fulfillment from life.

The gap year is a time to hit pause and learn about oneself. To start DESIGNING your life instead of just blindly following a pre-determined path. AND IT WORKS. Gap year students report higher levels of confidence, self-awareness, global citizenship, leadership ability and more.

We believe that the success stories of the future won't be the Harvard degrees hanging in corner offices, but instead those who've made conscious decisions to gather unrelated experiences outside of the classroom (the #1 driver to creativity and innovation).

The world needs more global citizens, and the gap year is the start to creating them.    Risks & Challenges  In terms of risks and challenges, there's always the risk that we'll head out on this thing and no one will show up. That people won't care about our message. But the truth is, Millennials and Gen Z are kind of worried about college. It's no longer a ""safe bet."" So we're taking the risk that students will want to hear from us, and by flexing our voice, we're hoping that maybe they won't feel so alone, or pigeonholed into making a decision that's not right for them and their future.

So yes. There are risks. But we think this trip can help and we'll do our best to make you proud.    Other Ways You Can Help If you're not able to contribute with the cash-ola, you can still help us out:  Make some noise about the trip. Tell people to check out GaptoGreat.com and the American Gap Association.
Follow us on Twitter and join our Facebook group.
Use the share buttons to spread this campaign to the masses.    And thank you. From the very bottom of our hearts. We love you all already.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
We are Karl and Denise Wagenbrenner, founders of Berkeley Springs Brewing Co, the first microbrewery in the Eastern Panhandle of WV.

Our vision for the brewery and pub is to add custom beer themed lodging, we will renovate the existing rooms located above the brewery and offer packages that include brewing experiences, pub food packages,  tours and tastings and a relaxing atmosphere to kick back and enjoy the quieter side.
Adding these rooms will enhance an already amazing location into a traveler's destination and one of a kind place to stay.
We need $ 30,000 to remove and replace the existing deck to provide access to the second floor rooms and a relaxing outdoor space to sit and experience the nature that surrounds us.
The rooms need approximately $ 25,000 to fully renovate and furnish for use.

We have designed some amazing ways that you can contribute and become an integral part of this project, everything from putting your name on the deck or benches, pre-purchasing lodging deals before anyone else, brewery learning experiences that make you the brewer for a day, or purchasing custom shirts and stickers.

Every dollar we raise will go towards the material cost for the deck first, and we will work to renovate and furnish the rooms as the funds are available.  The faster we renovate these rooms , the faster we can rent them out.  Our pub will be open year round and we will offer some packages and incentives to make your stay with us a one of a kind experience.

We are building a business that will provide a future and careers for the employees that we employ.  The Bed n Brew will be an enhancement that will ensure our success and provide more of a tourist draw to the area.

We will run this campaign for up to 60 days to achieve our goal, we will be offering the shirts and stickers for sale in our pub and through our Facebook page as well as several creative events to work towards raising these funds.
Even if you cannot contribute at any of the sponsor levels, you can share our story and pass this along so that as many people as possible will be able to help build our Bed n Brew.

column3: >First Fat Tire Electric Tricycle!
column4: >A great helping hand for hunters, farmers and other people who have to carry things for a wider range but don´t want to carry them by hand.
column5:
> 

The Addmotor Motan M350 is the first full fat tire tricycle on the market. In its development we especially considered people with lower body height, elderly and people with leg issues.

column1: • A comfortable low step-through frame and combin it with an axle with two wheels in the back.
• The amazing triangle-shaped frame tube supports a high net weight of 350 Lbs for the rider and an additional load weight of 100 Lbs in the basket.
• Addmotor only uses the best quality Bafang motors. This model carries a 500W front hub motor, which can speed up to 20mph.
• The 48V*10.4AH Samsung Battery has enough power for a 40 miles ride in PAS 1.

column2: >The Motan M-350
column3:
>About Addmotor

Addmotor is a professional e-bike manufacturer from El Monte, CA. Our experience we gained from our 10 years of business with motorcycle parts in the past. For three years we design and produce high quality low budget bikes and ship them worldwide. For our bikes we only use the best quality parts and our different models get upgraded regularly. To assure a constantly high quality of our products we have a very strict Quality Management. Every single bike is tested of its functionality and eventual weaknesses. Only the bikes with best test results will be shipped to our customers. And if a customer would face any problems or damages on his bike, Addmotor takes high responsibility for its products. We do not only provide pre-sale service but also a skilled after-sales team takes care of all problems the customer would face. Every inquiry will be answered within less than 24 hours.
column5:
>Motan M-350 Features

 

  • The fat tire electric tricycle is perfect for all-terrain, effective on the road, trail, mountain, beach or snow

column1:
Big rear rack for transportation of 100 lbs of goods, the bag is removable

 

  • Low step-through frame for uncomplicated mounting and dismounting

 

  • Strong triangle-shaped frame tube for high net weight of 350 Lbs 

 

  • E-System integrated front light

 

  • Adjustable black aluminum handlebar
Addmotor 5 Inch LCD Display With USB Port
PROMAX black aluminum handlebar, easily adjusted for your convenience.
48V*10.4AH Samgsung cell batteries, over 800 lifetimes battery charges. It has enough power for a 40 miles ride in PAS 1
48V*500W rear hub brushless motor - special design for snow beach all terrain
Adjustable saddle and suspension seat post, quick Release 30cm
Big storage baskets perfect for groceries or to give your favorite pet a ride. For transportation of 100 lbs of goods

column2: >Choose your Motan M-350
column5: >Meet our team
column6:
>FAQ

General Question

What colors are available?

We're going to be announcing three colors choices before the end of the campaign. Black, orange and green available. When the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey where you can tell us your color choice and any other info we need to get you the bike.

 

Is there a warranty?

We use only quality components on our bikes to ensure our bikes last a long time. All Addmotor bikes are protected by a one year warranty.We guarantee you will receive your e-bikes free of manufacturing defects. In the unlikely case that a part breaks because of defects within the first year, we will ship replacement parts free of charge to you. Note this does not apply to rider incurred damages or normal wear and tear.

 

Is there a warranty if I am international (outside the U.S.)?

A. Unfortunately due to high costs of shipping and customs, we cannot honor any warranties outside the U.S.

 

What happens when I need spare batteries or parts later in the future?

Please visit our website where you can purchase components, accessories in the very near future.We offer a long-term supply of accessories for the products sold. We recommend to source batteries and parts from Addmotor.

 

Where can my bikes be served?

Please do not worry, we provide technical service support in LA United States.

 

Do I need to wear a helmet?

It depends on local laws. We suggest wearing a helmet at all times for your safety.

 

Where can I use my MOTAN M-350?

Electric tricycle like the M-350 are street legal almost everywhere in the United States. Check your local laws, but unless you live in New York State, we think you’ll find your bike is street legal.

 

Do I need a special permit or license? 

No special license is typically required in most places to ride an electric bicycle on the street, however, please check with your local city or law enforcement agency for verification.

 

Payment and shipping

How much is shipping?

Shipping and handling is $280 for shipments to the US, and $700 for shipments to the Canada.

 

When will it be shipped?

The first batch will be shipped in March 2018.

 

How is the M-350 e-bike delivered and is it easy to assemble?

The MOTAN M-350 electric tricycle comes 90 % assembled in one cartons. However, if you don't have much experience with bikes, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to get you M-350 ready for your first ride.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

You are responsible for any local, sales or import tax, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. There is currently no import tax for the US, but it varies internationally.

 

Are there any additional fees I need to pay if I am international (outside the continental U.S.)?

Yes. If you request us to ship internationally (outside the continental U.S.) you are responsible for paying any customs, VAT, duties, and taxes. We do not have a list of these costs, so please check directly with your local country.

 

 Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy, click here.

 

 Can Ichange my shipping address later?

If your order is listed as ""Order Placed,"" you can change the shipping address and phone number for this perk on your profile's contributions tab. A survey will be sent to you after the campaign is ended, you'd need to confirm your address with us.

 

Technical

How to charge the battery and how long does it take?

The Battery can be charged either on or off the bike. This battery lasts so long you probably won’t need to bother with a charger in the office. It takes around 3-4 hours to charge with our 2.5A charger. Battery life is over 800 charges. 

 

How long can the battery last? How far can I go with a fully charged battery?

The bike can run up to 40-45 Miles（10.4AH） /45-50 Miles（12.8AH）using level one pedal assist.

 

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V and uses the same power cable that desktop computers use. Works in every country. 

 

Can the battery be removed?

Yes. The battery is designed in such a way that you can change it or replace with 2 easy step that takes less than 10 seconds. Simply unlock and open the seat, pull out the battery and you’re done.

 

How much does M-350 weigh?

MOTAN M-350 are very lightweight considering the technology packed in. Their weights with battery are as follows:

M-350: 95 lbs NW/121 lbs GW

M-350 P7: 96 lbs NW/122 lbs GW

 

What’s the top speed of the M-350?

Due to US laws we place a speed limiter at 20MPH. If you plan to use your M-350 off-road or on private land, tuning a M-350 speed / power is very easy to do.

 

 I'm short/tall/heavy, can I ride it?

The seat height is engineered to be 33"" high at its lowest setting, and it’s adjustable, so it fits riders from 5'2''-6'6''. The frame is rated for a 350lbs rider.

 

What engine options are you offering for the M-350 ?

The MOTAN M-350 electric tricycle comes in 2 power versions: M-350(500W) and M-350 P7(750W).

 

Can I still bike on M-350 if the battery runs out of power?

Of course! If you run out of power, you can cycle as you would do with a regular tricycle.

 

How many goods can be carried in the basket？

It carries 100 lbs of goods. The amazing triangle-shaped frame tube supports a high net weight of 350 Lbs for the rider and an additional load weight of 100 Lbs in the basket.

 

Can the bag be removed?

Yes.

 

Will you sell a rear rack?

We will add a new perk for it after we reach 600K. You can claim the perk at a special price.Get a discount off MSRP. Become an early bird to get the best price now, we can notify you after the new perk of rear rack is launched.

In its development we especially considered people with lower body height, elderly and people with leg issues.
