My name is David Morreale. I am a professional musician, a teacher, writer, and motorcyclist. I spent 35 years as a professional
singer/songwriter before becoming a teacher. I loved being a musician, I
love teaching (English and History) and I love writing and riding

motorcycles.

In 2012, the first of my two sons was born. Since then, I've become interested in creating a job for myself that fulfills a few functions, and the first of those is making it possible to work from home in such a way as to maximize time with my boys and my wife. The second function is the kind of job that would allow me to really use the skills I've built up over the years as an entertainer, a writer, and a teacher, and the third function is that I really want my sons to grow up seeing that their papa works hard, works smart, and does the job until the job is done. Thus was Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours born.

I'd first conceived of Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours back in 2006,
on my final tour as a musician. I rode around the country with my guitar
tied to the sissy bar of a Harley Davidson Superglide. I rode over
12,000 miles, played 38 gigs in 42 days, and raised money for the
families of children with Cystic Fibrosis. It was an honor and an
adventure, and all that time inside my helmet got me thinking about what

is important to so many of us who love motorcycling.

At Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours, we want to see (and show you) the world! We want to meet new people, to have fun and experience the  camaraderie that is the inevitable result of spending hours of time in the saddle, experiencing the world in the way Robert Pirsig described it in Zen and The Art of Motorcycle Maintenance.

“In a car you're always in a compartment, and because you're used to it
you don't realize that through that car window everything you see is
just more TV. You're a passive observer and it is all moving by you
boringly in a frame. On a cycle the frame is gone. You're completely in contact with it all. You're in the scene, not just watching it anymore, and the sense of presence is overwhelming.”

― Robert M. Pirsig. Zen and The Art of Motorcycle Maintenance

Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours offers unique, guided, tours, each with a theme that guides where we stop, where we eat, where we stay, and the kinds of things we do at each stop.

The Civil War Battlefields Tour, the Spa Tour (ladies only), our Covered Bridges and Thomas Jefferson tours, our Allied ""Push"" Tour from Normandy to Berlin, and the Blues and BBQ Tour of America's mid-west, are perfect examples of the kinds of tour experiences we offer to discerning riders everywhere.

We have the infrastructure, we have the guides, the military historians, the amazing routes through the Blue Ridge Mountains, the great music venues and BBQ joints... What we need is the funding to advertise to the degree necessary to build TTMT into a thriving moto-touring business.

That's where you come in. Like me, you're crazy for riding. Crazy for getting out into the wind and the heat, the open spaces and banked turns and curves. You're insane for the backwoods diners and truckstops and cafes with menu items like ""Eggs and Meat."" Like the rest of us, you love the smell of scorching pavement, the exhaust note of the engine growling underneath you, and the tilt and lean as the bike and you become one thing, where the speed and the lean and the sound of the wind combine with you so deeply that you understand what Cormac McCarthy meant about the character who loved horses so much that ""were he begot by malice or mischance into some queer land where horses never were he would have found them anyway.""

column2:
What You Get

We need $7500.00 in order to get TTMT further off the ground. We've invested heavily already in infrastructure and now we need a marketing budget.
The marketing budget will be used to fund

column1: • Further build up of our web site, including professional video production of the tours themselves.

Because we are trying to get a for-profit enterprise off the ground, the perks we offer are solid, fun, and tangible perks that our friends, fans, and motorcycle family will care about. We're not offering your name on a plaque that I'll nail to my gas tank, or to dedicate a helmet in your honour. We're offering what are essentially pre-sales at extreme discounts!
And if the we don't reach our funding goal, we'll use the funds for legal costs and as much advertising as we can get!
Every perk sold in this campaign takes us a little further down the glorious road to two-wheeled fun and cameraderie that is Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours!

Other Ways You Can Help

Listen, it's not a big deal if you can't take advantage of one of our perks! You can still help! Let our friends and family know about Throttle and Torque Motorcycle Tours. Become a supporter, and join in at some of our get-togethers, even if you are riding with us!
Use the Indiegogo Share Tools and let everyone know.
...and, Thank you for your help and support.

The idea for the Multi Functional Dry Bag (MFDB) was born in the high-country of the Bitterroot Mountains. After hiking several miles in, Jason Evatt, Airborne Outfitters founder, realized he needed to free up some space and weight in his pack. Once everything was laid out in the tent, he noticed the dry bag he used to keep his sleeping bag dry went from being the most important piece of gear to the least important in a matter of seconds. He thought that if the material was hydrophobic and BPA free he might be able to repurpose the bag and use it to collect water. After experimenting with a few different prototypes, he was able to connect an external water filter. 

During this trial and error period, he strove to make the MFDB even more versatile. That’s when he discovered the MFDB could be used to do more. An inflation device makes blowing up a mattress much easier, but after some research it was determined that there were additional benefits.

While inflating your air mattress with the MFDB it is not only more convenient, there are additional benefits. If the user utilizes ambient air versus one's highly-saturated breath, the mattress can stay warmer longer. Additionally, those operating at high altitudes may not have the lung capacity to fully inflate their mattress. With this in-mind, Jason set out to create a connector that would work for multiple brands. The MFDB will inflate Klymit, Thermarest, Nemo, and some REI &
column2:
Cabelas Models. Many of the leading outdoor manufacturers make dry bags, water collection/filtration kits and mattress inflators...but none put all that functionality into one piece of gear.

The MFDB is 100% American-made and Veteran Owned. 

""Kevin O'Leary would probably want to throw me out of Shark Tank, but there is a tremendous sense of pride knowing I made it here. My grandmother spent 50 years working in a mill. That job provided for my family and many others. I want to do my part and help empower American manufacturers. I am incredibly proud to say this product has a direct &
column3:
positive impact on 38 American families. We could definitely make higher margins with offshore suppliers, but that's just not me.

Lastly, I want to show others struggling with PTSD that there are alternatives to self-medicating, alcohol, and suicide. The hum of a sewing machine and some good tunes can do wonders for your soul!""

IT’S ME, from Puglia

I have always had this crazy dream to create the perfect holiday place. The ultimate vacation place at the core of Puglia, my homeland, in aTrulli mansion. A place where you could be whoever you want to be, a painter, a rock climber, a yogi, a farmer or the cool kid taking ‘selfies by the pool’. So I went ahead and bought a Trulli property near Martina Franca, in Puglia. 

Now I need funds to restore this little gem and turn it into an amazing Trulli Retreat holiday villa.
column2: >Is it a crazy dream?
column3:
>The people, who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who usually do said a very special person once.

What does TRULLI mean, you may ask?

Italian by origin, I've always been a passionate traveler. Over the years, I lived in Europe, Asia, and Africa working in hotels and resorts in marketing &
column4:
communications.

I have met some amazing people during my years in Asia, people who showed me how the essence of travel is to be found nowhere else but within ourselves.

This idea turned into a real project when I bought this Trulli property - here above - in the South of Italy, Puglia. I knew that self-catering or B&
column5:
B holiday villas were widely spread around Puglia, beautiful rustic locations that would inevitably leave you with THAT bittersweet question  ‘What now?’ after your arrival.

Time to do something different.
column6:
>THE CONCEPT

We often travel to seek new experiences
column7:
some of us searching for something that would make us feel complete, others instead, to reinvent themselves. Truth is, not knowing what to expect, many people end up just contenting themselves with what a holiday may bring.

But what if, for once, you could literally design your own holiday?

Crafting each moment of your time with your family or friends to turn yet another vacation into an authentic experience that will leave you re-energized, refreshed and most importantly inspired.

This is the concept that I want to develop by renovating the property. It will not be another pretty villa in the South of Italy, but a unique ‘Trulli Retreat’, a place thriving on a simple DIY recipe for happiness.
column9: >I believe that a retreat is not just a holiday spent SPA hopping between massages and saunas. It’s doing what makes you feel great. That’s why handpicking your favorite activities on the ‘Retreat Menu’ is what makes the difference.
column10:
>When booking your holiday at the Trulli Retreat you will be able to

 

THE RESTORATION

ALL THE NECESSARY CERTIFICATIONS AND CONSTRUCTION PERMITS

HAVE BEEN OBTAINED FOR THIS PROJECT.

The restoration of this type of architecture in Puglia requires a series of specific permits and craftsmanship. In order to restore a property of this scale, the cost of refurbishment is estimated to be up to US$ 300,000.

The amount raised with this crowdfunding campaign will be used to start and complete the restoration process, which is divided in two parts:

Restoration:

column1: • Restore  two of six Trulli domes on the roof of the building
• Rehabilitate the original flooring (indoor and outdoor) with local ‘chianca’ stone
• Stonework to be done along the indoor arches and outdoor façade
• Restore one bedroom and build two new bedrooms

FACILITIES

Once the renovation is completed, the Trulli will feature three uniquely designed bedrooms, two bathrooms, in-Trulli living area with a romantic fireplace, kitchen and a wine bar. Outside, the gazebo will make for your al fresco dining overlooking the orchard and the vineyard as well as the pool, surrounded by the estate’s private olive grove.

THE RENOVATION

Did you know? Trulli are UNESCO Protected!

I worked with talented experts and the project management of the architect Mina Ritella, to obtain all the necessary permits to restore the Trulli in full compliance with the UNESCO regulations. Mina, the architect, shared my vision of a contemporary take on traditional Trulli living from the start, turning my dream design into reality.

The design concept of the Trulli Retreat enhances the sense of space and purity of lines of the original architecture. The interiors are bright and the color palette serves as a soothing background to your relaxation.
column2:
>WHAT'S HAPPENING?

 

Why Crowdfunding?

I invested a lot more than anticipated over the last two years in sourcing, acquiring property, elaborating the concept and design with the architect and team of experts as well as applying for all the construction permits. 

By choosing 'flexible funding' for this campaign, I will be able to receive all the funds even if I don't reach the target. I will then integrate your contributions with own funds and secured third-party investment to reach the overall amount needed to realize the project. 

An African proverb once said ‘If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together’. And that says it all. I strongly believe in the power of community and a project like this, that started with a single dream, can become something really special and never done before.

I want people to be proud to say ‘I was part of this project!’

What was done and invested into up to now?

column1: • Puglia lovers from all over the world
• People who heard of Puglia’s unique Trulli and want to experience them
• Retreat experts contributing their wellness knowledge and anything you think can help

How your contributions will be used?

It’s necessary to raise funds to:
• Build the pool and rehabilitate the olive grove and the vineyard
• For the Perks related to your future stay, you will receive a RETREAT VOUCHER
• All Perks are subject to availability listed in the campaign
• Webinar sessions will be scheduled based on trainer's availability.
• Group meetings with one of the experts will be organized with execution dates (options provided).
<li>Your Room Night RETREAT VOUCHER will be valid once the Trulli Retreat has started operations according to Terms &amp

• When you want to make your reservation, you will be asked for your RETREAT VOUCHER number and the backer's name. All RETREAT VOUCHERS can only be used once and cannot be replicated or given to other persons. The same backer can purchase multiple vouchers but cannot use them at the same time.
• These Perks are created specifically for this crowdfunding campaign and cannot be combined with any other offer, current or future Trulli Retreat promotions or discounts.
• The RETREAT STAY perks are valid for two to six persons. Additional guests will be at a charge.
• Perks do not include any applicable prevailing government taxes at the time of occupancy.
• Service Charge not included in Perk amount.

What To Do Next?  

I really hope you loved learning more about this project and are keen to support it! Please go to the top of the page and press ""BACK IT"" and feel free to choose the amount of donation or choose your favorite PERK.

FOLLOW US and SHARE:

https://www.facebook.com/pugliafeelsgood 

https://www.instagram.com/pugliafeelsgood 

https://twitter.com/pugliafeelsgood 

 

CONNECT:

Dolores Semeraro - Dolores@pugliafeelsgood.com

www.pugliafeelsgood.com

 

 

THANK YOU!

DOLORES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

","IT’S ME, from PugliaI have always had this crazy dream to create the perfect holiday place. The ultimate vacation place at the core of Puglia, my homeland, in aTrulli mansion. A place where you could be whoever you want to be, a painter, a rock climber, a yogi, a farmer or the cool kid taking ‘selfies by the pool’. So I went ahead and bought a Trulli property near Martina Franca, in Puglia. Now I need funds to restore this little gem and turn it into an amazing Trulli Retreat holiday villa.Is it a crazy dream?The people, who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who usually do said a very special person once.What does TRULLI mean, you may ask?Italian by origin, I've always been a passionate traveler. Over the years, I lived in Europe, Asia, and Africa working in hotels and resorts in marketing & communications.I have met some amazing people during my years in Asia, people who showed me how the essence of travel is to be found nowhere else but within ourselves.This idea turned into a real project when I bought this Trulli property - here above - in the South of Italy, Puglia. I knew that self-catering or B&B holiday villas were widely spread around Puglia, beautiful rustic locations that would inevitably leave you with THAT bittersweet question  ‘What now?’ after your arrival.Time to do something different.THE CONCEPTWe often travel to seek new experiences
column2: some of us searching for something that would make us feel complete, others instead, to reinvent themselves. Truth is, not knowing what to expect, many people end up just contenting themselves with what a holiday may bring.But what if, for once, you could literally design your own holiday?Crafting each moment of your time with your family or friends to turn yet another vacation into an authentic experience that will leave you re-energized, refreshed and most importantly inspired.This is the concept that I want to develop by renovating the property. It will not be another pretty villa in the South of Italy, but a unique ‘Trulli Retreat’, a place thriving on a simple DIY recipe for happiness.What is a retreat?I believe that a retreat is not just a holiday spent SPA hopping between massages and saunas. It’s doing what makes you feel great. That’s why handpicking your favorite activities on the ‘Retreat Menu’ is what makes the difference.When booking your holiday at the Trulli Retreat you will be able to THE RESTORATIONALL THE NECESSARY CERTIFICATIONS AND CONSTRUCTION PERMITSHAVE BEEN OBTAINED FOR THIS PROJECT.The restoration of this type of architecture in Puglia requires a series of specific permits and craftsmanship. In order to restore a property of this scale, the cost of refurbishment is estimated to be up to US$ 300,000.The amount raised with this crowdfunding campaign will be used to start and complete the restoration process, which is divided in two parts:Restoration:

column1: Restore  two of six Trulli domes on the roof of the building
Rehabilitate the original flooring (indoor and outdoor) with local ‘chianca’ stone
Stonework to be done along the indoor arches and outdoor façade
Restore one bedroom and build two new bedrooms

FACILITIESOnce the renovation is completed, the Trulli will feature three uniquely designed bedrooms, two bathrooms, in-Trulli living area with a romantic fireplace, kitchen and a wine bar. Outside, the gazebo will make for your al fresco dining overlooking the orchard and the vineyard as well as the pool, surrounded by the estate’s private olive grove.THE RENOVATIONDid you know? Trulli are UNESCO Protected!I worked with talented experts and the project management of the architect Mina Ritella, to obtain all the necessary permits to restore the Trulli in full compliance with the UNESCO regulations. Mina, the architect, shared my vision of a contemporary take on traditional Trulli living from the start, turning my dream design into reality.The design concept of the Trulli Retreat enhances the sense of space and purity of lines of the original architecture. The interiors are bright and the color palette serves as a soothing background to your relaxation.WHAT'S HAPPENING? Why Crowdfunding?I invested a lot more than anticipated over the last two years in sourcing, acquiring property, elaborating the concept and design with the architect and team of experts as well as applying for all the construction permits. By choosing 'flexible funding' for this campaign, I will be able to receive all the funds even if I don't reach the target. I will then integrate your contributions with own funds and secured third-party investment to reach the overall amount needed to realize the project. An African proverb once said ‘If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together’. And that says it all. I strongly believe in the power of community and a project like this, that started with a single dream, can become something really special and never done before.I want people to be proud to say ‘I was part of this project!’What was done and invested into up to now?
Restoration and construction permits – all obtained.

I'm a Vietnamese who studied in Tourism. I have met numerous international tourists who get lost or confused of what to do in Vietnam - even after they did a lot of research from different websites and books. I realize that although there are many websites about Vietnam tourism, not many of them are written by Vietnamese people.

Tôi là một người Việt Nam, tôi theo học chuyên ngành Du lịch. Qua những lần đi đây đó, tôi gặp và trò chuyện với nhiều du khách quốc tế và tôi nhận thấy dường như họ luôn bị bối rối hay ngỡ ngàng về nhiều thứ khác nhau ở Việt Nam – thậm chí là họ đã tìm kiếm thông tin từ vô số website và sách hướng dẫn du lịch. Tôi nhận ra rằng: mặc dù có rất nhiều website về du lịch ở Việt Nam nhưng đa số chúng đều không phải được viết ra bởi người Việt Nam.
We want to create a community by making a website to share information and experience about Vietnam tourism and culture.

The idea of this website is very simple, it is a place where any visitor can ask any question and get the answer directly from Vietnamese people. As a team working together, AskVietnamese will become a community to support international tourists in Vietnam.
Vì vậy, tôi và team của mình mong muốn tạo ra một cộng đồng cùng nhau chia sẻ thông tin và kinh nghiệm về du lịch và văn hóa ở Việt Nam.

Ý tưởng hình thành website này rất đơn giản: đây sẽ là nơi để bất cứ du khách quốc tế nào cũng có thể đặt ra bất kì câu hỏi nào về Việt Nam và nhận được câu trả lời trực tiếp từ chính những người bản địa ở Việt Nam. Chúng tôi hy vọng AskVietnamese sẽ trở thành một cộng đồng đắc lực hỗ trợ du khách nước ngoài đến Việt Nam.
• Thúc đẩy sự hiểu biết của mọi người về du lịch sinh thái
• Tạo ra một cộng đồng để giúp đỡ du khách quốc tế
• Hỗ trợ những địa điểm kinh doanh nhỏ ở các địa phương bán thức ăn/sản phẩm chất lượng của địa phương đó
• Chia sẻ kinh nghiệm, giải đáp thắc mắc của du khách

International tourists will use AskVietnamese as a platform to find out information about: Places, Travel Tips, Safety, Events, Culture, Souvernirs. These information are confirmed to be authentic and trustworthy.

Du khách quốc tế sẽ tìm thấy nhiều thông tin hữu ích và đáng tin cậy về địa điểm du lịch, những hoạt động đặc sắc ở Việt Nam, văn hóa Việt Nam, quà lưu niệm, những “bí quyết bỏ túi” khi du lịch. Thông tin được cung cấp tại AskVietnamese sẽ mang tính bản địa với độ chân thật cao.
• Thông tin: phương tiện giao thông, thời tiết, chính sách, địa lý, lịch sử
• Văn hóa: thức ăn, ngôn ngữ, tín ngưỡng, kiêng kỵ

column2: những lời khuyên, đề xuất hữu ích

column1: • Blog: Cảm nhận, suy nghĩ, chia sẻ cá nhân
• Sản phẩm sáng tạo: khắc họa văn hóa qua các bức vẽ, hình ảnh động, video/clip…

Sử dụng website của AskVietnamese, du khách quốc tế sẽ tìm thấy nhiều thông tin hữu ích và đáng tin cậy về địa điểm du lịch, những hoạt động đặc sắc ở Việt Nam, văn hóa Việt Nam, quà lưu niệm, những “bí quyết bỏ túi” khi du lịch.
+ Sắc đỏ: Đam mê: Truyền cảm hứng để nhiều người “xách ba lô lên và đi” và chia sẻ những trải nghiệm của họ về Việt Nam cho cả thế giới
+ Sắc xanh: Xác thực: Cung cấp những kinh nghiệm đáng tin cậy và sâu sắc về lối sống của người dân địa phương
+ Sắc xanh lá: Thân thiện: Sử dụng ngôn ngữ tiếng Anh đơn giản, dễ đọc, dễ hiểu. Khuyến khích người Việt trẻ luyện tập sử dụng tiếng Anh
+ Sắc vàng: Sáng tạo: Sáng tạo, sáng tạo và sáng tạo! Chúng tôi yêu những hình ảnh động, những bức vẽ, video, graphic… và cố gắng thể hiện chúng nhiều nhất có thể trong những nội dung của mình
+ Sắc cam: Hài hước: Chúng tôi có sự vui nhộn, thư giãn và cả một chút dí dỏm. Mọi người đều thích vui vẻ mà, đúng không?
+ Sắc tím: Hỗ trợ du lịch sinh thái: Tăng cường sự hiểu biết của mọi người về du lịch sinh thái và những ngành du lịch bền vững khác ở Việt Nam

We contact Local Writers from different places in Vietnam, inviting them to join AskVietnamese and encouraging them to share information/experience/feeling about their hometown. We will work to translate their writing from Vietnamese to English if necessary.

Chúng tôi liên hệ với những Người Viết Bài - là người Địa Phương sinh sống ở nhiều nơi trên khắp đất nước Việt Nam để mời họ tham gia vào AskVietnamsese, cũng như khuyến khích họ chia sẻ thông tin/kinh nghiệm/cảm nhận của họ về quê hương. Chúng tôi cũng tiến hành dịch những bài viết này từ tiếng Việt sang tiếng Anh nếu cần thiết.
KẾ HOẠCH NĂM 2018: xây dựng trang web AskVietnamese với giao diện độc đáo, nội dung chi tiết cũng như có những chức năng dễ sử dụng cho khách du lịch
• Tháng 9 – 10/2017: Xây dựng website: thiết kế và nội dung
• Tháng 2/2018: Phát triển kênh trên mạng xã hội
• Kế hoạch dài hạn: Tạo ra nhiều sản phẩm sáng tạo hơn nữa
To establish a platform like this, we need at least $2000 at first stage, which does not include any payment for our team members:
• + 20%: Thiết kế website và giao diện
• + 20%: Tên miền và trang chủ của website trong một năm

AskVietnamese project faces the usual risk of any crowdfunding campaign: what if we fail to raise $2000 to establish our website? Does it mean all the work we've done from the last 6 months is wasted and useless? BE FEARLESS: we're gonna make the website anyway. And we would still send our backer a thank-you note with a mention of their name in our website.

Let us be realistic! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. Our team is comprised of travel writers, graphic designers, photographers, video makers, artists...Our greatest strength lies on the fact that we're confident of our ability to build the website content with  interested, rich, informative, creative and authentic information.

Cũng như những chiến dịch gây quỹ cộng đồng khác, rủi ro mà dự án AskVietnamese phải đối mặt chính là không được hỗ trợ đủ số tiền 2.000 USD để thành lập trang web. Nếu thất bại, chẳng lẽ những thứ cả team làm miệt mài trong 6 tháng qua là lãng phí và vô ích? ĐỪNG LO! Dù thế nào chúng tôi cũng sẽ đi đến cùng với website này. Và chúng tôi sẽ gửi những tấm thiếp cảm ơn đến những người đã hỗ trợ team và tên của họ sẽ được nhắc đến trân trọng trên website của chúng tôi.

Nhưng thực tế mà nói, team đã làm nhiều nghiên cứu để giảm thiểu rủi ro đến mức nhỏ nhất. Team của AskVietnamese bao gồm nhiều thành phần từ những cây bút du lịch, người thiết kế web, nhiếp ảnh gia, người tạo ra các video cho đến những nghệ sĩ… Tuy nhiên, điểm mạnh nhất của team nằm ở việc chúng tôi tin vào khả năng xây dựng website và nội dung hấp dẫn, phong phú, giàu thông tin, xác thực và đầy sáng tạo của mình.

We are very thankful for your great help and encouragement! So, here is our warm treat for New Year: Any backer who supports us from $10 will RECEIVE A SPECIAL PAINTED PICTURE of their face, like this:

Tin vui cho bạn: Team AskVietnamese vô cùng biết ơn những sự khuyến khích và hỗ trợ của các bạn cho team trong những ngày đầu chập chững này. Vì vậy, chúng tôi có một món quà năm mới dành cho những người đóng góp cho chúng tôi từ $10 trở lên. Mỗi người sẽ nhận được một tấm hình độc nhất vô nhị phác họa gương mặt của mình, như thế này:
(This is Gail - from England who has supported us a lot)
(Đây là Gali – một người bạn ở nước Anh đã hỗ trợ chúng tôi rất nhiều)
You'll receive this special painted photo within two days via Facebook/Twitter after pledging, which means that even we fail to raise fund (No.No.No. It's not gonna happen!) you still receive it.

Bạn sẽ nhận được bức vẽ đặc biệt này qua Facebook/Twitter hai ngày sau khi bạn đóng góp cho chúng tôi. Dù chúng tôi thất bại trong việc gây quỹ (không! Không! Điều này sẽ không xảy ra đâu nhỉ?!), bạn vẫn sẽ nhận được hình.

Cảm ơn! Thank you!

Sản phẩm sáng tạo: khắc họa văn hóa qua các bức vẽ, hình ảnh động, video/clip…

Điều gì làm AskVietnamese khác biệt ?
+ Sắc đỏ: Đam mê: Truyền cảm hứng để nhiều người “xách ba lô lên và đi” và chia sẻ những trải nghiệm của họ về Việt Nam cho cả thế giới
+ Sắc xanh: Xác thực: Cung cấp những kinh nghiệm đáng tin cậy và sâu sắc về lối sống của người dân địa phương
+ Sắc xanh lá: Thân thiện: Sử dụng ngôn ngữ tiếng Anh đơn giản, dễ đọc, dễ hiểu. Khuyến khích người Việt trẻ luyện tập sử dụng tiếng Anh
+ Sắc vàng: Sáng tạo: Sáng tạo, sáng tạo và sáng tạo! Chúng tôi yêu những hình ảnh động, những bức vẽ, video, graphic… và cố gắng thể hiện chúng nhiều nhất có thể trong những nội dung của mình
+ Sắc cam: Hài hước: Chúng tôi có sự vui nhộn, thư giãn và cả một chút dí dỏm. Mọi người đều thích vui vẻ mà, đúng không?
+ Sắc tím: Hỗ trợ du lịch sinh thái: Tăng cường sự hiểu biết của mọi người về du lịch sinh thái và những ngành du lịch bền vững khác ở Việt Nam

We contact Local Writers from different places in Vietnam, inviting them to join AskVietnamese and encouraging them to share information/experience/feeling about their hometown. We will work to translate their writing from Vietnamese to English if necessary.

Chúng tôi liên hệ với những Người Viết Bài - là người Địa Phương sinh sống ở nhiều nơi trên khắp đất nước Việt Nam để mời họ tham gia vào AskVietnamsese, cũng như khuyến khích họ chia sẻ thông tin/kinh nghiệm/cảm nhận của họ về quê hương. Chúng tôi cũng tiến hành dịch những bài viết này từ tiếng Việt sang tiếng Anh nếu cần thiết.
KẾ HOẠCH NĂM 2018: xây dựng trang web AskVietnamese với giao diện độc đáo, nội dung chi tiết cũng như có những chức năng dễ sử dụng cho khách du lịch
Tháng 6 – 8/2017: Thành lập team cốt cán
Tháng 9 – 10/2017: Xây dựng website: thiết kế và nội dung
Tháng 2/2018: Phát triển kênh trên mạng xã hội
Kế hoạch dài hạn: Tạo ra nhiều sản phẩm sáng tạo hơn nữa
To establish a platform like this, we need at least $2000 at first stage, which does not include any payment for our team members:
+ 20%: Thiết kế website và giao diện
+ 20%: Tên miền và trang chủ của website trong một năm

AskVietnamese project faces the usual risk of any crowdfunding campaign: what if we fail to raise $2000 to establish our website? Does it mean all the work we've done from the last 6 months is wasted and useless? BE FEARLESS: we're gonna make the website anyway. And we would still send our backer a thank-you note with a mention of their name in our website.

Let us be realistic! We have done our homework, so the risks are minimal. Our team is comprised of travel writers, graphic designers, photographers, video makers, artists...Our greatest strength lies on the fact that we're confident of our ability to build the website content with  interested, rich, informative, creative and authentic information.

Cũng như những chiến dịch gây quỹ cộng đồng khác, rủi ro mà dự án AskVietnamese phải đối mặt chính là không được hỗ trợ đủ số tiền 2.000 USD để thành lập trang web. Nếu thất bại, chẳng lẽ những thứ cả team làm miệt mài trong 6 tháng qua là lãng phí và vô ích? ĐỪNG LO! Dù thế nào chúng tôi cũng sẽ đi đến cùng với website này. Và chúng tôi sẽ gửi những tấm thiếp cảm ơn đến những người đã hỗ trợ team và tên của họ sẽ được nhắc đến trân trọng trên website của chúng tôi.

Nhưng thực tế mà nói, team đã làm nhiều nghiên cứu để giảm thiểu rủi ro đến mức nhỏ nhất. Team của AskVietnamese bao gồm nhiều thành phần từ những cây bút du lịch, người thiết kế web, nhiếp ảnh gia, người tạo ra các video cho đến những nghệ sĩ… Tuy nhiên, điểm mạnh nhất của team nằm ở việc chúng tôi tin vào khả năng xây dựng website và nội dung hấp dẫn, phong phú, giàu thông tin, xác thực và đầy sáng tạo của mình.
A very good news for you:

We are very thankful for your great help and encouragement! So, here is our warm treat for New Year: Any backer who supports us from $10 will RECEIVE A SPECIAL PAINTED PICTURE of their face, like this:

Tin vui cho bạn: Team AskVietnamese vô cùng biết ơn những sự khuyến khích và hỗ trợ của các bạn cho team trong những ngày đầu chập chững này. Vì vậy, chúng tôi có một món quà năm mới dành cho những người đóng góp cho chúng tôi từ $10 trở lên. Mỗi người sẽ nhận được một tấm hình độc nhất vô nhị phác họa gương mặt của mình, như thế này:
(This is Gail - from England who has supported us a lot)
(Đây là Gali – một người bạn ở nước Anh đã hỗ trợ chúng tôi rất nhiều)
You'll receive this special painted photo within two days via Facebook/Twitter after pledging, which means that even we fail to raise fund (No.No.No. It's not gonna happen!) you still receive it.

Bạn sẽ nhận được bức vẽ đặc biệt này qua Facebook/Twitter hai ngày sau khi bạn đóng góp cho chúng tôi. Dù chúng tôi thất bại trong việc gây quỹ (không! Không! Điều này sẽ không xảy ra đâu nhỉ?!), bạn vẫn sẽ nhận được hình.

THE PRO LIGHT CAMPAIGN

Invest in our smallest world travel adapter.

column1:
• What is the SKROSS® PRO Light exactly?
    This patented 3-pole travel adapter enables you to power your electronic devices from practically anywhere in the world. Whether you want to charge your mobile phone, or plug in your laptop or your curling iron: the compact and convenient adapter is an easy and safe way to connect 2- and 3-pole devices on any continent.

• How can you support the SKROSS® PRO Light campaign and profit in three ways?
    It’s easy! The process only takes a few minutes. You can find all the latest information and videos as well as legal notices on the website. The minimum investment is only USD 39 (EUR 36). You profit in three ways:

column1: We have started the project in autumn 2015 and had fully functional prototypes working in December. In January the pilot series had been fully tested be the well-known reliable institute TÜV Süd in Germany. Now, we get the production going and are setting up a 100% quality assurance.
SKROSS® is a Swiss company which has been the market leader for many years in providing innovative solutions for mobile travellers

• SKROSS® invented and patented the first all-in-one world adapter with country slider system in 2002. The World Adapter Classic promptly became a worldwide bestseller. Exports to over 60 countries confirmed that high-quality, multifunctional travel adapters that are both safe and compact attract tremendous international interest.

• With its SKROSS® brand, WorldConnect AG grew into a company operating on a global scale in just a few years, using its boundless power of innovation to develop products for mobile travellers. The company has one, clear objective: to be the global market leader for high-quality travel adapters. Today, our range of products includesworld travel adapters with and without USB charging capabilities, USB chargers and batteries, as well as practical charge and sync cables for today’s modern traveller.

  • With SKROSS®, staying fully charged is simple – anywhere around the world, on all continents. Our patented country slider system ensures connection in over 150 countries. At the same time, our products remain the most compact and easy to use on the market. That is what makes SKROSS® unique. And this has already impressed not just millions of travellers, but many judging panels as well. SKROSS® products have won numerous Red Dot Design Awards and Product of the Year accolades, recognising both their functionality as well as their design. 


    • POWER UP 

    When travelling abroad, your devices often struggle to keep up with you – unless the SKROSS® World Adapter PRO LIGHT with the suitable tops provides the necessary energy!

The original Vbag 5-in-1 Convertible Backpack System was the Ultimate Do All, Hold All Bag.  It was 230% funded in spring 2016.

Available in Black with blue Zippers. 

 

We all love privacy so the Vbag II has 7 pockets inside for important stuff.   The front panel also has 2 INDIVIDUAL pockets with hidden zippers, and 1 large zippered pocket for fast access.

Vbag II is strong: most bags use 600D nylon, but we use 840D water repellent Oxford canvas with waterproof linings in the compartments. 

Stain and water repellent 840D Oxford canvas is tough for the outdoors.

2 stow away shoulder straps for Backpack or cross buckle one for Sling bag + Long padded shoulder strap

Strap ends fit inside buckles

BACKPACK

Don't look like the rest of the crowd

""Vbag looks nothing like others that strap on a big sack"" - Abby

BRIEFCASE

Flat profile Briefcase  - more professional than a backpack for work

""My laptop is fully protected by the foam cushioning around the edges!"" - Tim

MESSENGER BAG 

Detachable padded long strap for Messenger bag stows away

SLING BAG

Sling bag can be configured with one of the stow away shoulder straps or detachable long strap for fast access

""The short or long straps let me pull out my camera whenever I need"" - Laurel

CARRY ON 

Carry on with expansion zipper opens for extra 2 inches of space.  2 clips secure to luggage.

""The extra 2 inches allowed me to replace my luggage for plane rides"" - KK

Perks Ship 5/2017 

So please share our campaign with your friends and family using the share buttons under the main video.

Share our campaign on at least 2 social media platforms, let us know and we will add a $10 insulated bottle holder to your pre-order FREE.  Limit one per backer please.

International Shipping Fees

Most other campaigns add it onto the Reward pledge and say it's Free Shipping but we chose to be transparent about it.  In fact, we lose $10 on each shipment because it's about 3 pounds.

Vbag II Design

Living in any city, we are always short on space and time.  And like you, we had a bunch of different bags that are collecting dust in the closet for months until needed. 

So we decided to design one bag that could:
• expand to hold as much as we need
• easily convert into different styles to go from work to play...
• and not look like every other drooping bland black sack.

We started out in 2015 as a new line of fashionable and functional wallets, and have gotten to the point where we can be an independent entity.  Wallgers has already delivered 2 previous campaigns on time.   

The Vbag II is the second bag design to be offered under the Wallgers brand.  Instead of leather, it will be made with 840D Oxford canvas - a much denser material than the usual 600D nylon.

We changed the top handle and hid the 2 front pockets for a sleek look.

The factory that we will be working with is an OEM bag maker for several top American designers.
